description.description: Gnome Pie is a cool program launcher. It can help you fast start specified program and execute system functions such as shutdown and reboot. In addition, it has a super cool appearance and convenient shortcuts.

description.name: Gnome Pie
description.description: Gnome Pie是一款炫酷的程序启动器，它可以帮助您快速启动特定程序及执行如关机、重启等系统功能，还是具备超炫的外观及方便的快捷键功能。

description.name: Web KityMinder
description.description: Web KityMinder is a powerful online mind map editor. You can use it without installation. It can import and export XMind and FreeMind files, also can export image files in PNG, SVG and other formats as well as common mind map files such as  xmind, mm and others. KityMinder has a sharing function, you can share to others to view after edited.

description.name: 百度脑图网页版
description.description: 百度脑图是一款强大的在线思维导图编辑器，无需安装即可使用。而且支持 XMind、FreeMind 文件的导入和导出，也能导出 PNG、SVG等格式的图像文件和xmind、mm等常用的思维导图文件。百度脑图还具备分享功能，编辑后可在线分享给其他人浏览。

description.name: Audacious
description.description: Audacious is a music player different from other players. Chinese character gash problem can be well resolved with Its support on other character set besides UTF-8 character set. Meanwhile, Audacious can meet different individual needs through its rich plug-in extensions.

description.name: Audacious
description.description: Audacious是一款音乐播放器，与其它播放器的不同之处在于，它除了支持UTF-8字符集之外，还提供对其它字符集的支持，这样能很好的解决中文乱码的问题。同时，Audacious可以通过丰富的插件扩展来满足不同的个性化需求。

description.name: Quod Libet
description.description: Quod Libet is a music player that aims at helping you listen to your favorite music and create playlists. If you have a large music library, you can search and play music with this software very conveniently. It has an easy to use interface and can quickly access music library and custom playlists. Users can filter the music by album name, artist or genre to find the music they want.

description.name: Quod Libet
description.description: Quod Libet是一款音乐播放器，旨在帮助你听你喜欢的歌曲并创建播放列表。如果你拥有一个大型的音乐库，你可以使用这个工具来方便地查找和播放歌曲。该界面易于使用，并提供快速访问音乐库和自定义播放列表。您还可以过滤曲目按专辑，歌手或音频流派，以轻松地找到你想要听的文件。

description.name: Maxthon Browser
description.description: Maxthon is a cloud browser based on Chromium. It integrates Maxthon account, favorites and intelligent form filling sync, quick access, mouse gestures, super dragging, automatic update, data sync and plug-in system function.

description.name: 傲游云浏览器
description.description: 傲游云浏览器是一款基于Chromium开发的云浏览器，它集成了傲游账户、收藏和智能填表同步、快速访问、鼠标手势、超级拖拽、自动更新等功能，同时具有数据同步、插件系统功能。

description.name: GNS3
description.description: GNS3 is a graphical network emulator, it can emulate the network devices of Cisco IOS, Juniper and provide a nearly perfect experiment environment for Cisco network engineer, administrator or Cisco certificate examinee. It can modify the size of workspace and export it to a picture, and also create tag to interface name automatically.

description.name: GNS3
description.description: GNS3是一个图形化的网络模拟器，可以仿真思科IOS、Juniper的网络设备，可以为Cisco网络工程师、管理员、Cisco证书考生提供近乎完美的实验环境。可以修改工作区大小，并可以导出为图片，可以自动为接口名称创建标签。

description.name: PDFsam
description.description: PDFsam Basic is a free, open source, multi-platform software designed to split, merge, extract pages, mix and rotate PDF files. It will cover most of your PDF related needs.

description.name: PDFsam
description.description: PDFsam是一款PDF编辑工具，可以拆分、 合并、 重排PDF文件的内容。你可以分割文件的大小、 页面或书签、 将多个PDF文件合并成一个，旋转文档和也切换文档之间的页面。

description.name: Seafile
description.description: Seafile is an open source, professional and reliable cloud storage platform with online preview, editing, contrast changing, file restore, messaging, group discussion and other functions. Meanwhile, It can solve centralized file storage, sharing and cross-platform access and other issues.
description.slogan: Freely manage your data by yourself.

description.name: Seafile
description.description: Seafile是一个开源、专业、可靠的云存储平台，提供在线预览、编辑、对比更改、还原文件、消息通信、群组讨论等功能，同时还可以解决文件集中存储、共享和跨平台访问等问题。

description.name: Gweled
description.description: Gweled is a puzzle game, and also can be called a bejeweled game. The game need to exchange adjacent jewels to align vertical or horizontal 3 or more jewels, when there's no more move the game is over. Besides challenge mode there are two more mode called time mode or endless mode. It supports the function of save and restore the game.
description.slogan: Activate the magic of the jewel.

description.name: Gweled
description.description: Gweled是一款益智类游戏，也被称为宝石方块，游戏的目的是通过交换相邻的宝石，使垂直或水平的3个或更多的宝石对齐。 当没有可能的移动时游戏结束。除了闯关模式，还可以选择另外两种游戏模式，定时模式或无尽模式，支持保存和恢复游戏功能。

description.name: Disks
description.description: Disks is a disk management tool. It can read the hard disk, optical drive, USB flash drive and other information. And it's also characterized with functions of viewing detailed information on hard disk, formatting hard disk, editing partition type, creating ISO, etc.

description.name: Disks
description.description: Disks是一款磁盘管理工具，它可以读取硬盘、光驱、U盘等信息，同时还具有查看硬盘详细信息、格式化硬盘、编辑分区类型、创建镜像文件等功能。

description.name: Android Yi Dian Zi Xun
description.description: Yi Dian Zi Xun is a news App. By it you can search and subscribe any keywords. It will automatically gather and real-time update relevant information. Meanwhile, it will smartly analyze your interest and recommend contents to you.

description.name: 一点资讯安卓版
description.description: 一点资讯是一款新闻资讯应用，通过它你可以搜索并订阅任意关键词，它会自动帮你聚合整理并实时更新相关资讯，同时会智能分析你的兴趣爱好，为你推荐感兴趣的内容。

description.name: Web Hextris
description.description: Hextris is a casual puzzle game. Player spins the grey hex in the middle to use match-three code to clear bars of different colors moved onto the hex, thus to get points.

description.name: Hextris网页版
description.description: Hextris是一款益智休闲游戏，玩家通过旋转屏幕中间的灰色六角形，利用三同色叠加消除规则，可以清除滑落到六角形内的各种同色长条，换取游戏积分。

description.name: NTFS Configuration Tool
description.description: NTFS Configuration Tool is a graphical auto mount tool. It supports NTFS read and write operations through configuration. You can choose the partition to mount and will automatically load the Windows partition to Linux system.

description.name: NTFS写入支持配置程序
description.description: NTFS写入支持配置程序是一个图形化的自动挂载工具，通过配置支持NTFS读写操作，您可以选择要挂载的分区，将自动加载Windows分区到Linux系统中。

description.name: Sweet Home 3D
description.description: Sweet Home 3D is a home decoration aided design software with 16 languages supported, including Chinese. It can help you design and decorate home furnishing through two-dimensional plan, any changes you have made on the plan will be displayed in 3D view in real time.
description.slogan: Sweet home needs to be "designed" by heart.

description.name: Sweet Home 3D
description.description: Sweet Home 3D是一款家装辅助设计软件， 支持包括中文在内的16种语言。它能够帮助您通过二维的平面图来设计和布置家居，您在平面图上所作的任何更改都将会实时地显示在3D视图中。
description.slogan: 家是如此的温暖，当然要用心“设计”。

description.name: Gtranslator
description.description: Gtranslator is an enhanced gettext PO file editor. It deals with all forms of gettext PO files, which includes search/replace, translation memory, navigation functions.
description.slogan: GNOME files will be almighty by the translator.

description.name: Gtranslator
description.description: Gtranslator是一个增强的gettextPO文件编辑器。它处理所有形式的gettextPO文件，包括查找/替换，翻译记忆、导航功能。
description.slogan: 翻译，让GNOME环境下的文件无所不能。

description.name: ExtremeTuxRacer
description.description: Tux Racer is a free software 3D computer game starring the Linux mascot, Tux the penguin. In the game, the player controls Tux (or one of three other characters) as he slides down a course of snow and ice collecting herring. There are also trees to block Tux's path and flags for the sake of marking out the course.

description.name: ExtremeTuxRacer
description.description: ExtremeTuxRacer是一个赛车模拟游戏，其主角为企鹅Tux，在游戏中，玩家控制Tux从满是冰雪的山坡上滑下，并不断收集滑道周围分散着的青鱼可以得分。要进入下一关，玩家必须既要收集足够的鱼又要在时限内到达终点。
description.slogan: 狂野飙车，让企鹅也疯狂。

description.name: Transmageddon
description.description: Transmageddon is an audio and video file conversion tool with intuitive and easy to operate interface. It supports to output almost any video formats and can also generate video formats in specified platform.
description.slogan: You can convert formats at will.

description.name: Transmageddon
description.description: Transmageddon是一款音频和视频文件转换工具，其界面直观且易于操作，支持输出几乎所有的视频格式，同时也可以生成指定平台下的视频格式。

description.name: FreeCol
description.description: FreeCol is a turn-based strategy game based on the old game Colonization, and similar to Civilization. The objective of the game is to create an independent nation.The player leads the colony of a European power from the arrival on the shore of the New World into the future, achieving one of a two of possible victory conditions: either gaining independence by declaring independence and subsequently defeating the dispatched royal expeditionary force, or by defeating the colonies of all the competing European powers by the year 1600.

description.name: FreeCol
description.description: FreeCol是一个回合制策略游戏，是殖民帝国的一个开源版本，玩家可以用从城市采集而来或馈赠的自然资源和欧洲进行贸易。在城市中建立工业将原料加工在贸易中可以获益更多，或者可以维持城市的运作，玩家刚开始会接受来自欧洲祖国的援助，直到殖民地可以自立为止的，并且打败来自祖国的皇家远征军队后即可获得胜利。

description.name: Klavaro
description.description: Klavaro is a typing training and exercising application. It supports custom keyboard layout and can edit or save keyboard layouts. It will arrange lessons from fingering to basic exercise and then speed up to type alphabet. If you got familiar with the keyboard typing, it is very easy to learn Chinese input method and do editing and chat with others.

description.name: Klavaro
description.description: Klavaro是键盘打字指导和练习应用，支持自定义键盘布局，能编辑和保存新的或者未知的键盘布局。从打字的指法教学、基本练习到加快速度均帮你安排好课程，练好英文打字，不管你之后想学哪一种中文输入法，熟练键盘之后，文书编辑、游戏聊天相信都能够得心应手。

description.name: Secret Maryo Chronicles
description.description: Secret Maryo Chronicles is a clearance game and the “Super Mario” in Linux. During the game, you need to collect gold coins and finally reach the end, that's passing the level. smc is a very classic game that requires players to use the brain to finish all clearance tasks with simple game play.

description.name: Secret Maryo Chronicles
description.description: Secret Maryo Chronicles是一款通关游戏，是Linux下的超级玛丽奥。在游戏过程中，您需要收集金币，并且最终到达终点，即可过关。Secret Maryo Chronicles玩法简单，但是需要玩家开动大脑来完成所有的通关任务，是一个非常经典的游戏。

description.name: Gambas
description.description: Gambas is an IDE for Visual Basic development. Its operation and grammar is almost the same with the Visual Basic in Windows platform. It is featured with smart type completion, highlight grammar and component extension. Meanwhile, it supports connection to usual database such as MySQL, PostgreSQL and so on, and is featured with a specialized database management tool.

description.name: Gambas
description.description: Gambas是一个开发Visual Basic的集成开发环境，其操作和语法几乎与Windows平台下的Visual Basic一致，它具有代码自动提示、语法高亮、组件扩展等功能，同时支持常见的MySQL、PostgreSQL数据库连接，并带有一个专门的数据库管理工具。

description.name: Xdemineur
description.description: Xdemineur is a minesweeper game. Players need to find out all non-mine grids without stepping on mines according to figures appeared after clicked on grids in the shortest time. It tests the IQ of players with simple rules and is very suitable for you to relax in the spare time.
description.slogan: There are landmines ahead. Please bypass!

description.name: Xdemineur
description.description: Xdemineur是一款扫雷游戏，玩家需要在最短的时间内根据点击格子出现的数字找出所有非雷格子，同时避免踩雷。Xdemineur考验的是玩家的智商，规则简单明了，非常适合在您休息之余、无聊之时轻松一下。

description.name: Pinta
description.description: Pinta is a cross-platform raster graphics editing software. But it also an easy to use image processing and photo editing software. It's characterized with commonly used drawing tools, multi-layer processing, undo/redo, effect presetting and other functions.

description.name: Pinta
description.description: Pinta是一个跨平台的位图形编辑软件，同时也是易于使用的图像处理和照片编辑的软件，包括常用绘图工具、多层处理、撤销 /重做 、预设效果等功能。

description.name: OpenShot
description.description: OpenShot is a video editing software. It's characterized with video real-time preview, clipping, scaling, trimming and cutting, video composition, image overlay, watermark, stirrer using, digital zoom, video clips, 3D animated title and more other features.
description.slogan: Moving your finger to fall in love with editing.

description.name: OpenShot
description.description: OpenShot是一个视频编辑软件。它支持视频实时预览并剪贴缩放、修剪和切割，还有视频的合成、图像叠加层、水印、使用搅拌机、数码变焦、视频片断以及提供更多的3D动画标题等功能。

description.name: Momo
description.description: In MOMO, you can show yourself by video, text, voice, pictures, geographically find nearby people, join nearby groups, build real, Effective, healthy social relations.
description.slogan: There are always novelty in the side.

description.name: 陌陌
description.description: 陌陌是一款基于地理位置的开放式移动视频社交应用，在MOMO，你可以通过视频、文字、语音、图片来展示自己，基于地理位置发现附近的人，加入附近的群组，建立真实、有效、健康的社交关系。

description.name: SuperTux
description.description: SuperTux is a game similar to the original Super Mario. In the game, the penguin Tux will be controlled to jack the bricks by jumping, then it can eat gold coins or snowballs or flowers, snowballs can make Tux grown, then Tux can shoot bullets after eating flowers.
description.slogan: The more running, the more powerful.

description.name: SuperTux
description.description: SuperTux是一款类似超级马里奥兄弟的游戏，在游戏中控制Tux企鹅通过跳起来顶砖块，吃到金币或雪球或者花，雪球可以使Tux企鹅长大，然后吃到花后可以发子弹。

description.name: Texmaker
description.description: Texmaker is a LaTeX editing environment. It has integrated the required development tools and is very suitable for people who often need to edit LaTeX formulas with many LaTeX documents.

description.name: Texmaker
description.description: Texmaker是一个LaTeX的编辑环境，已经集成了所需的开发工具，包括许多LaTeX文档，非常适合需要经常编辑LaTeX公式的人员。

description.name: Xnp2
description.description: Xnp2 is a PC98 simulator. It can perfectly run all kinds of classic games from Japan PC98 computer.It supports most game ROMs with rich customized function. Xnp2 is easy-to-use and supports files in HDI and FDI formats.

description.name: Xnp2
description.description: Xnp2是一款PC98模拟器，可以完美运行日本PC98电脑上的各种经典游戏。Xnp2支持大多数游戏ROM，定制功能详尽而丰富。xnp2的使用非常简单，可以支持HDI和FDI格式的文件。

description.name: Four in a Row
description.description: Four in a Row is a puzzle board game. Two players take turns to place one marble in any vacant line, the marble will fall to the lowest vacancy of the line. The objective is to build a line of four of your marbles, the line can be horizontal, vertical or diagonal, then you win and end the game.

description.name: Four in a Row
description.description: Four in a Row是一款益智的棋类游戏，两名玩家轮流每次把一只棋子放进棋盘任何未全满的一行中，棋子会占据一行中最底未被占据的位置。玩家玩者任何一方先以四只棋子在横，竖或斜方向连成一条直线，便可获胜，游戏结束。

description.name: Kadu
description.description: Kadu is an IM software using Gadu-Gadu protocol which is compatible with XMPP and can run on platforms that support Qt. Users can use multiple accounts in a single interface. The software has adopted Adium-style chat interface and has builtin plugins for ICQ, AIM, MSN, IRC, Jabber and Yahoo.

description.name: Kadu
description.description: Kadu是一款即时通讯软件，使用Gadu-Gadu协议，与XMPP协议兼容，可以运行在所有支持Qt的平台上，你可以一个界面上使用多个帐号，软件采用了与Adium类似的聊天界面和风格，软件中默认已包含了支持 ICQ、AIM、MSN、IRC、Jabber、Yahoo 的插件。

description.name: Marp
description.description: Marp is a markdown editor, user can compile contents with Markdown grammar, and present as slideshow, it supports exporting as PDF file, there are three previewing modes and two themes for users to select.
description.slogan: Programmers can also write PPT now.

description.name: Marp
description.description: Marp是一款Markdown编辑器，可以用Markdown语法编写内容，以幻灯片的形式展示，支持PDF格式输出，有三种预览模式和两种样式主题可供选择。

description.name: Whatsie
description.description: Whatsie is a non-offcial desktop client of WhatsApp. It is featured with group chat, image & video sending, location sharing, theme switch, spell checking and auto spell correction. It also supports keyboard shortcuts.

description.name: Whatsie
description.description: Whatsie是WhatsApp的桌面客户端，它是一款不隶属于WhatsApp的非官方应用，支持群组聊天、发送图片和视频、位置共享，可以切换主题，带有拼写检查和自动修正功能，支持键盘快捷键。

description.name: Zaz
description.description: Zaz is an entertainment game. Players need to shoot the rolling over ball to the ball string to match 3 balls of the same color to eliminate them in a specified time. Although it is a Zuma clone, it also added a lot of new play mode, new stage and achievement mode.
description.slogan: Zuma clone is also a good game.

description.name: Zaz
description.description: Zaz是一款休闲游戏，玩家需要转动的珠子，从其中抽去一个发射出去，到 3个同色情况会消除，在规定的时间内将所有的彩球消除。虽然这是一个模仿祖玛的游戏，不过它还进行了一些突破，增加了大量新的玩法，增加了一些新的关卡和成就解锁模式。

description.name: Leafpad
description.description: Leafpad is a simple text editor that is very lightweight and characterized with simple operation and quick start. It supports multiple encoding types, including UTF-8, can automatically indent and display line numbers. In addition, it can automatically identify codes to effectively avoid gibberish.

description.name: Leafpad
description.description: Leafpad是一款简易文本编辑器，软件本身十分轻巧，具有操作简单、启动快速的特点。leafpad支持包括UTF-8在内的多种编码类型，可以自动缩进和显示行号。此外，它还可以自动识别编码，有效的避免乱码情况。

description.name: AbiWord
description.description: AbiWord is a full-featured efficient word processing software. It provides a powerful word processing function, and is very suitable for handling documents, letters, reports, memos and other common office documents. It also can be expanded with various plugins to interact with files in other formats.
description.slogan: Write your fun, share joy in life.

description.name: AbiWord
description.description: AbiWord是一款功能完备的高效文字处理软件，提供了强大的文字处理功能，非常适合处理文书、信件、报告、备忘录等常用办公文件，并且可通过各种插件进行扩展，使AbiWord能与其他格式的文件进行交互。

description.name: Web Minefield
description.description: Minefield is a classic mine sweeper. The goal is to recover hidden mines. Digits in the squares indicates the quantity of mines around it, player needs to analyze the location. Left click to clear non-mine square and right click to mark mine square.

description.name: Minefield网页版
description.description: Minefield是一款经典的扫雷游戏，其目的就是找出隐藏的地雷，每个数字块代表它的周围当中有对应的地雷数，需要玩家自行分析地雷位置和数量，左键单击数字块可以清除探明不是雷的地方，右键单击数字块可以探明已知是雷的地方。
description.slogan: 穿越雷区，危险就在身边。

description.name: Mailpile
description.description: Mailpile is a local email client, with built-in PGP encryption support and key management, and ad-free. It needs to be downloaded to local and bind with your current Web email, it will download all the information from your email account to local, then build index after that to allow you to fast search local data. You can send email by the Web mail in Mailpile.

description.name: Mailpile
description.description:
Mailpile是一款本地邮件客户端，内置PGP加密支持和密钥管理，无广告。它需要本地安装并绑定你现有的Web邮箱，将账号内的信息全部下载到本地，下载之后会建立索引允许你快速本地搜索，可以在Mailpile中使用web邮箱发送邮件。
注意：本地服务从终端启动，界面网页运行。

description.name: XnRetro
description.description: XnRetro is a very handy image effect processor. It helps users rapidly create and process images to retro effects. XnRetro provides 20 color effects and 28 exquisite frames. Brightness and contrast are adjustable, vignetting can be set, supports saving and sharing.
description.slogan: Bring you to the vintage style!

description.name: XnRetro
description.description: XnRetro是一款非常好用的图片特效处理软件，它能够帮助用户将照片快速地制作、处理成复古的效果。XnRetro为用户提供了20种颜色效果和28个精美的边框，而且用户还可以调整亮度和对比度，可以设置暗角，还能够支持保存和共享。

description.name: Stellarium
description.description: Stellarium is a virtual planetarium computer software. It's the necessary supporting software for astrophiles to learn knowledge of night sky and observe starry sky. Stellarium has a high-definition picture quality, which can realistically simulate the sky seen by naked eye and binoculars, fabricate various astronomical phenomena and draw various star maps.
description.slogan: Astronomical phenomena is near at hand.

description.name: Stellarium
description.description: Stellarium是一款虚拟星象仪的计算机软件，是天文爱好者学习夜空知识，进行星空观测必备的辅助软件。stellarium拥有高清的画质，可以真实地模拟出肉眼、望远镜所看到的天空、虚拟出各种天文现象，绘制出各种星图等。
description.slogan: 在你的电脑上也可以观测天文现象。

description.name: Okular
description.description: Okular is a PDF document viewer that supports PDF, TIFF, CHM, ODF, EPUB, mobi and other document formats. It can annotate and mark PDF files in various forms. such as annotation, highlighting, drawing, adding bookmarks and so on.

description.name: Okular
description.description: Okular是一个PDF文档阅读软件，支持PDF、TIFF、CHM、ODF、EPUB、mobi等文档格式。Okular可以对PDF文件进行多种标记注解，如批注、高亮、画图、 加入书签等。

description.name: GPicView
description.description: GPicView is a small, simple and fast image viewer. It's characterized with navigation, zoom, rotation, saving and deletion of image viewing and other functions.
description.slogan: All beautiful pictures come to us.

description.name: GPicView
description.description: GPicView是一款小巧、简单、快速的图像查看器，它包含图像查看的导航 、缩放 、旋转 、保存以及删除等功能。

description.name: SpeedCrunch
description.description: SpeedCrunch is a desktop calculator. It supports up to 50 digits of precision and can be fully controlled by keyboard. It can directly calculate math expressions, store variables, and it has builtin math formula calculation. The calculator has functions like auto complete and expression highlight.

description.name: SpeedCrunch
description.description: SpeedCrunch是一款桌面计算器。支持50位小数的精度，可以完全使用键盘控制。 可以直接计算表达式，能够存储变量，内置数学函数，具有自动完成、表达式高亮显示等功能。

description.name: Android Baidu Music
description.description: Baidu Music is a music player that integrated music play, karaoke and live broadcast. It has brand new cool UI, provides Android users with millions of legit music, authoritative billboard, and express delivery of the latest music. Also it is featured with one-click add-to-favorite, voice searching, and DIY music list, all made it easier for Android users to enjoy music!

description.name: 百度音乐安卓版
description.description: 百度音乐是一款集听歌、K歌、直播的音乐播放应用，采用全新的酷炫界面风格，给安卓用户百万首正版歌曲、最权威的音乐榜单和最抢先的新歌速递；还具有一键收藏、语音搜歌、自建歌单功能更让安卓用户便捷的享受听歌的乐趣！

description.name: Room Arrange
description.description: Room Arrange is a real time software to simulate room layout design. It can create a new project to furnish a room or suite, things are free to add, adjust or move. Lots of subjects can be added, including doors/windows, cabinet, desk/chair, bathroom/toilet, bedroom/kitchen, stairs, garden, garage and so on. User can preview existing designs in 3D.
description.slogan: My home played in my hand!

description.name: Room Arranger
description.description: Room Arranger是一款实时的模拟房屋设计布局的软件，它可以新建工程布置一个房间或者套房，可以自由添加、调整或移动。还可以添加多种对象，包括门口和窗户、橱柜、桌子和椅子、浴室以及卫生间、卧室厨房、楼梯、花园、车库等。同时对已有设计以3D方式进行预览。

description.name: Atom
description.description: Atom is an online text editor with simple and intuitionistic graphical interface. It supports CSS, HTML, JavaScript and such webpage programming languages. It supports macro and auto-complete splitting screen with file management and other functions integrated.
description.slogan: A hackable text editor for the 21st Century.

description.name: Atom
description.description: Atom是一个在线文本编辑器，它具有简洁和直观的图形界面，还支持CSS，HTML，JavaScript等网页编程语言，同时具有宏自动完成分屏、集成文件管理器等功能。
description.slogan: 编辑是为了更好的表达。

description.name: VMware Workstation
description.description: VMware Workstation is a desktop virtual machine software. It provides the best solution for users to run different operating systems on a single desktop, and to develop, test and deploy new applications. It can simulate the complete network environment on actual machine or portable virtual machine. It is featured with real-time snapshot, drag & drop folder share, PXE support and other functions.

description.name: VMware Workstation
description.description: VMware Workstation是一款桌面虚拟计算机软件，提供用户在单一的桌面上同时运行不同的操作系统，和进行开发、测试 、部署新的应用程序的最佳解决方案。还可以在实体机器上以及可便于携带的虚拟机器中模拟完整的网络环境，同时还具有实时快照、拖曳共享文件夹、支持 PXE 等功能。
description.slogan: 虚拟的世界，真实的体验。

description.name: Iagno
description.description: Iagno is a reversi game played on 8x8 grid with tiles that are black and white on the two sides. One side can win by flipping as many of your opponent's tiles to your color as possible without your opponent flipping your tiles.

description.name: 黑白棋
description.description: Iagno是一款黑白棋游戏，在8×8的棋盘上，玩家可以扮演黑棋或白棋，通过在对方棋子两侧摆放本方棋子来消除对方，从而让更多的本方棋子保留在棋盘上，获得最终的胜利。

description.name: Moeditor
description.description: Moeditor is a Markdown editor with a minimal style interface. It supports all the basic functions of Markdown and grammar check, user can adjust view, set theme and style, files can be exported as HTML and PDF.

description.name: Moeditor
description.description: Moeditor是一款markdown编辑器，极简风格的界面，支持所有markdown基础功能，可以调整视图，设置主题和样式，支持语法检查，可以将文件导出为HTML和PDF格式。

description.name: Okteta
description.description: Okteta is a hexadecimal editor. Numerical values and characters are displayed in two columns after opened the file. You can edit and operate in the columns of numerical values and characters.
description.slogan: Make you feel free in hex editing.

description.name: Okteta
description.description: Okteta是一款十六进制编辑器，打开文件后数值和字符分别通过两列显示内容。可以在数值和字符列进行编辑和操作。
description.slogan: 让你的十六进制编辑自如。

description.name: NdisWrapper
description.description: NdisWrapper is an open-source drive. It allows the standard wireless network driver under Windows to run in Linux. You can install Windows drive through NdisWrapper configuration tool, but the drive files need to be installed by extracting manually from the file packages.

description.name: NdisWrapper
description.description: NdisWrapper是一个开源的驱动，它能够让Linux使用标准的Windows下的无线网络驱动程序，可以通过NdisWrapper的配置工具进行安装Windows驱动。但驱动文件需要手动从文件包中提取出来安装。

description.name: pyRenamer
description.description: pyRenamer is a batch file rename tool. It supports match mode, find&replace and insert&delete mode. It can also rename the picture by EXIF info or rename the music by ID3 tags.
description.slogan: Batch filename modification in one step.

description.name: pyRenamer
description.description: pyRenamer 是一款文件批量改名工具。支持匹配模式、查找替换、插入删除等方式修改名称。还可以根据照片的 EXIF信息和音乐的ID3标签来更改文件名。
description.slogan: 海量文件名，一次全修改。

description.name: gmusicbrowser
description.description: gmusicbrowser is a music player and management software. It supports mp3, ogg, flac and mpc formats. It includes a tag editor and can do batch file rename; It has a plugin system and now can support last.fm, grab album cover and lyrics from Internet; It can use different interface layout.
description.slogan: It is never too much to have good music.

description.name: gmusicbrowser
description.description: gmusicbrowser 是一款音乐播放及管理软件，支持播放 mp3、ogg、flac、mpc 等音乐文件类型；包含 tag 编辑器，并具有批量文件重命名功能；具有插件系统，目前提供支持 last.fm、抓取专辑封面和歌词等功能；可以使用多种不同的界面布局方案。

description.name: PPSSPP
description.description: PPSSPP is an extraordinary PSP simulator which runs most PSP games smoothly. It supports Chinese, HD and self-adaption resolution, and real time save and read the game. In addition, PPSSPP support handle connecting, perfectly satisfies game players pursuing hand feel and smooth control.

description.name: PPSSPP
description.description: PPSSPP是一款非常出色的PSP模拟器，可以流畅运行大部分的PSP游戏。PPSSPP支持中文，支持高清分辨率以及自适应分辨率，并且支持即时存档和读取存档。除此之外，PPSSPP还支持外接手柄进行游戏，完美满足追求手感和流畅操控的游戏玩家。

description.name: GNU Emacs
description.description: GNU Emacs is an extensible, customizable text editor. And its core is an interpreter for Emacs Lisp, a dialect of the Lisp programming language with extensions to support text editing. It's characterized with various content-sensitive editing modes, complete built-in documentation, full Unicode support for nearly all human languages and their scripts,high customization, a large number of extensions and other functions.
description.slogan: A world of tools at you fingertips.

description.name: GNU Emacs
description.description: GNU Emacs是一个可扩展、定制的文本编辑器，Emacs内置Elisp解释器和热替换机制，具有各种编辑模式、内置文件、全语言以及对应脚本、高度可定制化、丰富的插件管理等功能。
description.slogan: 不仅是文本，更是极客范。

description.name: Shutter
description.description: Shutter is a popular and powerful screen capture software. Users can capture screen at any area on the desktop, specified application window or fullscreen. Meanwhile, after selected the area, its size can be changed by dragging UDLR. Furthermore, Shutter is characterized with image editing functions, including basic selecting, adding text notes and others.
description.slogan: Take a screenshot of your splendidness.

description.name: Shutter
description.description: Shutter是一款广受欢迎的截屏软件，功能十分强大。Shutter可以让您选择桌面的任意区域、指定应用窗口或者整个屏幕区域来进行截屏，同时选定区域之后依然可以通过上下左右拖动来改变选区大小。此外，Shutter也提供了图片的编辑功能，包括基本的选定，添加文字注释等。

description.name: The Powder Toy
description.description: The Powder Toy is a physical sandbox game. It simulates air pressure, speed, heat, gravity and the interaction of all things. The game provides all kinds of materials to construct complicated machines or electronic elements. You can simulate a super cool blast or lay out a complicated robot.

description.name: The Powder Toy
description.description: The Powder Toy是一个款物理沙盘游戏，它可以模拟空气的压力，速度，热，重力和无数的不同物质之间的相互作用，游戏提供各种形态的建材，用以构建复杂的机器或是电子元件，你可以模拟超酷的爆炸或是布线出复杂的机器人。

description.name: Web Hangouts
description.description: Hangouts is a group video chatting tool. With Hangouts you can connect and communicate in the group video meeting room. And you can share your screen by Hangouts to other people, so they can view the contents on your screen.

description.name: 环聊网页版
description.description: 环聊是一款多人视频聊天工具，通过环聊您可以在多用户视频会议室中与同事进行联系和沟通。利用环聊您还可以共享自己的计算机屏幕，让其他人可以看到您的屏幕内容。
description.slogan: 聊天变得更加生动有趣。

description.name: GCompris
description.description: GCompris is a high quality educational software suite for children aged 2 to 10. It offers in excess of 100 activities, including computer discovery, arithmetic, science, geography, games, reading and so on.

description.name: GCompris
description.description: GCompris是一款高品质的教育软件套件，主要是针对2到10岁的儿童，它提供超过100以上的小游戏，其中包含计算机探索、数学运算、科学、地理、游戏、阅读等其他益智教育类游戏。

description.name: Gnote
description.description: Gnote is a notepad with wiki style interface, which is a part of the GNOME desktop environment and mainly used to record temporary personal information. It's very small without too much space needed. gnote is very easy to use and can be easily linked between notes with a lot of formats and features.
description.slogan: Note what's going on in the world anytime.

description.name: Gnote
description.description: Gnote是一款维基风格界面的记事本，它是GNOME桌面环境的一部分，主要用于记录个人的临时信息。Gnote十分小巧，不需要占用太多的空间。它很易用，拥有很多的格式和功能，可以很方便的在笔记间进行链接。

description.name: Steadyflow
description.description: Steadyflow is a simple downloader. It supports all URL protocols such as HTTP, HTTPS, FTP and SMB, etc. Meanwhile it has search, task notification and other functions. Also it supports adding download task by command line.

description.name: Steadyflow
description.description: Steadyflow是一款简单的下载工具，它支持所有URL协议，包括 HTTP、 HTTPS、FTP和SMB等协议，同时还提供了搜索、任务通知等功能，并支持从命令行添加下载任务。

description.name: Haroopad
description.description: Haroopad is a markdown editor under Linux platform. It displays code editing window and preview window on both sides with rich theme styles and syntax highlighting and LaTex mathematical formula supported. It can also export the documents and send them to Tumblr and Evernote by email.
description.slogan: From gedit+Markdown plugin to rich editing.

description.name: Haroopad
description.description: Haroopad是一款Linux平台下的markdown编辑器，它在两侧分别显示代码编辑窗口和预览窗口，具有丰富的主题样式、支持语法高亮显示和LaTex数学公式，还可以导出将文档以邮件形式发送到Tumblr和Evernote。
description.slogan: 丰富你的编辑，告别gedit+Markdown插件。

description.name: AnyDesk
description.description: AnyDesk is a remote desktop controller. It has adopted the underlying technology named DeskRT, integrated advanced video decoder which allows user to have a smooth remote control experience in complicated network environment. AnyDesk supports sound transferring, graphical quality configuring, screenshot, and clipboard synchronization with remote PC.

description.name: AnyDesk
description.description: AnyDesk是一款远程桌面控制应用，它使用名为 DeskRT 的底层技术，内置先进的视频解码器，使得在复杂的网络坏境下依然能让用户体验到流畅的远程桌面控制。AnyDesk支持声音传输、支持画质设置、屏幕截图，还支持与远程电脑同步剪贴板。

description.name: MeituPic for Web
description.description: MeituPic for Web is as easy to use and powerful as MeituPic for PC. You can produce beautiful photos without downloading the software. Massive accessories, frames, scene material and photo effects can be easily used in MeituPic for Web to make your photos magnificent.

description.name: 美图秀秀网页版
description.description: 美图秀秀网页版继承了美图秀秀软件版简单易用，功能强大的特点，让您不用下载也能制作出属于自己的美图。美图秀秀网页版可轻松使用海量的饰品、边框、场景素材以及图片特效等，使您的图片美轮美奂!

description.name: f.lux
description.description: f.lux is a App to auto-adjust the color temperature of the screen. A suitable color temperature range can be preset. In day the color temperature will be below 6500k, at night it will be under 3500k. It can auto-adjust the color temperature on your monitor to filter the blue light which harms human eyes the most. And therefore it reduces the eye tiredness caused by the screen.
description.slogan: Smart color temperature to protect eyes.

description.name: f.lux
description.description: f.lux是一款自动调整屏幕色温亮度的应用，可以预设一个适合的变化色温范围，白天的色温控制在 6500K 以下，晚上的色温控制在 3500K 以上，它能随着一天的时间变化自动调整你电脑显示器屏幕的色温，过滤对人眼伤害最大的蓝光，从而尽可能减少屏幕对眼睛所带来的疲劳感。
description.slogan: 智能感应色温，守护心灵的窗户。

description.name: Discord
description.description: Discord is voice chatting App designed for mobile gamers. With low CPU consumption, it not only supports crystal voice chatting, but also sending of text messages, images and so on. It is easy to access voice chatting channel and group chatting. It supports new message notifying, sharing link to add members to channel, interface displaying at the frontend of the game, and adjusting the volume of particular members.

description.name: Discord
description.description: Discord是一款专为手游玩家提供的语音聊天应用，不仅支持语音聊天功能还能发送文字和图片等信息，CPU占用低，语音聊天非常清晰。可以方便的加入语音频道和团队聊天，带有新消息提醒，可以通过分享链接来轻松将成员添加到频道，界面可以在游戏画面前端调出和显示，可以单独调节特定成员音量。

description.name: Web Microsoft Office
description.description: Microsoft Office Online is a collaborative working platform of office documents. It allows user to create/edit/share doc/excel/ppt by Office Open XML format to share with others and collaborate.

description.name: Microsoft Office 网页版
description.description: Microsoft Office Online是一个办公文档协同工作平台，它可以让用户通过Office Open XML格式在线创建、编辑和共享文档、电子表格和演示文稿，同时也支持用户使用本地Office程序与他人协同处理Office文件。

description.name: Warsow
description.description: Warsow is a first-person shooter game with bright cartoon style. During the game, players need to kill enemies by all resources. The game role reversal, arm extension and future sci -fi scenes will take you to experience the fun of a destroyer.
description.slogan: How does one become a sharpshooter?

description.name: Warsow
description.description: Warsow是一款第一人称射击游戏，游戏风格为明快的卡通风格。游戏中，玩家需要使用一切资源将敌人消灭。游戏包含的角色转换、武器扩展功能以及未来的科幻场景，将带您感受一个破坏者的乐趣。

description.name: Gufw
description.description: Gufw is an Ubuntu built-in firewall UFW graphical management tool that can protect your computer from viruses interference in access to the Internet. Its full Chinese operation interface can easily set the release / stop IP or service, and is very suitable for business computers with higher system completeness requirement to use.
description.slogan: A wall lying prevents others crossing the "fire".

description.name: Gufw
description.description: Gufw是一款防火墙UFW的图形化管理工具，可以保护您的电脑在接入互联网时免受病毒干扰。其全中文的操作界面，可以方便的设置放行/阻止IP或服务，非常适合对系统完全性要求较高的商务电脑使用。
description.slogan: 一墙之隔，防止他人穿越“火线”。

description.name: ICQ
description.description: ICQ is an instant messaging application. It supports online chat, sending messages and files. You can also create your own ICQ homepage, and others can access it when you are online. Meanwhile, it's characterized with sending greeting cards and voice mail by ICQ plugins, sending, forwarding and copying email by ICQ Email and other functions.

description.name: ICQ
description.description: ICQ是一款即时通信应用，它支持网上聊天、发送消息和文件，还可以创建你自己的ICQ主页，当你在线的时候别人就可以访问你的主页，同时具有利用ICQ插件发送贺卡和语音邮件，利用ICQ Email发送、转发和复制电子邮件等功能。

description.name: Web OGS
description.description: OGS is an online Go platform. Players can chat with friends on the platform, sign up for duel and stage matches, create Go group, study and discuss Go game replays, check Go game rankings and so on.
description.slogan: Platform for rookie to become Go master.

description.name: OGS网页版
description.description: OGS是一个网上围棋对战平台，玩家可以在平台上和棋友聊天，参与围棋对抗比赛和阶梯赛，组建围棋群组，研究和讨论棋赛重放，查看棋赛排行榜等。

description.name: Corebird
description.description: Corebird is a third-party desktop client of Twitter. It integrated the main features of Twitter, including Tweets stream, favorites, category, screening, internal search, reminder and other functions.

description.name: Corebird
description.description: Corebird是一个Twitter的第三方桌面客户端，它集成了Twitter主要特性，其中包括Tweets流、收藏夹、 目录、 筛选、 内部搜索、提醒等功能。

description.name: Web Smartisan Notes
description.description: Smartisan Notes is a note application. It not only supports inputting texts, but also supports inserting images to integrate text and graphics. You can also generate the note contents to fine long microblog and share anytime, anywhere. Elegant stationery and fine-tuning layout make contents more enjoyable.
description.slogan: Make you love records and expression.

description.name: 锤子便签网页版
description.description: 锤子便签是一款便签类应用，它不仅可以输入文字，还支持插入图片，进行图文混排。您还可以随时随地将便签内容生成精美的长微博并分享。雅致的信纸、精心调整的排版，令内容更加赏心悦目。

description.name: Shadowsocks-Qt5 (Flatpak)
description.description: Shadowsocks-Qt5 is a Shadowsocks client, it can let your browser access the Internet freely. Shadowsocks-Qt5 supports traffic statistics and server leg test, user can use multiple config file at the same time.

description.name: Shadowsocks-Qt5 (Flatpak)
description.description: Shadowsocks-Qt5是一款Shadowsocks客户端，可以让你的浏览器突破地区限制，自由访问互联网。Shadowsocks-Qt5支持流量统计，支持服务器延迟测试，还可以同时使用多个配置文件。
description.slogan: 海内用影袜，天涯若比邻。

description.name: Gringotts
description.description: Gringotts is a security note management tool that based on libgringotts to let users read and access sensitive data more easily and safely. Users can choose from 8 stronger encryption, 2 hash algorithm or 2 four compression ratio compression. It allows users to set or replaced by code using a whole file or a floppy disk.

description.name: Gringotts
description.description: Gringotts是一款安全笔记管理器。 它基于libgringotts，让用户可更容易且安全的阅读和访问敏感数据。用户可以从八种强加密算法、两种哈希算法和两种具有四压缩比的压缩技术中进行选择。 它允许用户使将任何文件或整个软盘设置密码或者替换为代码。

description.name: PyCharm Community
description.description: PyCharm Community is a Python IDE. Code debugging, syntax highlighting, Project management, jump-to-code, smart hint, auto-completion, unit testing, version controlling and other functions are available. And it supports Google App Engine and IronPython.
description.slogan: Lightweight IDE for Python & Scientific development.

description.name: PyCharm Community
description.description: PyCharm Community是一个Python集成开发环境，它具有代码调试、语法高亮、Project管理、代码跳转、智能提示、自动完成、单元测试、版本控制等功能，同时支持Google App Engine和IronPython。
description.slogan: 轻量级的Python集成开发环境。

description.name: Darktable
description.description: Darktable is a professional photo management and post-processing graphics tool. It provides a virtual Lighttable and darkroom for photographer to manage the digital negatives. You can view and edit the original image by it.

description.name: Darktable
description.description: Darktable是一款专业的照片管理及后期处理的图形工具，它提供摄影师一个虚拟的Lighttable和暗室，用于管理您的数码底片，通过Lighttable 查看原始图像并进行编辑。

description.name: Draftsight
description.description:
Draftsight is a professional 2D CAD software. It can view, edit and create DWG, DXF and DWT files, and export the drawing in PNG, BMP, JPG and PDF formats. 
You need to get a licence to use this software after the evaluation period.

description.name: DraftSight
description.description:
DraftSight是一款专业的2D CAD制图软件，它具有查看、编辑、创建DWG、DXF、DWT文件等功能，还可以把图纸输出成PNG、BMP、JPG、PDF等格式。
该版本需要您自行购买长期使用授权。

description.name: Flowblade Movie Editor
description.description: Flowblade Movie Editor is a multi-track non-linear video editor, it supports all media formats. With it, user can move, add, correct and edit media on time line. It is integrated with powerful video/audio mixer, capable of correct image color and modify audio. And it supports G'MIC.
description.slogan: Editing brings second life for videos.

description.name: Flowblade Movie Editor
description.description: Flowblade Movie Editor 是一个多轨非线性视频编辑器，它支持所有的媒体格式，支持在时间线上对媒体进行移动、添加、修正剪辑等操作，集成强大的图像和音频混合工具，可以校正图像色彩和修改音频，支持G'MIC工具。
description.slogan: 剪辑，给视频赋予第二生命。

description.name: Web Gravit
description.description: Gravit is an online cover designer featured with common designer functions. It can create workspace and select materials to generate images. For saved images, it can search & locate, sort, share & collaborate, and export images. Users can get design ideas from public design materials, designer works and organizations.
description.slogan: Each detail is designed with heart.

description.name: Gravit网页版
description.description: Gravit是一款在线设计封面的工具，它具有设计工具的常用功能。可以自己创建工作区以及从模板中选择素材来生成图片，对已保存的图片，可以搜索定位、文件排序、共享协作处理、导出图片等，还可以通过公共设计素材、设计师作品、组织机构中获取设计灵感。

description.name: PDF-Shuffler
description.description: PDF-Shuffler is a PDF merger and spliter. It can merge several PDF files into one, or split one into several PDF files. And it can delete pages from PDF files.
description.slogan: To merge or to split, it is a decision.

description.name: PDF-Shuffler
description.description: PDF-Shuffler是一个PDF合并及分割工具，它可以把几个PDF文件合并为一个PDF文件，还可以对PDF文件进行分割成几个PDF文件，以及删除PDF文件中的一些页面。
description.slogan: 合并和分割，只在一念之间。

description.name: ManaPlus
description.description: ManaPlus is the official client for the game The mana world. It is also a client for 2D MMO games. Currently it supports Evol Online, The mana world, Land of fire and so on.

description.name: ManaPlus
description.description: ManaPlus是The mana world的官方游戏客户端，它还是一款2D大型在线游戏客户端，当前支持Evol Online, The mana world, Land of fire等游戏。

description.name: qBittorrent
description.description: qBittorrent is a lightweight BitTorrent client. It supports uploading/downloading, DHT network, data exchanging, selective download of files, media file previewing, Unicode, proxy connection, remote control and other functions.

description.name: qBittorrent
description.description: qBittorrent是一个轻量级BitTorrent客户端，它支持文件上传/下载、支持DHT网络、数据交换、文件选择性下载、预览媒体文件、支持Unicode、支持代理连接、远程控制等功能。

description.name: Web Big Farm
description.description: Big Farm is a social game centered on planting. You will be playing a farmer to reclaim land and plant vegetables and fruits, expand your estate, raise more and better animals, and try to become the best farmer.

description.name: 大农场网页版
description.description: Big Farm是一款以种植为主的社交游戏，您可以扮演一个农场主，在自己的农场里开垦土地、种植各种蔬菜和水果，不断地扩建自己的庄园，养殖更多更好的动物，努力使自己成为最大的农场主！

description.name: gFTP
description.description: gFTP is an FTP client. It supports multithread downloading, breakpoints resuming, FTP/HTTP/SSH protocol, FTP/HTTP proxy. Meanwhile, it can download the complete directory, supports file queue, cache, dragging and other operations.

description.name: gFTP
description.description: gFTP是一个FTP客户端工具，它支持多个线程同时下载、断点续传、支持FTP、HTTP和SSH协议、支持FTP和HTTP代理，还可以下载整个目录、支持文件队列、缓存、拖拽等操作。

description.name: RapidSVN
description.description: RapidSVN is a graphical SVN client that runs fast, easy to use, and have strong enough functions to view, diff, update, commit and revert easily for SVN operations.
description.slogan: Of the version control, the simpler the better.

description.name: RapidSVN
description.description: RapidSVN是一款界面化SVN客户端。RapidSVN是一个图形化Subversion客户端，运行速度快，简单易用，同时又保留足够强大的功能，可以很方便地进行查看、比较、更新、提交、回滚等SVN版本控制操作。

description.name: FrostWire
description.description: FrostWire is a free open source P2P file sharing software. It supports internet search and downloading files shared by users, includes movies, photos, games and files. And it has server proxy, firewall penetration, preview file on downloading, download inquiry and such functions.

description.name: FrostWire
description.description: FrostWire是一个P2P文件共享软件，它支持在互联网上搜索、下载用户分享的各种文件，包括视频、照片、游戏、文件等。FrostWire可以直接播放下载的视频，还具有服务器代理、下载询问和预览等功能。

description.name: ARC Welder
description.description: ARC Welder is an extension for Google Chrome and it's provided by Google, Inc. Using ARC Welder, you can install and run Android applications directly in computer's Google Chrome browser.(Failed to start Please try again, temporarily unable to repair, waiting for the official update)

description.name: ARC Welder
description.description: ARC Welder是一款Google Chrome浏览器插件，由谷歌官方出品。使用ARC Welder可以直接在电脑上的谷歌浏览器上安装并运行安卓应用。(启动失败请重启试试，暂时无法修复，等待官方更新)

description.name: Synergy (Flatpak)
description.description: Synergy is a keyboard & mouse sharing software. It allows you to share your keyboard & mouse among multiple computers on desktop. You can copy & cut in one screen then paste in any other screen, all you need to do is to move the mouse pointer out of one screen to another.

description.name: Synergy (Flatpak)
description.description: Synergy是一款键盘鼠标共享软件，允许在你的办公桌上多台计算机之间共享你的鼠标和键盘。通过添加电脑的IP地址并设置起快捷键，在任意屏幕上进行复制、剪切操作都可以在另外一台电脑进行粘贴，只需将鼠标从一台计算机的屏幕边缘移出到另一个屏幕上。

description.name: Pencil
description.description: Pencil is a prototype drawing tool with hand-drawn style. Graphics are as if drawn by hand in paper by Pencil. It can also be used to draw various  architecture diagrams and flow charts. You can export HTML, PNG, Openoffice.org, Word and PDF files by it.

description.name: Pencil
description.description: Pencil是一款手绘风格的原型图绘制工具，使用Pencil绘图就像是在纸上手描图形。Pencil还可以用来绘制各种架构图和流程图，可导出HTML、PNG、Openoffice.org、Word和PDF文件。

description.name: KRuler
description.description: KRuler is a tool for screen resolution rule making and color measurement. The interface is an imitating yellow measurement ruler. You can measure the length between two points on the display screen with optional measurement units.
description.slogan: A quick tool brings you more accurate data!

description.name: KRuler
description.description: KRuler是一款制定屏幕分辨率规则和颜色测量的工具。其界面是一把彷真的黄色计量尺，您可以在显示屏幕上测量某两点间的长度，同时它采用的测量单位是可选的。

description.name: GNOME Twitch
description.description: GNOME Twitch app for watching Twitch on your GNU/Linux desktop. Enjoy your favorite streams without the hassle of flash or the web. Twitch primarily focuses on video gaming, including playthroughs of video games, broadcasts of esports competitions, and more recently, creative content. Content on the site can either be viewed live, or viewed via Video on demand.
description.slogan: A platform for electronic sports fans!

description.name: GNOME Twitch
description.description: GNOME Twitch是一个面向视频游戏的实时流媒体视频平台。在Twitch平台上，视频游戏玩家可以实时地观看其它玩家的游戏情况，是最受游戏玩家欢迎的聚集地，不仅可以在该平台观看到游戏比赛的赛况，还可以从其他玩家那里学习游戏战略。
description.slogan: 电竞游戏玩家的聚集地！

description.name: CodeLite
description.description: CodeLite is a cross-platform IDE in C/C++ programming languages. It has been tested on Windows, Ubuntu and MacOSX. Meanwhile, the use of CodeLite's source code complies with GPL v2 license.
description.slogan: The full-featured and cross-platform C/C++ IDE.

description.name: CodeLite
description.description: CodeLite是一个C/C++编程语言的跨平台IDE，在Windows、Ubuntu和MacOSX各操作系统上均被测试。同时CodeLite的源代码使用是遵循GPL v2许可证的。
description.slogan: 全功能、跨平台的C/C++集成开发环境。

description.name: XAMPP
description.description: XAMPP is an easy to install Apache release with MariaDB, PHP and Perl. XAMPP's open source package makes it easy for installing and using. It has configured to open all its function and it's also free for commercial use.(Service applications, no interface.Uninstall:sudo apt-get remove lampp)

description.name: XAMPP
description.description: XAMPP是一款易于安装的Apache发行版，其中包含MariaDB、PHP和Perl。XAMPP开放源码包的设置让安装和使用出奇容易，XAMPP配置成开启全部功能，即使用于商业用途也是免费的。（服务类应用，无界面，卸载：sudo apt-get remove lampp）

description.name: Nylas Mail
description.description: Nylas Mail is an open source email client that supports plug-in framework and can be extended to create powerful new features. It's compatible with hundreds of email service providers, provides a good application appearance and offline function.

description.name: Nylas Mail
description.description: Nylas Mail是一个开源的邮件客户端，它支持插件框架，可以扩展创建强大的新功能，它兼容上百个邮件服务提供商，提供良好的程序外观并具有离线功能。
description.slogan: 可扩展的下一代邮件平台。

description.name: KShutdown
description.description: KShutDown is a timing shutdown tool. By it you can shut down, restart, lock screen and end the session in specified time for a system. Meanwhile, it's featured with configurable keyboard shortcuts, KDE Kiosk, command line, DCOP and other functions.
description.slogan: Timing shutdown is up to me.

description.name: KShutdown
description.description: KShutDown是一个定时关机工具，使用它你可以在指定的时间实现对于系统的关闭、重启、锁屏、以及结束会话等操作。同时具有可配置的键盘快捷键、KDE Kiosk支持、命令行和DCOP支持等功能。

description.name: Web Pixlr Editor
description.description: Pixlr Editor is an online image-editing tool which is similar to PhotoShop. You can edit photos rapidly, carry out simple image-processing, and easily create exquisite images with Pixlr Editor. Finished images can be saved as JPEG, PNG, BMP or PXD and other formats. It is practical and convenient.

description.name: Pixlr Editor网页版
description.description: Pixlr Editor是一个在线图片编辑工具，与PhotoShop非常相似。借助Pixlr Editor，您可以快速的编辑照片、进行简单的图片处理，轻松的制作出非常精美的图片。做好的图片可以直接儲存成JPEG、PNG、BMP或PXD等格式，相当实用、方便。
description.slogan: 不用下载，不用安装，线上直接绘。

description.name: Einstein
description.description: Einstein is an educational game inspired by Einstein's quiz. The game need to find the correct layout by the given card position's hint to open all the card at the 6x6 square.
description.slogan: Train your brain and test your IQ.

description.name: Einstein
description.description: Einstein是一款益智类游戏，这个游戏是受爱因斯坦的谜题的启发制作的。游戏的目标是通过给出的多个卡位置之间关系的提示，打开所有在6x6方阵上的卡牌，最终找到正确的布局。

description.name: LMMS
description.description: LMMS is a cross-platform music production software favored by the majority of music lovers. You can make music by computers, involving songs creating, rhythms, voice synthesizing and mixing, melody arrangement, etc. In addition, LMMS also integrates a lot of prefabricated instrument.

description.name: LMMS
description.description: LMMS是一款跨平台的音乐制作软件，受到广大音乐制作爱好者的青睐。您可以通过自己的电脑来制作音乐，其中涉及创建歌曲，节奏，合成或混合声音以及编排旋律等，此外，LMMS还集成了许多的预制乐器。
description.slogan: 音乐DIY，让你的音乐突破想象。

description.name: Iris Mini
description.description: Iris Mini is a color temperature adjuster which can automatically adjust the screen color temperature based on the time of the day to ease your eyes. You can set it to auto-mode, which in daytime it will be 6500k of color temperature and 100% brightness, at night, it will be 3400k of color temperature and 80% brightness. You can manually set it to be 3400k of color temperature and 80% brightness at all time.

description.name: Iris Mini
description.description: Iris Mini是一款屏幕色温自动调节工具，可以在电脑上对屏幕进行自动色温调节的工具，根据不同的时间调节不同的屏幕色温，让你的眼睛不那么累。你可以选择自动模式，白天色温6500K，亮度100%；晚上，将改变为3400K和80%亮度。也可以选择手动模式设置3400K和80%亮度的所有时间。

description.name: SubDownloader
description.description: SubDownloader is a video subtitles auto downloader, and it is very easy to use. The download process will be auto launched once you drag a video file and drop into this software. The downloaded subtitle file will be located at the same folder of the video file.
description.slogan: Say goodbye to the movie without subtitles.

description.name: SubDownloader
description.description: SubDownloader 是一款自动视频字幕下载工具，使用方法很简单，把影片拖曳到字幕下载器上，就会自动帮你下载字幕了，下载后的字幕文件和视频文件在同一文件夹中。

description.name: Nemo
description.description: Nemo is a file manager developed based on Files 3.4 code. It has the function of Nautilus file manager, as well as file comparison, preview, sharing and other special functions.

description.name: Nemo
description.description: Nemo是一款文件管理器，基于Files 3.4代码开发，具有Nautilus文件管理器的功能，同时还有文件比较、预览、分享等特有功能。

description.name: apps.com.txsp
description.description: Tengxun Video for Chrome ARC

description.name: 云视听极光（腾讯视频）
description.description: 云视听极光（腾讯视频）是腾讯视频内容授权正版TV端应用，为用户提供丰富正版内容、高清流畅体验、个性贴心服务的基础上，在内容充实、首页界面、会员服务等方面进行了全方位优化，提供海量而精彩的影视内容：从影视剧、综艺、新闻、动漫、体育等热门内容，再到演唱会、纪录片、生活、游戏等几十个细分类目一应俱全。

description.name: SmartSynchronize
description.description: SmartSynchronize is a tool for checking file and comparing directory, it helps compare the difference between two files or two folders. File comparing is able to detect the varieties of the internal line. Directory comparing is able to display the lines of adding, deleting and modifying of each file. Also, it is able to help you merge two varieties of a base file.

description.name: SmartSynchronize
description.description: SmartSynchronize是一款检查文件与目录比较的工具，可以帮助对比两个文件或者两个文件夹的不同之处，文件比较能够检测内部行着色的变化、比较目录并显示每个文件的添加，删除和修改的行数。同时可以帮助您合并一个基本文件的两个独立的变化。

description.name: FBReader
description.description: FBReader is a reader tool which supports formats like ePub, fc2, mobi, rtf and html. users can do online reading or read offline. Using FBReader users can enjoy the reading process by changing the color, fonts, key bindings or other options to fit their needs. Hurry up and enjoy the reading time.

description.name: FBReader
description.description: FBReader是一款阅读器，支持ePub，fb2，mobi，rtf，html文件格式，可以在线或者离线阅读。通过FBReader阅读软件，您可以享受更多的阅读乐趣。您可以根据需要任意设置颜色、字体、按键绑定或者是更改对话框中的其他属性。快来享受掌中阅读的乐趣吧。

description.name: VideoCut
description.description: VideoCut is a video screenshot application, allowing to capture the screen of the current video to save as an image. It supports capturing the picture continuously and set the time span among the capture operations. It is very suitable for people to capture image for movie or TV series.

description.name: VideoCut
description.description: VideoCut是一款视频截图应用，允许你对播放的视频文件进行截屏并保存为图像文件，支持连续截取图片，可以自定义截图之间的时间间隔，对于需要截取电影或者电视剧图片的朋友尤其适用。

description.name: Lutris
description.description: Lutris is a game platform for collecting and managing games. It supports games from almost all the platforms. Lutris supports native Linux games, including commercial games and open source games, and supports Windows games installed by Wine.
description.slogan: Choose any of the massive games to play!

description.name: Lutris
description.description: Lutris是一个游戏平台，可以让您收集和管理游戏，几乎支持所有平台的游戏。Lutris支持原生的Linux游戏，包括商业游戏和开源游戏，也支持用Wine模拟安装的Windows游戏。

description.name: Skype
description.description: Skype is an instant messaging application with video chat, multi-person voice conference, file transfer, text chat and other functions. It allows users to make video calls across platforms, you can make video calls with Skype users in computers, mobile phones, televisions, PSV and other terminals.

description.name: Skype
description.description: Skype是一款即时通讯软件，具备视频聊天、多人语音会议、传送文件、文字聊天等功能。它允许用户进行跨平台的视频呼叫，可与使用电脑、手机、电视、PSV等多种终端的Skype用户进行视频通话。

description.name: Google Earth
description.description: Google Earth is a satellite App which can bring you to anywhere on earth. You can view satellite images, maps, terrains and 3D architectures with it. No matter the grand galaxies in outer space or steep valleys under the ocean, they can all be seen with Google Earth. You can view massive geographic data with it, save locations you have seen and share with others.
description.slogan: Explore the world, go on a virtual trip.

description.name: 谷歌地球
description.description: 谷歌地球是一款卫星地图工具，能带您飞往地球上的任何地方，您可以在上面查看卫星图像、地图、地形和3D建筑。不论是外太空的浩渺星系，还是大洋之下的陡峭峡谷，均可一览无余。您可以尽情浏览丰富的地理资料，保存自己游览过的地点并与他人分享。
description.slogan: 探索世界，踏上虚拟之旅。

description.name: WordMark
description.description: WordMark is a Markdown editor which supports the grammar. It is featured with image uploading, sync rolling & previewing, auto saving, theme switching, multi-format exporting and so on. User can insert images from online gallery, it supports publishing to Wordpress, GitHub, Evernote and other platforms.

description.name: WordMark
description.description: WordMark是一款MarkDown编辑器，支持Markdown语法，具有图片上传，同步滚动预览，自动保存，主题切换，多种格式导出等功能。可以直接使用在线图床插入配图，支持发布到Wordpress、GitHub、Evernote等平台。

description.name: Haguichi
description.description: Haguichi is a P2P file transfer software. It allows user to pass through firewall or NAT, VPN and other network environment. Meanwhile, it can connect to a virtual network group and share files by computers within the group.

description.name: Haguichi
description.description: Haguichi是一款P2P文件传输软件，它能够让使用者穿透防火墙或NAT、VPN 等网路环境，同时还可以连接一个虚拟的网路群组，与群组中的电脑进行文件的分享。

description.name: Code::Blocks
description.description: Code::Blocks is an open-source, free and cross-platform C++ IDE. It has extensible plugin wizard feature, so that you can create your own plugins easily. Code::Blocks is written in C++ (with wxWidgets Library) and bundled with MinGW compiler.

description.name: Code::Blocks
description.description: Code::Blocks是一个开源、免费、跨平台的C++ IDE，具有可扩展插件向导功能，让你很方便的创建自己的插件。Code::Blocks是用C++编写的（用wxWidgets库），捆绑了MinGW编译器。

description.name: Android Letv Video
description.description: Letv Video is a video play App. It has massive movie & TV series resources, supports live broadcasting of many hot TVs, and all-web searching videos from video websites including Youku, PPTV, PPS, Tencent Video, Sohu TV and others. Meanwhile, it's featured wtih unlimited download, TV following, favorite and others, and sign-up is also not requested.
description.slogan: Seize all the wonders with Letv.

description.name: 乐视视频安卓版
description.description: 乐视视频是一款影视播放应用，它拥有海量的电影电视剧资源，支持众多热门电视直播，包括优酷、爱奇艺、PPTV、PPS、腾讯视频、搜狐视频等视频网站的全网搜索。同时具有无需注册，可无限量下载，更有追剧，收藏等功能。

description.name: Foxit Reader
description.description: Foxit Reader is a PDF reader. As the most popular PDF reader, Foxit Reader can fast open, browse, review, annotate, sign and print all PDF files.
description.slogan: The best choice to read PDF documents.

description.name: 福昕阅读器
description.description: 福昕阅读器是一款PDF文档阅读器，对中文的支持度非常高。福昕阅读器作为全球最流行的PDF阅读器，能够快速打开、浏览、审阅、注释、签署及打印任何PDF文件。

description.name: Google Play Music Desktop Player
description.description: Google Play Music Desktop Player is a music player with little computer resource occupation. It supports to customize colors, change the theme, customize shortcut keys, manually select an audio output device, built-in audio equalizer and even multimedia shortcut keys operation, including play, pause, volume up and down.
description.slogan: Listen to the beauty of freedom.

description.name: Google Play Music Desktop Player
description.description: Google Play Music Desktop Player是一款音乐播放器，占用电脑资源极少，支持自定义颜色、更改主题、自定义快捷键、手动选择音频输出设备，内置音频均衡器，甚至还能够支持键盘上的多媒体快捷操作按键，包括播放、暂停和音量增减。

description.name: Poedit
description.description: Poedit is a .Po file editor to convert various programs into Chinese. It can run on all platforms supported with convenient directory editing function.
description.slogan: To help you understand PO files.

description.name: Poedit
description.description: Poedit是一款.Po文件编辑器，用于汉化各种程序，可以在所有它支持的平台上运行，同时提供便捷的编辑目录功能。

description.name: Qsynth
description.description: Qsynth is a fluidsynth GUI front-end application around the Qt framework using Qt Designer. Eventually it may evolve into a softsynth management application allowing the user to control and manage a variety of command line softsynth but for the moment it wraps the excellent FluidSynth. FluidSynth is a command line software synthesiser based on the Soundfont specification.

description.name: Qsynth
description.description: Qsynth是Fluidsynth的GUI前端应用，Fluidsynth是一个基于Soundfont规范的命令行软件合成器。Qsynth是使用 Qt设计器的Qt4工具包来构建的，帮助用户控制和管理softsynth，但现在仅用来包装优秀的Fluidsynth程序。

description.name: Rambox
description.description: Rambox is a messaging and emailing app that combines common web applications into one. It gives you the possibility to add common services many times you need, all in one place. It's perfect for people who work with many services for business and private accounts.
description.slogan: The new way to organize your services.

description.name: Rambox
description.description: Rambox是一款通讯软件聚合应用，Rambox 能够将多款即时通讯工具与 Email 服务聚合在一个应用窗口中，支持多账号和消息同步，使用应用原生的消息提示，还可以设置锁定、免打扰、隐藏到托盘等功能。

description.name: Eye of GNOME
description.description: Eye of GNOME is a image viewer that allows users to view image files in various formats. It supports various image formats, such as BMP, GIF, JPG, PNG, SVG, TIFF, etc. It's also characterized with zooming in/out, slide display, full screen, thumbnail and other functions.
description.slogan: Let's go to the picture world.

description.name: 图像查看器
description.description: 图像查看器是一款图像查看器软件，允许用户查看各种格式的图片文件。它支持多种图片格式，如BMP、GIF、JPG、PNG、SVG、TIFF等，同时也具有放大/缩小、幻灯片显示、全屏、缩略图等功能。

description.name: 4K Strogam
description.description: 4K Strogam is a stream media downloader which can easily download streaming images and videos to desktop, including private resources. You can preview the contents to be downloaded, and prepare slide show with 4K Slide Show Maker.
description.slogan: What you see & hear are what you get.

description.name: 4K Strogam
description.description: 4K Strogam是一款流媒体下载器，该应用可以轻松下载流媒体图片和视频到桌面，包括一些私人账号下的资源，可以直接在应用中预览下载的内容。还可以使用4K Slideshow Maker制作幻灯片。

description.name: SQLiteStudio
description.description: SQLiteStudio is a tools that can help user managing sqlite database. It has fully functional sqlite2 and sqlite3 tools.It supports utf8 view encoding and can open multiple database files at the same time. The software supports viewing and editing binary fields. It supports the following data export formats: csv, html, plain, sql, xml.

description.name: SQLiteStudio
description.description: SQLiteStudio是一款可以帮助用户管理sqlite数据库的工具，该sqlite数据库管理工具具有功能完善的sqlite2和sqlite3工具，视图编码支持utf8，还可以同时打开多个数据库文件，软件支持查看和编辑二进制字段。该软件支持的导出数据格式有csv、html、plain、sql、xml。

description.name: Viewnior
description.description: Viewnior is an image viewer. It includes full screen/slide show view, rotating/flipping/cropping images, animation, setting image as wallpaper, configurable mouse operation and other functions. It's light and elegant.

description.name: Viewnior
description.description: Viewnior是一个图片查看器，其中包括全屏显示/幻灯查看、旋转/翻转/裁剪图像、动画支持、将图像设置为壁纸、可配置鼠标操作等功能。具有轻快、优雅的特点。
description.slogan: 体验图片的每一处细节。

description.name: Android Kanjian Radio
description.description: Kanjian Radio is an independent music media platform. The independent musicians channels include the latest and most independent musicians, collection and perfection of musicians' latest music works. It provides comprehensive online listening, live broadcasting, and video experiencing. Also supports musicians to sell and share their own copyrighted songs.

description.name: 看见音乐安卓版
description.description: 看见音乐是一个独立音乐自媒体平台，独立音乐人频道囊括最新最全的独立音乐人，收集、完善音乐人最新的音乐作品，并提供完善的线上收听、直播、视频体验，支持音乐人对自己的版权歌曲进行售卖和分享。

description.name: Android Weather Master
description.description: Weather Master is a professional weather forecast application. It provides weather conditions of more than 2,400 domestic cities and more than 600 international cities, and multi-day weather forecast. Weather on a number of cities can be added and focused on with various classic desktop plugins, Air Pollution Index and real-time weather warning. It firstly supports voice broadcast and weather alarm clock, temperature trends and common indexes, and related with microblog to share weather.
description.slogan: Let you go out more easy!

description.name: 天气通安卓版
description.description: 天气通是一款专业天气预报应用，支持2400多个国内、600多个国际城市的天气实况、多日天气预报，可以添加并关注多个城市天气，支持多款经典桌面插件，支持空气污染指数、实时天气预警，首创语音播报和天气闹钟，支持温度趋势图和常用指数，并且与微博紧密结合支持天气分享到微博。
description.slogan: 有了天气通，出门更轻松。

description.name: Light Table
description.description: Light Table is a extensible and integrated editing environment. It supports multiple languages, display of code-related document in sidebars, real-time simulating and even calculating process. Users can benefit from its bubble-like arrangement of files to view the interaction between code from different parts.

description.name: Light Table
description.description: Light Table是一款可扩展的集成编辑环境，支持多种编辑语言，可以在侧边栏显示代码相关信息，无需外部查阅文档；能够实时显示代码结果，甚至显示计算过程；可以气泡形式摆放多个代码文件，方便查看代码间的交互。

description.name: Messenger for Desktop
description.description: Messenger for Desktop is a desktop application to receive Facebook messages. It can send and receive text messages, voice messages and emoji. You can also make video calls, take pictures and shoot videos, set up group chat and others. Meanwhile, it can be set to start with the system, message alerts and custom themes.

description.name: Messenger for Desktop
description.description: Messenger for Desktop是一款接收Facebook消息的桌面应用，它可以发送和接收文本信息、语音信息、表情；还可以进行视频通话、拍照和拍摄视频、建立群聊等基本功能。同时可以设置随系统启动，消息提醒、主题自定义等。

description.name: Dropbox
description.description: Dropbox is a practical and free cloud storage software. It supports local use, cloud storage, synchronized operation of multi-platform and image/video easy-sharing. Meanwhile it supports file and document synchronization, backup and sharing.

description.name: Dropbox
description.description: Dropbox是一款实用且免费的云存储软件，它支持本地使用、云端存储、多个平台之间同步操作、图片和视频便捷分享，同时还支持同步、备份或共享文件资料。

description.name: Footnote
description.description: Footnote is a note-taking application with small program size and simple operation. It can help you efficiently take notes and well manage them, also can directly export notes as PDF files.
description.slogan: The more records, the more you get.

description.name: Footnote
description.description: Footnote是一款笔记记录应用，程序小巧、操作简单，可以帮助你高效的做笔记，并且将笔记管理的井井有条，另外还可以直接将笔记导出为PDF文件。
description.slogan: 多一点记录，多一点收获。

description.name: Android Baidu Tieba
description.description: Baidu Tieba is an interactive platform for like-minded people. It gathers people who are interested in the same topic for convenient communication and mutual help. The category includes society, region, living, education, entertainment & celebrity, game, sports, enterprise and so on. It is a free webspace for people to express and exchange ideas, and gathers like-minded netizen.

description.name: 百度贴吧安卓版
description.description: 百度贴吧是以兴趣主题聚合志同道合者的互动平台，让同一个话题感兴趣的人们聚集在一起，方便地展开交流和互相帮助。贴吧目录涵盖社会、地区、生活、教育、娱乐明星、游戏、体育、企业等各方面，它为人们提供一个表达和交流思想的自由网络空间，并以此汇集志同道合的网友。

description.name: NetBeans
description.description: NetBeans is an IDE. It supports PHP, Ruby, JavaScript, Groovy, Grails and C/C++ and other development languages. NetBeans IDE provides rich product documentation and training resources, as well as a large number of third party plugins.

description.name: NetBeans
description.description: NetBeans是一个集成开发环境，它支持PHP、Ruby、JavaScript、Groovy、Grails和C/C++等开发语言。NetBeans集成开发环境提供了丰富的产品文档和培训资源，以及大量的第三方插件。

description.name: IntelliJ IDEA
description.description:
IntelliJ IDEA is a Java language IDE. It's characterized with functions of intelligent editing, code automatic analysis, refactoring, supporting J2EE, Ant and JUnit, rich navigation mode, extended code check, querying historical records and so on.    
You need to get a licence to use this software after the evaluation period.

description.name: IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate
description.description:
IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate是一个Java语言集成开发环境，它具有智能编辑、代码自动分析、重构、支持J2EE、Ant、JUnit、丰富的导航模式、扩展代码检查、查询历史记录等功能。
该版本需要您自行购买长期使用授权。

description.name: Vokoscreen (Flatpak)
description.description: Vokoscreen is an effective and powerful screen recorder. It provides fullscreen, window, customized area and many other recording modes. Vokoscreen has an easy-to-use GUI, user can click the mouse to start recording. Meanwhile, Vokoscreen can synchronously capture videos from camera and supports mkv, avi and other formats.

description.name: Vokoscreen (Flatpak)
description.description: Vokoscreen是一款有效的强大屏幕录制工具，提供全屏，窗口，自定义区域等多个录制模式。Vokoscreen有一个易用的图形化界面，只要点击鼠标就可以进行录制。同时，Vokoscreen可以同步捕获摄像头，支持 mkv 和 avi等格式。
description.slogan: 屏幕录制，就从此刻开始！

description.name: Lazarus
description.description: Lazarus is a Pascal IDE and capable of compiling simple Pascal program. It has a powerful form processing function, good readability and clear interface. Lazarus is easy-to-use, highly compatible with Delphi and easy-to-compile.

description.name: Lazarus
description.description: Lazarus是一个Pascal集成开发环境，它可以编译运行简单的Pascal程序，还具有很强的窗体处理功能，界面清晰，操作简单方便，并且它和Delphi高度兼容，具有可读性好、编写容易等特点。

description.name: Ghex (Flatpak)
description.description: Ghex is a simple binary editor with find and replace functions. It allows users to view binary and ASCII code and to edit binary files. Meanwhile, it can be converted between binary, octal, decimal and hexadecimal values. Users can also edit multiple documents with multiple views.
description.slogan: Hex and ASCII: You can "see" them all.

description.name: Ghex (Flatpak)
description.description: Ghex是一个简单的二进制编辑器。它允许用户查看二进制、ASCII码、编辑二进制文件。包括查找和替换功能，同时可以在二进制、八进制、十进制和十六进制之间进行转换，用户还可以进行多视图多个文件的编辑。
description.slogan: 十六进制和ASCII码，让你鱼与熊掌都可“见”得。

description.name: Web Gmail
description.description: Gmail is a free email service. It provides functions such as email pushing, email searching, checking email bygroups, using multi-user-account, asterisk identification, label and so on.
description.slogan: You can see our dedication in emails.

description.name: Gmail网页版
description.description: Gmail是一款免费的网络邮件服务工具，它提供邮件推送、邮件搜索、根据群组查看邮件、多用户账号使用、星号标识、标签等功能。
description.slogan: 邮件往来，用心你看得见。

description.name: OnlyOffice
description.description: The ONLYOFFICE suite is an open source office suite. It can create templates, insert video from YouTube and do even more. Solution features online document editors, platform for document management, corporate communication, mail and project management tools.

description.name: OnlyOffice
description.description: OnlyOffice 是一款集成了文档、电子邮件、事件、任务和客户关系管理工具的在线办公套件。可以多人同时编辑文本、电子表格或者在浏览器上进行展示。支持评论评论留言，内置聊天工具，可以将文档导出为PDF，还可以浏览文档历史恢复历史版本。

description.name: Qmmp
description.description: Qmmp is a music player. It's developed based on the Qt library with an operating interface similar to winamp and XMMS. It's featured with a beautiful Chinese interface and simple operation, supports equalizer and visual effect, global shortcuts, plug-in management, a variety of music formats, built-in winamp skin and other functions.

description.name: Qmmp
description.description: Qmmp是一款音乐播放应用，基于Qt库开发，类似winamp和xmms的操作界面，具有美观的中文界面，操作简单，支持均衡器和可视化效果、全局快捷键、插件管理、多种音乐格式、自带winamp皮肤等功能。

description.name: Web Youdao Note
description.description: Youdao Note is cloud note software presented by Netease Youdao. It is aimed in helping users to build an cloud note space of easy-access and secure-storage by cloud storage technology. Youdao Note supports multiple attachment formats with 2GB initial free storage space, and can do real-time incremental synchronization. It helps users to carry out better cross-platform and cross-site management of personal data and information.

description.name: 有道云笔记网页版
description.description: 有道云笔记是网易有道推出的云笔记软件，旨在以云存储技术帮助用户建立一个可以轻松访问、安全存储的云笔记空间。有道云笔记支持多种附件格式，拥有2G容量的初始免费存储空间，能够实时增量式同步，方便用户更好的对个人资料和信息进行跨平台跨地点的管理。

description.name: Nixnote
description.description: Nixnote is a third party client of Evernote. It supports sychronizing notes and other data through Evernote account. Meanwhile LaTeX support and beautiful formula in notes are added. It can do all kinds of knowledge documents recording, webpage extracting and other operations.

description.name: Nixnote
description.description: Nixnote是一个Evernote第三方客户端，它支持通过Evernote账户同步你的笔记等各种数据，同时加入对LaTeX的支持，在笔记中加入漂亮的公式，整理记录各种知识文献，摘录网页等操作。

description.name: Konsole
description.description: Konsole is a terminal emulator. It's characterized with the functions of splitting view mode, customizing color scheme and keyboard operation ways, adjusting transparency, multi-tab display, internal search and so on.
description.slogan: We execute all commands you input.

description.name: Konsole
description.description: Konsole是一个终端模拟器，它具有分割检视模式、可定制配色方案、可定制键盘操作方式、调整透明度、多页签显示、内部搜索等功能。
description.slogan: 执行你输入的各种命令。

description.name: DuckieTV
description.description: DuckieTV is a binge-watching tool which shows current playing TV series in calendar. User can download them via utorrent. It also supports downloading and searching subtitles and can be called a one-stop solution for TV series.

description.name: DuckieTV
description.description: DuckieTV（电视剧伴侣应用）是一款国外电视剧追踪工具，以日历的形式显示在播剧，还可以通过 utorrent 下载，并且支持字幕搜索与下载，堪称一站式国外电视剧解决方案。

description.name: Qianqianquege
description.description: Qianqianquege is an online music player with  a lot of online music resources. You can also add local music and create multiple playlists; It not only can browse, search music that users want to listen to, but also play random music in the random mode. It also supports to add friends and chat with listeners.

description.name: 千千阙歌
description.description: 千千阙歌是一款在线音乐播放器，拥有大量的在线音乐资源，也可以添加本地音乐，创建多个播放列表；既可以浏览、搜索想听的音乐，也可以使用随听功能听听随机音乐，同时还支持添加好友和听友聊天功能。

description.name: VMPK (Flatpak)
description.description: VMPK is a virtual MIDI piano keyboard application. It can use virtual MIDI piano keyboard to show and play MIDI note in other devices or MIDI file player. Meanwhile, it can send changed program and controller to MIDI synthesizer, defines different standards for devices. It can also be embedded in web pages, do audio-visual training, composer aids and so on.
description.slogan: Black and white, jumping between fingers.

description.name: VMPK (Flatpak)
description.description: VMPK是一个虚拟MIDI钢琴键盘应用，可以在其他设备或MIDI文件播放器中使用虚拟MIDI钢琴键盘显示播放MIDI音符，同时发送变化的程序和控制器到MIDI合成器中。定义不同的标准提供设备使用。还可以内嵌于网页中、视听训练、作曲辅助等。
description.slogan: 黑与白，手指之间的跳跃。

description.name: X-Moto
description.description: X-Moto is a 2D action adventure game, players should ride motorcycle to conquer all the difficulties and obstacles to collect berries and flowers. You can choose different stage and difficulties to conquer or to see the replay video.

description.name: X-Moto
description.description: X-Moto是一款2D动作闯关类游戏，玩家驾驶摩托车克服所有困难，越过各种障碍，收集路上的浆果和花。可以选择不同的关卡难度来挑战，也可以观看之前的闯关录像。

description.name: aMule (Flatpak)
description.description: aMule is a free open source P2P file-sharing software based xMule and lMule. It supports NETBEUI, IPX/SPX, TCP/IP common protocol, eDonkey and KAD network protocols.

description.name: aMule (Flatpak)
description.description: aMule是一个开源免费的P2P文件共享软件，基于xMule和lMule，它支持NETBEUI、IPX/SPX、TCP/IP常用协议，还支持eDonkey和KAD网络协议。

description.name: Android CBOL Bible
description.description: CBOL Bible is an App related to Bible reading. Besides reading, you can arrange schedule to read designated verses according to reading progress. It is featured with original verses numbering and dictionary, glossary analysis and comments on some Scriptures. Also, you can inquire history column, search for Churches, read published information, discuss online and so on.

description.name: 信望爱圣经工具安卓版
description.description: 信望爱圣经工具是一款阅读圣经相关的应用，除了阅读圣经，可以根据读经进度表安排阅读指定章节，具有原文编号、原文字典、字汇分析、部分经卷注释等功能，还可以查询历史专栏、寻找教会分布、阅读刊登消息、在线讨论等功能。
description.slogan: 去寻找内心深处的灵魂和信仰。

description.name: Unvanquished
description.description: Unvanquished is a real-time strategy shooter. Players can choose from either team, providing for an entirely different experience on both sides, as humans focus on long-range firepower while aliens rely instead on quick movement and stealth. The goal of each match is to destroy the enemy base. Upgrades for both teams are earned by a combination of individual performance and team map control, unlocking access to more powerful weapons and equipment for the humans, and larger, more ferocious forms for the aliens.
description.slogan: Battle royal, wander through the fire.

description.name: Unvanquished
description.description: Unvanquished是一款实时策略元素的射击游戏，玩家可以选择团队，提供双方的一个完全不同的体验，作为人类专注于远程火力而外星人依靠快速运动和隐身。每场比赛的目标是摧毁敌人的基地，通过结合个体绩效和团队地图控制获得升级，解锁更强大的武器和装备来加入战斗。
description.slogan: 枪战王者，一起穿越火线。

description.name: Deluge
description.description: Deluge is a BitTorrent client. It supports plugins management, seed exchanging, download speed limitation, multithread downloading, file preview, download directory selection, queue management and other functions.

description.name: Deluge
description.description: Deluge是一个BitTorrent客户端软件，它支持插件管理、种子交换、下载限速以及多个线程同时下载、文件预览、选择下载目录、队列管理资源等功能。

description.name: Cadencii
description.description: Cadencii is an assistant software for Vocaloid, pocaloid and UTAU. Its main function is to generate MIDI files in SMF format, which are used to interact with domino to facilitate tuning. As an assistant tool, Cadencii can finely combine V1 and V2 with UTAU. It especially perfects the usage of UTAU.

description.name: Cadencii
description.description: Cadencii是Vocaloid、pocaloid及UTAU的辅助软件，主要功能是生成SMF格式的MIDI文件用于与domino交流，方便调音曲线。Cadencii作为辅助工具，可以很好的把V1、V2与UTAU结合在一起，尤其是完善了UTAU的使用。

description.name: Liferea
description.description: Liferea is a RSS news feed reader that can run in background. It can categorize the contents, set update time for a single source and show desktop notifications. It allows users read the content directly at the software and it's compatible with common browsers. It also allows users mark the contents and set the cache size.
description.slogan: Master the latest news in time.

description.name: Liferea
description.description: Liferea是一款rss新闻聚合阅读器，支持后台运行。可以对订阅内容进行分类，设置更新时间，对单个RSS源设置更新时间，桌面提示，允许用户直接在软件中阅读订阅内容，兼容常用浏览器，允许用户标记订阅信息，可自行设置缓存大小。

description.name: VMPK
description.description: VMPK is a virtual MIDI piano keyboard application. It can use virtual MIDI piano keyboard to show and play MIDI note in other devices or MIDI file player. Meanwhile, it can send changed program and controller to MIDI synthesizer, defines different standards for devices. It can also be embedded in web pages, do audio-visual training, composer aids and so on.
description.slogan: Black and white, jumping between fingers.

description.name: VMPK
description.description: VMPK是一个虚拟MIDI钢琴键盘应用，可以在其他设备或MIDI文件播放器中使用虚拟MIDI钢琴键盘显示播放MIDI音符，同时发送变化的程序和控制器到MIDI合成器中。定义不同的标准提供设备使用。还可以内嵌于网页中、视听训练、作曲辅助等。
description.slogan: 黑与白，手指之间的跳跃。

description.name: PulseAudio
description.description: PulseAudio is a sound service that can work through network. It is a proxy for sound applications. When sound data passed through applications and hardwares, it allows to do advanced operations with these sound data. For example, you can transfer the data to other machines, change format, channels, or mix some of the audios.

description.name: PulseAudio
description.description: PulseAudio是一个可通过网络工作的声音服务，声音服务器基本上就是您的声音应用的代理者。当您的音频数据通过您的程序和硬件时，它允许您对音频数据进行高级操作。比如说，把音频传送到别的机器上，改变原始音频的格式或者通道数，以及把几种音频混合在一起。

description.name: Pidgin
description.description: Pidgin is an instant messaging software, which allows you to log in with more than one IM accounts, including QQ, MSN, Yahoo! , IRC, etc. It supports many common network functions, including file transfer, offline state, information input prompt and MSN window close prompt.
description.slogan: The more accounts, the better chat.

description.name: Pidgin
description.description: Pidgin是一款即时通讯软件，它允许您同时使用多个IM账号登录，包括QQ、MSN、Yahoo！、IRC等。Pidgin支持很多常见的网络功能，包括文件传输、离开状态、输入信息提示以及MSN窗口关闭提示。

description.name: IntelliJ IDEA Community
description.description: IntelliJ IDEA Community is a Java language IDE. It's characterized with functions of intelligent editing, code automatic analysis, refactoring, supporting J2EE, Ant and JUnit, rich navigation mode, extended code check, querying historical records and so on.

description.name: IntelliJ IDEA Community
description.description: IntelliJ IDEA Community是一个Java语言集成开发环境，它具有智能编辑、代码自动分析、重构、支持J2EE、Ant、JUnit、丰富的导航模式、扩展代码检查、查询历史记录等功能。

description.name: Shrew Soft VPN
description.description: Shrew Soft VPN client is a IPsec remote access VPN client. It is used for providing VPN for enterprise users and gain compatible with VPN devices of different providers.
description.slogan: Make remote access safe and worry free.

description.name: Shrew Soft VPN
description.description: Shrew Soft VPN client 是一款IPsec远程访问虚拟专用网络客户端。用于提供企业用户在多地访问企业网络的虚拟专用网络，并为许多供应商生产的VPN设备提供兼容性。

description.name: PyChess
