description.description: PyChess is a chess client. Players can choose to compete with computer in easy, medium and high difficulty or log in to the FICS server to play online. It supports screenshot and multiwindow play, or you can open the hints to show the next step hint or to predict the next step of the opponent, or you can withdraw.
description.slogan: Black and white chessboard has human's all intelligent.

description.name: PyChess
description.description: PyChess是一款国际象棋的客户端，可以选择人机对战，有低中高三个难度，可以登录到FICS服务器进行网络对战，支持截图保存，可以同时多开游戏，可以打开提示功能，提示下一步怎么走或者预测对手下一步怎么走，也可以悔棋。

description.name: NdisWrapper
description.description: NdisWrapper is an open-source drive. It allows the standard wireless network driver under Windows to run in Linux. You can install Windows drive through NdisWrapper configuration tool, but the drive files need to be installed by extracting manually from the file packages.

description.name: NdisWrapper
description.description: NdisWrapper是一个开源的驱动，它能够让Linux使用标准的Windows下的无线网络驱动程序，可以通过NdisWrapper的配置工具进行安装Windows驱动。但驱动文件需要手动从文件包中提取出来安装。

description.name: Hex-a-hop
description.description: Hex-a-hop is an educational game, the game needs to control a girl to jump on unstable hexagons to eliminate them(green blocks), and finally stop on a stable blocks. The game will continuously introduce the effect of the special blocks.
description.slogan: Hex block play to show intelligent.

description.name: Hex-a-hop
description.description: Hex-a-hop是一款益智类游戏，游戏中控制一个小姑娘在六边形上跳跃，消除所有不稳定的六边形地块（即绿色地块），最终停留在较稳定地块上，游戏进程中不断介绍各种特殊地块的作用。

description.name: yEd Graph Editor
description.description: yEd Graph Editor is a flow chart drawer which can easily create flow chart, UML chart, intention figure and other types of charts, figures and network structure diagrams. It has abundant built-in materials and tools, supports auto-layout, and can easily import XML, GEDCOM, GML and other file formats. The contents can be saved, printed and exported as many mainstream formats.
description.slogan: Charts and figures always speak better.

description.name: yEd Graph Editor
description.description: yEd Graph Editor是一款流程图绘制工具，可以很方便的创建流程图， UML 图表，意向图以及其它类型的图表，图形和网络结构图。内置丰富的素材和工具，支持自动布局功能，可以轻松导入XML、GEDCOM、GML等格式文件，也可以将内容保存，打印或者导出为多种主流格式。
description.slogan: 用图和表，总能表达得更清晰。

description.name: Tencent QQ Light
description.description: Tencent QQ light Client on Deepin Wine is the light version of Tencent QQ light.

description.name: QQ轻聊版
description.description: QQ轻聊版是中国主流聊天工具的精简版本，该版无插件、无广告，具有抗干扰、轻快、高效等特点，文件收藏、电话会议、文件传输、办公群等实用功能一样不少，再配上更加简洁的聊天界面和全新资料卡，非常适合喜欢简洁高效的用户。

description.name: GVim
description.description: Vim is a text editor developed from vi and gVim is the graphical front-end of Vim. GVim is a cross-platform editor with functions of automatic code completion, compilation and shortcuts operation, errors jumping, input mode switching and so on.
description.slogan: Graphical VIM Chinese editor for programmers.

description.name: GVim
description.description: Vim是从vi发展而来的一个文本编辑器，GVim是Vim的图形前端，它是跨平台的编辑器。它具有代码自动完成、编译及快捷键操作，错误跳转、切换输入模式等功能。
description.slogan: 程序员专属图形化VIM中文编辑器。

description.name: AcetoneISO
description.description: AcetoneISO is a graphical CD/DVD image mounting and management tool which can mount proprietary image formats and formats like ISO, BIN, NRG, MDF and IMG, etc. It can extract contents from images and convert the video to AVI format. It supports converting the image format, encrypting, compressing, splitting and merging images.
description.slogan: Once got an image, I could mount it by virtual drives.

description.name: AcetoneISO
description.description: AcetoneISO 是一款图形化CD/DVD镜像挂载和管理工具。可以挂载专有的镜像格式和ISO, BIN, NRG, MDF, IMG 等等。可以从支持的镜像中提取内容，可以将镜像中的视频转换为AVI格式，支持转换镜像格式，加密、压缩、解压缩镜像，拆分、合并镜像。
description.slogan: 彼有镜像，我用虚拟光驱。

description.name: VLC
description.description: VLC is a free and open source cross-platform multimedia player and framework that supports most audio and video decoders and file formats. You can also play most multimedia files, DVD, Audio CD, VCD and various streaming agreements by it.

description.name: VLC
description.description: VLC是一款自由、开源的跨平台多媒体播放器及框架，它支持大多数的音频与视频解码器及文件格式，还可以播放大多数多媒体文件，以及DVD、音频CD、VCD及各类流媒体协议。

description.name: Emilia Pinball
description.description: Emilia Pinball is a pinball emulation game. Players need to control the 2 paddles at the bottom of the screen to hit the ball up until the ball has fallen from the hole. Although there is only one degree of difficulty, This game is likely to be played forever.
description.slogan: It is a great joy to play pinball!

description.name: Emilia Pinball
description.description: Emilia Pinball是一款弹球模拟游戏，玩家只需要控制屏幕下方的两个力臂控制落下来的小球，尽量让小球弹起，直到小球从空隙中掉走，虽然只有一种难度级别，但是仍然让人上手就停不下来。

description.name: Warzone 2100 (Flatpak)
description.description: Warzone 2100 is a 3D realtime strategy game. The tech tree has 400 more components for players to design various of parts, and to combine them into their own units. During the battle process, players can upgrade their units and buildings, to control the game by the command car and to grab the enemy's advanced technologies. It supports single player and online game.

description.name: 战争地带2100 (Flatpak)
description.description: 战争地带2100是一款3D即时战略游戏，科技树中包含400多种组件，玩家可以自己设计各种零件，然后组装成自己的单位，在战斗过程中升级自己的单位和建筑，通过指挥车总领全局，夺取敌方的先进科技，支持单机任务和联机游戏。

description.name: Eclipse IDE for Java EE Developers
description.description: Eclipse is a cross-platform IDE. This is the installation package customized for Java EE developers. It includes Java IDE, data tools platform, remote system resource manager, Java EE development tools, JavaScript development tools, Git, XML editor, Maven and Mylyn.
description.slogan: Eclipse IDE for Java EE Developers.

description.name: Eclipse IDE for Java EE Developers
description.description: Eclipse是一款跨平台集成开发环境，这是Eclipse为Java EE开发者定制的安装包，其中包括Java集成开发环境、数据工具平台、远程系统资源管理器、Java EE开发工具、JavaScript开发工具、Git客户端、XML编辑器和Maven、Mylyn插件。
description.slogan: Eclipse Java EE集成开发环境。

description.name: Zotero
description.description: Zotero is a document management tool for easy collect, organize, refer and share documents. It can directly grab the title and menu of the online document database webpages and store the information to the database; It can search and manage the category and tab of the documents, and also track the change of the document to auto adjust document order and reference area.

description.name: Zotero
description.description: Zotero是一款文献管理工具，可以帮你更方便的收集、组织、引用和共享文献，能对在线文献数据库网页中的文献题录直接抓取，并将抓取的信息存储在数据库中；可以对文献分类和标签进行文献的搜索与管理；还会跟踪论文中参考文献的变化，自动调整引用文献序号、参考文献区域。

description.name: Artha
description.description: Artha is a convenient dictionary based on WordNet with global shortcut key search, desktop notifications and regular expression based search, etc. Users can select text in any window and press shortcut keys to call Artha and Artha will search the selected text and show the result.

description.name: Artha
description.description: Artha是一款基于WordNet的方便的词典，具有全局热键查找，被动桌面通知，基于正则表达式的搜索等。用户可以在任何窗口上选择文本，然后通过按下设置的热键组合来调用Artha，Artha会使用查找的单词弹出Artha。

description.name: Robocut
description.description: Robocut is an image manipulation program for curving machine to control desktop curving machine or other. It takes a SVG file as input. It can read Inkscape or other program generated SVG files.

description.name: Robocut
description.description: Robocut是一款刻字机图形处理程序，可以用来控制桌面刻字机或者其他类型的刻字机。它需要一个SVG图形文件作为输入，可以读取由Inkscape生成的SVG文件，当然也可以使用其他软件制作的svg文件作为输入。

description.name: CAJViewer
description.description: CAJViewer is a specialized full-text format viewer for CNKI. It supports TEB, CAJ, NH, KDH and PDF formats in CNKI. Meanwhile it can be used to read orginal article online or downloaded article. The printing results is same as the original.
description.slogan: View journals and the whole digital library.

description.name: CAJViewer
description.description: CAJViewer是中国期刊网的专用全文格式浏览器，它支持中国期刊网的TEB、CAJ、NH、KDH和PDF格式文件。同时还可以配合网上原文的阅读，也可以阅读下载后的中国期刊网全文，并且打印效果与原版的效果一致。
description.slogan: 浏览期刊文献，读遍数字图书馆。

description.name: 7-Zip
description.description: 7-Zip is a multi-language archiver, 7z format of extreme-high compression ratio and ZIP/GZIP format of high compression ratio are supported. It is featured with thorough encryption algorithm, file management, command line, package self-release  function. Meanwhile, it's integrated with Windows Explorer and supports Far Manager plugin.

description.name: 7-Zip
description.description: 7-Zip是一款适用于多语言的压缩/解压缩软件，它支持极高压缩比的7z格式以及较高压缩比的ZIP/GZIP格式，提供完善的加密算法、文件管理器、命令行、自释放压缩包功能，同时集成Windows资源管理器，支持Far Manager插件。

description.name: JinChangJiang
description.description: JinChangJiang is a stock exchange software. It can switch freely among multi-interface. Its characteristic is easy-to-use and powerful in transaction. Meanwhile it can display stock fast and facilitate exchange online for users.

description.name: 金长江网上交易财智版
description.description: 金长江网上交易财智版是一款股票证券交易软件，它可以进行多界面自由切换，具备操作简便、交易功能强大的特点，同时它可以快速展示证券行情，方便用户进行网上交易。

description.name: foobar2000
description.description: foobar2000 is a powerful sound processor.It can play high quality audio files. Meanwhile, media library generation, replay gain, media file code transformation,  CD extraction, keyboard shortcuts customization and such.

description.name: foobar2000
description.description: foobar2000是一款功能强大的音频处理工具，它可以播放高质量的音频，同时支持生成媒体库、播放增益、转换媒体文件编码、提取CD和自定义的键盘快捷键等功能。

description.name: 千牛工作台
description.description: 千牛工作台是阿里巴巴官方出品的卖家一站式店铺管理工具，卖家可以通过它发布经营资讯消息、商业伙伴关系，借此提升卖家的经营效率，促进彼此间的合作共赢，让卖家可以更加便捷和高效的管理店铺，让生意游刃有余。

description.name: 千牛工作台
description.description: 千牛工作台是阿里巴巴官方出品的卖家一站式店铺管理工具，卖家可以通过它发布经营资讯消息、商业伙伴关系，借此提升卖家的经营效率，促进彼此间的合作共赢，让卖家可以更加便捷和高效的管理店铺，让生意游刃有余。

description.name: 国泰君安证劵（富易）
description.description: 国泰君安证券（富易）是集行情、资讯、交易、理财、转账、融资、生活为一体的综合理财终端，提供全市场行情一览、多品种交易、资讯数据、实时更新、理财融资和生活转账等功能。

description.name: 国泰君安证劵（富易）
description.description: 国泰君安证券（富易）是集行情、资讯、交易、理财、转账、融资、生活为一体的综合理财终端，提供全市场行情一览、多品种交易、资讯数据、实时更新、理财融资和生活转账等功能。

description.name: AAA Logo
description.description: AAA Logo is a logo designer with more than 2,000 logo subjects and clip-parts. It takes a simple yet powerful way to design professional logos. All built-in logo subjects are vector-based and can be easily resized and rotated, and can apply different styles on any single subject.
description.slogan: Cool design and no more low logos.

description.name: AAA Logo
description.description: AAA Logo是一款Logo设计软件，通过简单而强大的方式设计专业的Logo，其中自带2000多个Logo对象和剪贴画的图库。所有内置Logo对象都是基于矢量的，可以轻易的缩放和旋转，也可以对任意单独对象应用不同的样式。

description.name: 360压缩
description.description: 360压缩是一款解压缩软件，支持解压主流的RAR、ZIP、7Z、ISO等多种压缩文件格式，同时还内置云安全引擎，可以检测木马，更安全，大幅简化了传统软件的繁琐操作。
description.slogan: Large volume comes in small package.

description.name: 360压缩
description.description: 360压缩是一款解压缩软件，支持解压主流的RAR、ZIP、7Z、ISO等多种压缩文件格式，同时还内置云安全引擎，可以检测木马，更安全，大幅简化了传统软件的繁琐操作。

description.name: 企业QQ
description.description:
企业QQ是一个面向中小企业用户的即时通信产品，它基于QQ海量用户平台，提供企业内外部沟通的功能，与此同时还能帮助企业实现有序工作计划和动态的项目管理，保障企业内网络和软件的正常使用。
该版本需要您自行购买长期使用授权。

description.name: 企业QQ
description.description:
企业QQ是一个面向中小企业用户的即时通信产品，它基于QQ海量用户平台，提供企业内外部沟通的功能，与此同时还能帮助企业实现有序工作计划和动态的项目管理，保障企业内网络和软件的正常使用。
该版本需要您自行购买长期使用授权。

description.name: Wavebox
description.description: Wavebox lets you bring all your web tools together for faster, smarter working. Extras provided by your favourite online tools, such as storage, calendars and task management, are all supported.
description.slogan: A new home for your computer desktop

description.name: Wavebox
description.description: Wavebox是一款线上应用整合工具，可以将您喜欢的网络应用整齐的打包到其中，并且很好的支持网络通知，帮您实现更快、更智能的工作需要。

description.name: Web SkyInc
description.description: SkyInc is a weather forecast software based on geographic locations. It can automatically locate to your city. SkyInc can forecast local weather conditions, temperature, moisture, UV intensity and so on based on your geographic location. You can change the background image freely.

description.name: SkyInc网页版
description.description: SkyInc是一款基于地理位置的天气预报软件，它可以自动定位到您所在的城市。SkyInc根据您的地理位置来预报当地的天气情况、温度、湿度、紫外线强度等，同时您还可以自由更换背景图片。
description.slogan: 天气多变幻，实时知冷暖。

description.name: Web Google Map
description.description: Google Maps is a digital map service with partial detailed satellite photos provided by Google. It can provide vector maps containing administrative division, communications and business information, satellite photos in different resolutions and hypsographic displaying terrain.

description.name: 谷歌地图网页版
description.description: 谷歌地图是Google公司提供的电子地图服务，包括局部详细的卫星照片。此款服务可以提供含有政区和交通以及商业信息的矢量地图、不同分辨率的卫星照片和可以用来显示地形和等高线地形视图。

description.name: gPodder
description.description: gPodder is a podcast receiver. It will help managing your podcast RSS and automatically download podcast data. And user can drag URL into podcast, it can automatically receive and download new program.

description.name: gPodder
description.description: gPodder是一款播客接收器，它能够帮助管理您的播客RSS并自动下载播客资料，同时可以拖曳URL到播客中，新节目可以自动接收并下载。
description.slogan: 你的播客，传达到每一处。

description.name: Variety
description.description: Variety is a wallpaper switcher, user is allowed to use local images or automatically downloaded resources. It allows user to auto-switch wallpapers in specified intervals. Also random mottos and clock can be displayed on desktop.

description.name: Variety
description.description: Variety 是一款墙纸更换程序，可以使用本地图片或者自动下载在线的资源，允许用户在一定的时间间隔自动切换墙纸。还可以在桌面显示随机名言和时钟。

description.name: Avidemux
description.description: Avidemux is a free video editor with cutting, filtering and encoding operations. It supports to edit AVI and MPEG files, and can break out sound from files. And it's also characterized with powerful queue task processing and script functions.
description.slogan: Editing life, you are the director.

description.name: Avidemux
description.description: Avidemux是一个免费的视频编辑器，可以进行剪切、过滤和编码等操作。它支持AVI文件、MPEG文件的编辑，并能将声音从文件中分解出来，同时具有强大的队列任务处理和脚本功能。

description.name: Gramps
description.description: Gramps is a professional family tree making application. It can track your family tree and show related events for everyone in graph and texts, such as born place, occupation and images, etc.

description.name: Gramps
description.description: Gramps是一个专业的家庭族谱制作应用，它能够帮您跟踪您的家谱与家族树的关系，将家族中的每个人以图形和文字说明的形式表示列出相关的事件，如出生地点和职业、人像照片等详细信息。

description.name: Tux Typing
description.description: Tux Typing is an educational game that playing with Tux, the Linux penguin. Players need to type to let Tux getting every fish fallen from the top of the screen. As every fish has a letter on their bodies, Tux will catch the fish if you pressed the corresponding letter. The game is aimed at training children, but also provided advanced levels for experts to challenge.

description.name: Tux Typing
description.description: Tux Typing 是一个以 Linux 小企鹅 Tux 为主角的用于打字练习的教育游戏。玩家通 过打字让游戏中的 Tux 接住从屏幕顶部落下的一条条鱼。每条鱼身上都有一个字母， 当玩家按下相应的键时，Tux 会跑到相应的位置将鱼接住吃掉。本游戏意在训练儿童 学习打字，不过也提供了较高难度的级别供熟练打字者进行挑战。

description.name: ChmSee
description.description: ChmSee is a software to read chm help file format under Linux. It well supports Chinese, and currently supports Simple Chinese and English-coded CHM files. ChmSee is characterized with similar tabbed browsing label of Firefox to automatically detect encoding, collect bookmarks, set the font and so on.
description.slogan: Help files, you are my cup of tea!

description.name: ChmSee
description.description: ChmSee是一个在Linux下阅读CHM格式帮助文件的软件，对中文支持良好，目前支持简体和英文编码的CHM文件。chmsee具有与Firefox类似的分页浏览标签，能够自动检测编码，可以收藏书签，以及设置字体等。
description.slogan: 打开帮助文件的正确方式。

description.name: Geary
description.description: Geary is a desktop email client. It has the basic functions such as checking, writing, preview and replying the email. Meanwhile, it supports IMAP protocol, can use other online email services such as Google, Yahoo and Microsoft, etc.
description.slogan: You will have a new view of email.

description.name: Geary
description.description: Geary是一款桌面电子邮件客户端程序，它支持基本的查看和撰写、预览、回复等电子邮件基本功能，同时还支持IMAP协议，可以使用Google, Yahoo和Microsoft等其他在线邮箱服务。

description.name: FreeMind
description.description: FreeMind is a practical mind mapping software that can help you organize your open thinking and chaotic thoughts. It shows themes of all levels in mutually subordinated levels by the graphical and structured idea, which makes workflow more clearer and facilitates the whole team to work more efficiently.

description.name: FreeMind
description.description: FreeMind是一款实用的思维导图软件，它可以用来帮助您整理发散的思维、混乱的思绪。freemind通过将思路图形化、结构化，把各级主题用相互隶属的层级表示出来，工作流程更加清晰，方便整个团队更高效的开展工作。

description.name: Scratch2
description.description: Scratch is designed for children, this freeware multimedia programming tool makes creating animated stories, video games and interactive artwork a snap. Scratch uses a simple graphical interface that lets users put together multimedia programs without any programming knowledge.
description.slogan: Create and share animated stories and games.

description.name: Scratch2
description.description: Scratch是一款由麻省理工学院（MIT） 设计开发的少儿编程工具。使用者可以不认识英文单词，也可以不会使用键盘。构成程序的命令和参数通过积木形状的模块来实现。用鼠标拖动模块到程序编辑栏就可以了。不仅易于孩子们使用，又能寓教于乐，让孩子们获得创作中的乐趣。

description.name: Simplenote
description.description: Simplenote is a plain text note-taking application with multi-platform cloud sync. It can save automatically in real time and  fall back to historical version. It supports Markdown syntax, notes classification and keyword search; you can collaboratively edit by mailing labels and share notes by links.
description.slogan: Write down every little bit of inspiration.

description.name: Simplenote
description.description: Simplenote是一款纯文本笔记记录应用，多平台的云同步，实时自动保存而且可以回退到历史版本，支持Markdown语法、便签分类、关键词搜索，可通过邮件标签多人协作编辑，还可以通过链接分享笔记。

description.name: Xournal
description.description: Xournal is an editor for note-taking and sketching. It can be used to take notes, make marks, draft and draw. Also it can make annotations in PDF.
description.slogan: It's a cinch to edit PDF.

description.name: Xournal
description.description: Xournal是一个书写备忘笔记、草图的编辑工具，可以使用它来做笔记、随手标记、打草稿、画图等，同时还可以给PDF做注解。

description.name: TunesViewer
description.description: TunesViewer is a media and podcast player for iTunes U that can search, browse and download lecture audios and ebooks. It supports iTunes U login, downloading students-and-staff-only media, revealing the standard rss-podcast-feed of the itunes-podcasts and use as a podcast software.

description.name: TunesViewer
description.description: TunesViewer是一款itunesU媒体和博客播放器，可以直接用来搜索、浏览和下载itunesU音频讲座和电子书，支持itunes大学登陆，下载学生和员工专用媒体，显示iTunes播客的标准rss-podcast-feed，用于播客软件。

description.name: CherryTree
description.description: CherryTree is a note-taking software with infinite level classification. It's characterized with rich text, multi-level heading, list, image insertion and other common functions. Also it has other functions such as table embedding, code box embedding, importing and exporting files.

description.name: CherryTree
description.description: CherryTree是一个支持无限层级分类的笔记软件，它支持富文本、多级标题、列表、嵌入图片等常用功能，同时还具有嵌入表格、嵌入代码框、导入和导出等功能。

description.name: StarUML
description.description: StarUML is compatible with UML 2.x standard and supports totally 11 kinds of UML diagrams. You can create Entity-Relationship Diagrams (ERD). It supports many shorthands in Quick Edit to create elements and relationships at once, retina display and major programming languages including Java, C#, and C++.

description.name: StarUML
description.description: StarUML是一款 UML 开发工具，可绘制9款UML图：用例图、类图、序列图、状态图、活动图、通信图、模块图、部署图以及复合结构图等。支持UML2.0定义的大多数图，遵守UML的语法规则，不支持违反语法的动作。支持多种格式的影像文件可导出JPG、JPEG、BMP、EMF和WMF等格式的影像文件。可以依据类图的内容生成Java、C++、C#代码，也能够读取Java、C++、C#代码反向生成类图。

description.name: Fritzing
description.description: Fritzing is an electronic design automation application. It supports the design from physical prototype to more practical product. It is very close to real things and can provide breadboard, prototype diagram and PCB diagram, and generate gerber file for plate making factory. It can also generate PDF, image or CAD format.

description.name: Fritzing
description.description: Fritzing是个电子设计自动化应用。它支持从物理原型到进一步实际的产品设计，非常接近实物，可以提供面包板，原理图，PCB图，而且PCB可以产生制版厂用的gerber文件，还可以产生PDF，图片，CAD格式文件。

description.name: DAEMON Sync
description.description: DAEMON Sync is a tool to backup, sync, share and browse photos or videos within the local wireless network. Share media files between mobile devices with the PC, automatically sync with server in background, when you are connected the same Wi-Fi network. Connect as many tablets and phones as you want and create the super secure cloud service developed especially for your closest ones.

description.name: DAEMON SYNC
description.description: DAEMON SYNC是一款本地文件同步工具，可以免费快速地为你的电脑搭建一个简单的私有云，全自动地将你手机上的照片视频同步备份到电脑的硬盘，无需联网也不会上传，在保证隐私安全的同时也能享受到类似谷歌照片、百度网盘、Dropbox 客户端那样全自动同步的便利。

description.name: QGIS
description.description: QGIS is a user friendly GIS which supports multiple GIS data file format. It supports PostGIS database and can get data from WMS and WFS servers. It has integrated part of the function of Grass and can do basic operation and create map from GIS data. It can extend its function by plugins.

description.name: QGIS
description.description: QGIS是一个用户界面友好的桌面地理信息系统， 支持多种GIS数据文件格式， 支持PostGIS数据库，支持从WMS、WFS服务器中获取数据 ，集成了Grass的部分功能，支持对GIS数据的基本操作，支持创建地图，可以通过插件的形式支持功能的扩展。

description.name: Nextcloud
description.description: Nextcloud redefines Enterprise File Sync and Share, bringing it to the next level with built in collaboration and communication capabilities. It also supports API and plug-in extensions, and users can enhance the features of network drive by installing various plugins such as Markdown editor, note, calendar, task list, music player, document editing, and more.

description.name: Nextcloud
description.description: Nextcloud 是一款专业的私有云存储网盘项目，可以让你简单快速地在个人/公司电脑、服务器甚至是树莓派等设备上架设一套属于自己或团队专属的云同步网盘，从而实现跨平台跨设备文件同步、共享、版本控制、团队协作等功能。Nextcloud 还支持 API 和插件扩展，用户可以通过安装各种插件来增强网盘的功能，比如 Markdown 编辑器、笔记、日历、任务列表、音乐播放器、文档编辑等等。

description.name: NoMachine
description.description: NoMachine is the fastest and highest quality remote desktop you have ever tried. It is your own personal server, private and secure, allows you to enjoy and work on your remote PC, and connect any device to remote PC as it is on the local computer. It makes possible to work anywhere.
description.slogan: Let your desktop travel the world.

description.name: NoMachine
description.description: NoMachine是一款远程连接工具，只需点击几下鼠标，您就可以到达世界上任何一台电脑，并开始对其进行操作，就好像它在您的面前一样。可以远程传输高分辨率的视频和音频流，双向传输文件，在远程桌面上记录任何活动，直观的触摸和控制手势。
description.slogan: 远程电脑照样顺畅使用。

description.name: Go-For-It
description.description: Go-For-It is a to-do list management tool. It combines to-do list management and timer together to let you focus on current tasks and control the task process precisely. User can set finish time, rest time and alert time when adding a to-do item.

description.name: Go-For-It
description.description: Go-For-It是一款待办事项管理工具，它将待办事项管理与定时器合并，让你可以专心聚焦当前任务，并精准的控制任务进度。在添加一个待办时，可以预设完成时间、休息时间、提醒时间。

description.name: FF Multi Converter
description.description: FF Multi Converter is a multifuntional converter. It supports mutual conversion of audio, video, images and other formats. And you can select file presettings for it to automatically fill in the corresponding conversion commands.

description.name: FF Multi Converter
description.description: FF Multi Converter是一个多功能的格式转换工具，它支持音频，视频，图像等格式之间的相互转换，以及选择文件预设，它将自动填充相应的转换命令。
description.slogan: 文件转换，不变的是内容。

description.name: SageMath
description.description: SageMath is a free open-source mathematics software system licensed under the GPL. It builds on top of many existing open-source packages: NumPy, SciPy, matplotlib, Sympy, Maxima, GAP, FLINT, R and many more. Access their combined power through a common, Python-based language or directly via interfaces or wrappers.

description.name: SageMath
description.description: Sage 是一个免费的、开源的数学软件系统，采用GPL协议。它整合了许多开源Python包，采用Python语言编写，但也支持其他语言。它的目标是创造一个可变的开源软件以替代Magma、Maple、Mathematica和Matlab。Sage不仅是一个软件，也是一个编程环境，提供命令行模式、笔记本模式，可以编写编译型程序和解释型程序。
description.slogan: 强大的开源数学软件系统。

description.name: Referencer
description.description: Referencer is a document management tool. It supports smart net link function and to import numerous file from BibTeX libraries. It can classify the documents by tags and can auto retrieve arXiv, PubMed and CrossRef metadata, it also supports using Python to extend its functions.

description.name: Referencer
description.description: Referencer 是一款文献管理工具。支持智能网络链接功能，支持从BibTeX库中导入数目文件，可以使用标签对文档进行分类，可以自动检索arXiv，PubMed和CrossRef元数据，支持使用通用的Python脚本语言扩展。

description.name: Pulseeffects
description.description: Pulseeffects is a limiter, compressor, reverberation, equalizer and auto volume effects for Pulseaudio applications. It is capable of applying effects to both applications output and microphone output.

description.name: PulseEffects
description.description: PulseEffects是一款数字混音器，内置均衡器，限制器，混响和压缩器，可以与默认声音服务器Pulseaudio配合使用。可以让你调整和修改任何应用程序的声音输出，这意味着它可以在浏览器、YouTube和Netflix、Skype聊天、MPV电影中使用处理后的声音，只要Pulseaudio发出声音，PulseEffects就可以让您对其进行微调。

description.name: FontForge
description.description: FontForge is a free font editor which supports many font formats and converts fonts from one format to another. It uses FreeType for rendering fonts on screen, uses libcairo and libpango software libraries for graphics and text rendering, providing anti-aliased graphics and complex text layout support. FontForge can use Potrace or AutoTrace to auto trace bitmap images and import them into a font.

description.name: FontForge
description.description: FontForge是一款向量字型编辑器，能让你製作属于你自己的 postscript、truetype、opentype、cid-keyed、multi-master、cff、svg 及点阵（bdf）字型，或编修现有的字型。同时让你可以在各种字型间做转换。FontForge 支持多种 macintosh 的字型规格。
description.slogan: 亲手创造易读美观的字体。

description.name: QElectroTech
description.description: QElectroTech is a circuit diagram drawing software to help you design electrical schematic diagram. Image marks of various electrical circuits are built-in, you can drag and drop to place the icons simply and intuitively.The quality and efficiency of circuit design has been greatly improved by using qelectrotech to draw circuit diagrams.

description.name: QElectroTech
description.description: QElectroTech是一款电路图绘制软件，旨在帮助您设计电气原理图。qelectrotech已经内置了多种电气电路的图像标志，您可以通过拖拉的方式来放置图标，简单且直观。使用qelectrotech来绘制电路图，将使电路设计的质量和效率得到大大提高。
description.slogan: 绘制电气原理图，模拟真实的电路特性。

description.name: QCad
description.description: QCad is a 2D computer-aided drawing software. It uses AutoCAD DXF file as its standard file format and files can be output in various formats. Users can easily draw engineering drawings, interior design drawings, mechanical drawings and a series of CAD graphics by QCad.
description.slogan: To draw the beauty of 2D world.

description.name: QCad
description.description: QCad是一款2D计算机辅助画图软件，采用AutoCAD DXF文件作为其标准的文件格式，文件能够以多种格式输出。通过QCad用户可以很轻松的绘制工程图、室内设计图、机械图纸等一系列CAD图形。

description.name: BirdFont
description.description: BirdFont is a free font editor. It can create vector graphics and TTF, EOT and SVG fonts, even exclusive personal fonts.

description.name: BirdFont
description.description: BirdFont是一个免费的字体编辑器，它可以创建矢量图形以及TTF、EOT 和 SVG字体，同时还可以创建专属个性字体。

description.name: Eagle
description.description: Eagle is a PCB design and schematic software for every engineer. Includes a complete set of PCB layout and schematic editing tools, library content, and community-driven features. EAGLE provides a multi-window graphical user interface and menu system for editing, project management and to customize the interface and design parameters.

description.name: Eagle
description.description: Eagle是一款印刷电路板设计工具。包括原理图编辑器、PCB编辑器和自动布线器。原理图编辑器、PCB编辑器和元件库编辑器具有相同的用户界面，灵活的用户语言程序（ULP）可以实现自定义功能，例如特定的指令序列、仿真、数据导出和导入等，导出的Gerber文件能够在任何电路板工厂使用。
description.slogan: 电路板绘图布线一步到位。

description.name: OggConvert
description.description: OggConvert is a small practical media conversion tool with multiple media file formats. It can directly drag and drop media files to convert and set the audio/video converting quality.

description.name: OggConvert
description.description: OggConvert是一款小巧实用的媒体转换工具，它可以支持直接拖拽媒体文件进行转换，同时设定音频/视频转换的品质。还支持转换多种媒体文件格式。
description.slogan: 摆脱格式的束缚，“转”出更多可能。

description.name: ScreenRuler
description.description: ScreenRuler is a screen ruler that can measure screen items. It supports pixel, inch, centimeter, millimeter and can freely adjust its length, unit and transparency, it also supports loading images and align with screen edges.
description.slogan: Get the exact dimensions on your screen.

description.name: ScreenRuler
description.description: ScreenRuler 是一款测量屏幕的虚拟尺，它支持的单位有像素、英寸、厘米、毫米，并可以随意调整长度、刻度、透明度，支持加载图像和对齐屏边功能。

description.name: janus-workspace
description.description: Janus Workspace creates a page into a workspace with frames with their own navigation. With it, you can open as many tabs and windows as you like, close and restore as well; change the color of borders, fonts, icons, backgrounds; mute tabs, toggle the resizing way, and move the windows freely. It takes less system resources, and supports all of your favorite shortcuts and more!
description.slogan: Come with everything your browser has!

description.name: Janus Workspace
description.description: Janus Workspace将每个浏览器标签页创建为一个工作区。有了它，您可以打开，关闭或恢复任意多个标签页和窗口; 改变边框，字体，图标，背景的颜色; 静音标签页，调整页面大小，放大或缩小页面，并自由移动窗口。 它占用更少的系统资源，并支持所有常见的快捷方式！

description.name: Web Polarr
description.description: Polarr is a free online image processor, users only need to input the website instead of downloading the software. Polarr provides multiple ways for image editing, it supports high pixel image process, and can directly import RAW files to process.

description.name: 泼辣修图网页版
description.description: 泼辣修图是一款免费在线图像处理软件，用户无需下载该软件，输入网址即可使用。泼辣修图提供多种图像调整方式，支持高像素图像处理，并且可以直接导入RAW文件进行处理等。

description.name: Polarr
description.description: Polarr is an intelligent image processing tool. It's featured with color temperature adjustment, regional hue coefficient, saturation, dynamic clarity, color channel adjustment, color curve and tendency, and other functions. Its purpose is to create a professional-level image processing engine, create the best picture effects by this tool and make your pictures to be with a unique artistic style.
description.slogan: Focus on pictures rather the application.

description.name: 泼辣修图
description.description: Polarr是一个智能图片处理工具，具有色温调整、区域色调系数、饱和度，动态清晰度、色道调整、色彩曲线和倾向等功能，其目的是打造专业级的图片处理引擎，通过该工具来创作最佳的图片效果，让你拍摄的图片拥有独特的艺术风格。
description.slogan: 专注你的照片而非应用。

description.name: MakeHuman
description.description: MakeHuman is a free, open source, interactive modeling tool for creating custom 3D human characters. These characters can be modeled in minutes and can then be used with many other modeling and rendering programs to incorporate realistic human figures into computer generated images and animations. Features that make this software unique include the tetra-parametric GUI© and the Natural Pose System©, for advanced muscular simulation.

description.name: MakeHuman
description.description: MakeHuman是一个开源的3D人物角色建模软件，类似商业软件Poser。完全由python代码编写完成。它基于大量人类学形态特征数据，可以快速形成不同年龄段的男女脸部及肢体模型，并对局部体形进行调整。特有的"自然姿势系统"可对运动中的皮肤和肌腱变形进行精确摸拟。配合RenderMan接口兼容渲染器AQSIS得到最终效果。此软件可适用于人体写生练习、动漫或三维角色动作设计、体育训练人体运动仿真等等领域。

description.name: 4K Video Downloader
description.description: 4K Video Downloader is a online video downloader. It allows downloading videos, playlists, channels and subtitles from YouTube, Facebook, Vimeo and other video sites in high quality. Enjoy your videos anywhere, any time, and of course even when you are offline. Just copy the link from your browser and click 'Paste Link’ in the application. That’s it! Save entire YouTube playlists and channels in MP4, MKV, M4A, MP3, FLV, 3GP.

description.name: 4K Video Downloader
description.description: 4K Video Downloader 是一款在线视频下载器，允许从YouTube、Facebook、Vimeo和其他视频网站下载高质量的视频、播放列表、频道和字幕。支持智能模式，可以预设下载的格式质量信息，支持订阅，可以自动帮你下载订阅的更新内容。

description.name: DBeaver
description.description: DBeaver is a common database management tool and SQL client. It supports MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, DB2, MSSQL, Sybase, Mime, HSQLDB, Derby and other compliant JDBC-database. DBeaver provides a graphical interface to view the database structure, execute SQL query and scripts, view and export data, process BLOB/ CLOB data, modify the database structure and so on.
description.slogan: Only one tip to manage the database.

description.name: DBeaver
description.description: DBeaver是一个通用的数据库管理工具和SQL客户端，支持 MySQL、PostgreSQL、Oracle、 DB2、MSSQL、 Sybase、 Mime、 HSQLDB、Derby以及其他兼容 JDBC 的数据库。DBeaver 提供一个图形界面用来查看数据库结构、执行SQL查询和脚本，浏览和导出数据，处理BLOB/CLOB数据，修改数据库结构等。

description.name: 蜜蜂视频TV版
description.description:
蜜蜂视频是一款集高清免费直播、顶级最新片库为一体的电视、机顶盒必备软件，500+的直播节目、10000+的点播节目和华丽的界面在汇聚类视频软件中一枝独秀。
注：直播功能可能会导致崩溃。

description.name: 蜜蜂视频TV版
description.description:
蜜蜂视频是一款集高清免费直播、顶级最新片库为一体的电视、机顶盒必备软件，500+的直播节目、10000+的点播节目和华丽的界面在汇聚类视频软件中一枝独秀。
注：直播功能可能会导致崩溃。

description.name: Babe Music Player
description.description: Babe Music Player is a local music player. User can play local music file directly, it can download the cover of the album when playing, customize playlist, and make your music to the favorite playlist.

description.name: Babe Music Player
description.description: Babe Music Player是一款本地音乐播放器，可以直接播放本地的音乐文件，播放时可以自动下载音乐的专辑封面，可以自定义播放列表，还可以将喜欢的音乐加入收藏列表。

description.name: Berry
description.description: Berry is a image viewer. It can be controlled both by mouse and touch. The image can be shown in fullscreen, you can rotate, zoom and translate the image. It will show the other image and cached image on the right side, in order to make the viewer more smoothly.

description.name: Berry
description.description: Berry是一款图片查看器，兼容鼠标和触摸控制，可以全屏显示、旋转、缩放和平移图像，会在右侧显示其他图片的缩略图和缓存图片，使看图更加流畅。

description.name: Cmd Markdown
description.description: Cmd Markdown is a markdown editor and reader. It supports live preview and has writing and reading mode, allowing user to store online and share the url of the document. It has editable toolbar and real-time saving data to the cloud, supports offline mode and tag/classification/searching operations.
description.slogan: Enable the outstanding journey of writing.

description.name: Cmd Markdown
description.description: Cmd Markdown是一款MarkDown编辑器，同时也是一个阅读工具，支持实时同步预览，区分写作和阅读模式，支持在线存储和分享文稿网址。可以编辑工具栏，可以实时保存数据到云端，支持离线模式，支持标签/分类/搜索等操作。

description.name: Buka
description.description: Buka is a modern software that helps you manage your ebook at ease. With a simple, clean and straight-forward user interface, Buka aims to gather your ebooks for a reading experience without hassles. It currently supports PDF format with configurations that helps user focus more on the content.

description.name: Buka
description.description: Buka是一款电子书管理应用。 通过简单，干净，直观的用户界面，整理您的电子书提升阅读体验，目前支持PDF格式，可以新建书籍列表，也可按作者分类管理，内置多语种翻译工具。

description.name: Buka (Flatpak)
description.description: Buka is a modern software that helps you manage your ebook at ease. With a simple, clean and straight-forward user interface, Buka aims to gather your ebooks for a reading experience without hassles. It currently supports PDF format with configurations that helps user focus more on the content.

description.name: Buka (Flatpak)
description.description: Buka是一款电子书管理应用。 通过简单，干净，直观的用户界面，整理您的电子书提升阅读体验，目前支持PDF格式，可以新建书籍列表，也可按作者分类管理，内置多语种翻译工具。

description.name: Finetune (Flatpak)
description.description: Finetune is a repairing and arranging tool for music library. It can repair music info like cover, artist, lyrics and delete duplicated or missing songs automatically. Finetune work in an automatic method to correct music info, detect and classify them by voiceprint, then search and match the information in AcoustID database.
description.slogan: A bosom friend for your fine tune.

description.name: Finetune (Flatpak)
description.description: Finetune是一款音乐库修复和整理工具，可以自动修复歌曲信息，封面、艺术家、歌词，删除重复和缺少的曲目。Finetune主要以自动方式工作，可以自动纠正歌曲信息中的错误，并正确的归类，可以通过声纹检测识别歌曲，然后在AcoustID数据库中搜索匹配项。

description.name: QtiPlot (Flatpak)
description.description: QtiPlot is a scientific plotting software with an interface and operating system like Origin. It can be used to produce two-dimensional and three-dimensional data graphs, and featured with curve fitting, fourier transform and such data analysis functions.

description.name: QtiPlot (Flatpak)
description.description: QtiPlot 是一款科学绘图软件，界面、操作系统与Origin类似，可以用于制作二维和三维的数据图表，并具有许多诸如曲线拟合、傅立叶变换这样的数据分析功能。

description.name: Eclipse for Scout Developers
description.description: Eclipse is a cross-platform IDE. This is the installation package customized for Scout developers. It includes Java IDE, Git, XML editor,Maven and Mylyn.

description.name: Eclipse for Scout Developers
description.description: Eclipse是一款跨平台集成开发环境，这是Eclipse为Scout开发者定制的安装包，其中包括Java集成开发环境、Git客户端、XML编辑器和Maven、Mylyn插件。

description.name: Eidete
description.description: Eidete is a screen record tool. It can do fullscreen or area screen record and supports pause and continue record with recording pressed keys and sound. It can also encode the video as WebM format.
description.slogan: Record your operations and share skills.

description.name: Eidete
description.description: Eidete是一款屏幕录制工具，可以全屏录制，也可以选择指定屏幕区域录制，支持暂停和继续录制，录制时可以显示按下的按键，支持录音功能，可以将视频编码为WebM格式。

description.name: Rime
description.description: Rime is a native input method for chinese characters. It suppots Pinyin, Shuangpin, phonetic spelling, Wubi, Cangjie and other codes for input, with extra pinyin support of Minyue and Earth (where input of tones is possible). Several pinyin code of chinese dialect, such as Wu, Yue and ancient chinese are supported as well.
description.slogan: Clever input method understands my thoughts.

description.name: 中州韵输入法引擎
description.description: 中州韵输入法引擎是一款内置特有算法的输入法，一套算法支持了拼音、双拼、注音、五笔、仓颉等所有音码和形码输入法，默认提供了两个拼音输入法朙月拼音和地球拼音，地球拼音还支持声调输入。还支持许多种方言拼音，如吴语、粤语，甚至中古汉语。
description.slogan: 聪明的输入法懂我心意

description.name: Foobnix
description.description: Foobnix is a music player partial to web application and supports Last.fm and other music social websites. In addition, you can find a large number of online music by searching in Foobix. You can play online, and download for local play.

description.name: Foobnix
description.description: Foobnix是一个偏向于网络应用的音乐播放器，可以支持Last.fm等网络音乐社交网站。另外，在Foobnix上您可以通过搜索获取大量的在线音乐，你可以直接在线播放，也可以下载下来进行本地播放。

description.name: Electorrent
description.description: Electorrent is a powerful tool to do remote control and management for uTorrent seeds. Users can manage their torrents by LAN or Internet, it is fit for download fans.
description.slogan: Love the torrent and love to download.

description.name: Electorrent
description.description: Electorrent是一款能够远程控制和管理uTorrent种子的工具，功能强大，可以让我们通过局域网或者互联网远程管理uTorrent的种子，适用于下载爱好者。

description.name: Dingtalk
description.description: Dingtalk is a free and cross-platform application for communication and collaboration in enterprises. It supports file interchange, video conference call, business phone, message stratification, as well as the integrated OA management, network disk and enterprise mail. The unique "ding" function makes the deliverance of message ever faster.

description.name: 钉钉
description.description: 钉钉是专为中国企业打造的免费沟通和协同的跨平台应用，支持文件互传、视频电话会议、商务电话、消息分层，并融合了OA、网盘、企业邮等功能。其独具特色的“ding一下”功能，可让消息传达效率更上一层楼。

description.name: MarkMyWords
description.description: MarkMyWords is a Markdown editor. It supports all basic function of markdown. It also supports live preview, syntax highlighting, grammar check and it can detect the modification of files. Also the files can be exported as HTML and PDF.
description.slogan: Less function, more focus on writing.

description.name: MarkMyWords
description.description: MarkMyWords是一款markdown编辑器，支持所有markdown基础功能，支持实时预览，语法高亮，支持语法检查，可以检测文件的修改，可以将文件导出为HTML和PDF格式。
description.slogan: 功能少，写作反而更专注。

description.name: Navicat
description.description: Navicat is a database management tool designed to simplify the management of database and reduce the cost of system management. Built with an intuitive graphical user interface, you can create, organize, access and share information in a safe and simple way. It helps users easily manage MySQL, MariaDB, SQL Server, SQLite, Oracle and PostgreSQL databases.Note: billing software.

description.name: Navicat
description.description: Navicat是一个的数据库管理工具，专为简化数据库的管理及降低系统管理成本。以直觉化的图形用户界面而建的，让你可以以安全并且简单的方式创建、组织、访问并共用信息。让用户简单地管理 MySQL、MariaDB、SQL Server、SQLite、Oracle 和 PostgreSQL的数据库。注：收费软件。

description.name: Pick
description.description: Pick is a color picking application. It can zoom in every part of the screen to help user pick any pixel quickly and copy its value to clipboard or elsewhere. It will show the source of the color at the left to tell one color from any other and show the color block and its name at the right when picking the color. Pick supports a kind of output sample of some application, it's very applicable for network, mobile or desktop application developing.

description.name: Pick
description.description: Pick是一款颜色拾取应用，它可以方便地放大屏幕的任何部分，帮助我们快速拾取准确像素，并将颜色值信息复制到剪贴板或其它任意地方。拾取颜色的时间会在左侧将颜色的来源截取进 Pick 界面左侧，帮助用户区分颜色来源，并会在右侧显示颜色块，并对颜色进行命名。Pick 支持各种应用程序的输出样本， 非常适用于网络、移动或桌面应用程序开发。

description.name: RStudio
description.description: RStudio is an R language integrated development environment. It provides a lot of image and statistical method and can use the R language to process project and folder from source editor directly. It has a customizable workspace and supports all the tools the R language development needed. It supports syntax highlight and can run code from the source editor. It also supports Sweave and TeX document writing.
description.slogan: Take control of your R code.

description.name: RStudio
description.description: RStudio是一款R语言的一体开发环境，提供大量图像和统计方法，并能够直接从源代码编辑器中使用R程序处理项目和工作文件夹。可定制的工作台，支持所有与R语言开发所需的工具，支持语法高亮，可以直接从源码编辑器执行代码，支持Sweave和TeX文档创作。

description.name: Wonder Reader
description.description: Wonder Reader is a no-frills, modern Electron-based piece of software that allows you to read your favorite CBZ and CBR format comic books within a distraction-free environment. Just download it, unzip its package and launch it via the designated executable file.

description.name: Wonder Reader
description.description: Wonder Reader是一款漫画阅读器，具有典型的WP Merto风格，功能强大，运行流畅稳定。内置多种转码格式，支持分享、同步、订阅，具有独特的图库试阅读功能。

description.name: Lightgallery
description.description: Lightgallery is a modern, electron and nodejs based image viewer. It comes with numerous number of beautiful inbuilt animations, and enable animatedthumbnails option in settings. It allows users to double-click on the image to see its actual size, zoom in and zoom out, and navigate between slides via mouse drag and keyboard arrows.

description.name: Lightgallery
description.description: Lightgallery是一款图片浏览工具，采用全新的图片浏览技术，能够帮助用户智能轻松浏览图片，且支持用户放大、缩小等操作，内置多种精美动画效果，还可以查看缩略图，使用键盘和鼠标控制。

description.name: VK messenger
description.description: VK messenger is a simple and convenient messaging app for VK. It allows you to chat with friends and colleagues, share photos, send documents and voice messages. Community managers can enable messages for groups and public pages. Flexible notification settings allow you to keep in touch with your followers and clients and not miss anything important.
description.slogan: Ideal for communication, effective for work.

description.name: VK messenger
description.description: VK Messenger是一款VK消息应用程序。 它可以让你与朋友和同事聊天，分享照片，发送文件和语音信息。 社区管理员可以为群组和公共页面启用消息。 灵活的通知设置可让您与追随者和客户保持联系，不会错过任何重要的事情。

description.name: Paperwork
description.description: Paperwork is a personal document manager for scanned documents and PDFs. It sorts all your papers by turning them into searchable documents in JPEG, hOCR and PDF; adds colorful labels to your documents and keeps them sorted, and also automatically applies the labels on new documents; synchronizes all the stored files on many computers with tools like Syncthing, SparkleShare, Shared folders, etc. What is more, its features include automatic page orientation detection, quick page editing, and keyword suggestions.
description.slogan: Document management made fast and easy.

description.name: Paperwork
description.description: Paperwork是一款个人文档管理器。它将所有文件转换为JPEG，hOCR和PDF格式的可搜索文档;为您的文档添加彩色标签并保持排序，并自动将标签应用于新文档;使用Syncthing，SparkleShare、Shared folders等工具同步计算机上的所有存储文件。此外，它还包括自动页面方向检测，快速页面编辑和关键字建议等功能。

description.name: BricsCAD
description.description: Bricscad is a powerful CAD platform which featured with fast creation of technical drawings, plans & layouts and annotated designs. It has powerful tool to directly build an actual model, and at the same time maintains the design purpose when imported. DWG can be viewed, annotated and modified real-time in cloud. It can be used in various industries or in the development of third-party applications.

description.name: BricsCAD
description.description: BricsCAD是一个功能强大的CAD平台，具有快速创建技术图纸、平面图和布局、标注设计，使用功能强大的工具来直接实体建模并同时保留了导入时的设计意图。在云端实时查看、标注和修改DWG ，为所有不同行业的领域使用或开发第三方应用程式。

description.name: BricsCAD
description.description: Bricscad is a powerful CAD platform which featured with fast creation of technical drawings, plans & layouts and annotated designs. It has powerful tool to directly build an actual model, and at the same time maintains the design purpose when imported. DWG can be viewed, annotated and modified real-time in cloud. It can be used in various industries or in the development of third-party applications.

description.name: BricsCAD
description.description: BricsCAD是一个功能强大的CAD平台，具有快速创建技术图纸、平面图和布局、标注设计，使用功能强大的工具来直接实体建模并同时保留了导入时的设计意图。在云端实时查看、标注和修改DWG ，为所有不同行业的领域使用或开发第三方应用程式。

description.name: MiniTube
description.description: Minitube is a YouTube desktop client which allows you to surf and watch YouTube on your desktop. Type in your search term and Minitube will suggest some predictions for you to try. Results are returned instantly and you can view videos normally as you would in YouTube.

description.name: MiniTube
description.description: Minitube是一款专用于观看Youtube网络视频的播放软件，允许你浏览、播放 Youtube 视频，而无需登录网站本身。在你进行搜索时，程序会显示与你曾经搜索的关键词相关的视频。双击某个视频便可进行播放。视频会自动在新窗口中播放。录影短片可在紧凑模式在播放，它将占会满整个窗口，全屏模式更适合播放电影或时间较长的视频。
description.slogan: 像看电视一样，观看Youtube视频。

description.name: Edraw MindMaster
description.description: Edraw MindMaster is a multi-functional mind mapping software. It provides effective mind mapping solutions for problem-solving, brainstorming, knowledge management, business planning, note-taking, and project management. Users can enjoy from a wide range of impressive features including user-friendly interface, abundant layout options, exquisite icons and cliparts, high quality preset themes, impo

description.name: 亿图思维导图
description.description: 亿图思维导图是一款多功能的思维导图工具。提供了丰富的智能布局、多样性的展示模式、结合精美的设计元素和预置的主题样式，努力帮用户打造一款真正的效率神器。被广泛应用于解决问题，时间管理，业务战略和项目管理等领域中。

description.name: WeChat
description.description: 微信一款跨平台的通讯工具，支持单人、多人参与，通过手机网络发送语音、图片、表情和文字。

description.name: 微信
description.description: 微信一款跨平台的通讯工具，支持单人、多人参与，通过手机网络发送语音、图片、表情和文字。

description.name: Odoo
description.description:
Odoo is an ERP application for business. It is featured with world-leading module design, open source business mode, abundant integrated function module. It is a unified system which includes CRM, POS, PM, financial management, HRM, IM, production management and procurement management.
Note: After the installation is complete, use the browser to access localhost: 8069.

description.name: Odoo
description.description:
Odoo是一套商业的ERP应用程序，它具有世界领先的模块化设计、完全开源的商业模式、丰富的集成化功能模块，其中包括客户关系管理系统(CRM)、零售管理(POS)、项目管理、财务管理、人力资源管理、库存管理、生产管理、采购管理等一整套统一的系统。
注意：安装完成后，使用浏览器访问localhost:8069。
description.slogan: 化繁为简，重新构想你的业务。

description.name: Feedly
description.description: A popular RSS reader replacing Google Reader. You can import RSS feeds from Google Reader account and customize your RSS feed. You can also save your favourite content during reading and forward it through Twitter or email.

description.name: Feedly
description.description: Feedly是一款RSS阅读器，只要你有一个Google Reader帐户，便可以将其RSS源同步到feedly，应用本身抓取了大量优秀RSS源，你也可以通过Google Reader制定自己的Rss源，阅读过程中你还可以将自己喜欢的内容保存下来，或者通过Twitter、邮箱进行转发。

description.name: Brave
description.description: Brave is a web browser with ad block function, the biggest feature is fast, and it can block all third party tracking cookies, all fingerprint recognition technology and all scripts that trying to inject ads. You can choose to pay or loading anonymous ads for the website when using Brave.
description.slogan: It is great to surfing Internet without ADs!

description.name: Brave
description.description: Brave是一款拦截广告的浏览器，最大的特点是速度快，可以阻止所有第三方追踪的cookies、所有的指纹识别技术、以及所有试图注入广告的脚本”。在使用Brave时你可以选择付费资助网站或者加载匿名用户广告来支持网站。

description.name: Eclipse IDE for Java and DSL
description.description: Eclipse is a cross-platform IDE. This is the installation package customized for Java and DSL developers. It includes Java and Xtext IDE, Xtext, Git, XML editor and Maven.
description.slogan: Eclipse IDE for Java and DSL.

description.name: Eclipse IDE for Java and DSL
description.description: Eclipse是一款跨平台集成开发环境，这是Eclipse为Java 和DSL开发者定制的安装包，其中包括Java和Xtext集成开发环境、Xtext、Git客户端、XML编辑器和Maven插件。

description.name: Eclipse for Testers
description.description: Eclipse is a cross-platform IDE, this is the installation package customized for software testers. It includes Jubula (automatic functional testing tool) and Mylyn.

description.name: Eclipse for Testers
description.description: Eclipse是一款跨平台集成开发环境，这是Eclipse为软件测试人员定制的安装包，其中包括Jubula自动化功能测试工具和Mylyn插件。

description.name: Finetune
description.description: Finetune is a repairing and arranging tool for music library. It can repair music info like cover, artist, lyrics and delete duplicated or missing songs automatically. Finetune work in an automatic method to correct music info, detect and classify them by voiceprint, then search and match the information in AcoustID database.
description.slogan: A bosom friend for your fine tune.

description.name: Finetune
description.description: Finetune是一款音乐库修复和整理工具，可以自动修复歌曲信息，封面、艺术家、歌词，删除重复和缺少的曲目。Finetune主要以自动方式工作，可以自动纠正歌曲信息中的错误，并正确的归类，可以通过声纹检测识别歌曲，然后在AcoustID数据库中搜索匹配项。

description.name: Freeplane
description.description: Freeplane is an application for mind mapping, knowledge management, project management. develop, organize and communicate your ideas and knowledge in the most effective way.

description.name: Freeplane
description.description: Freeplane是一款思维导图制作工具，可以用于知识管理和项目管理，在创建好的思维导图上，用户可以任意调整节点文字的位置，对内容进行梳理、添加结构、图片等操作，是您进行知识管理、项目规划以及制作流程图的好帮手。

description.name: Glyphr
description.description: Glyphr is a vector font editor tool, users can use it to create complex shapes and can do copy paste and turn. All visual operation mode let you create a font easily. Glyphr simplified the process of font design.

description.name: Glyphr
description.description: Glyphr是一款矢量字体编辑器工具，用户可以通过该工具创作复杂的形状、也可以进行复制、粘贴、翻转等操作，完全可视化的操作模式，让你创作字体得心应手，Glyphr简化了字体设计的过程。

description.name: Peek
description.description: Peek is a screen recording tool. You can record the specified area as GIF animation. Record, stop and save is all the process needed. It's very easy and practical.
description.slogan: It is easier to explain in video.

description.name: Peek
description.description: Peek是一款屏幕录制工具，可以将屏幕指定区域录制成GIF动态图，录制，停止，保存三步操作就是它的全部操作了，非常简洁实用。

description.name: PupaFM
description.description: PupaFM an open source douban.fm music desktop player with simple and intuitive interface. It allows you to skip song and create a playlist with your favorite songs.

description.name: PupaFM
description.description: PupaFM是豆瓣FM的桌面版客户端，而豆瓣FM是一款个性化的音乐收听工具。在收听过程中，用户可以用“红心”、“垃圾桶”或者“跳过” 告诉豆瓣FM用户的喜好。它可以根据用户的喜好，自动发现并且播出符合用户音乐口味的歌曲。
description.slogan: 和喜欢的音乐不期而遇。

description.name: Tixati
description.description: Tixati is a BitTorrent tool that supports all kinds of torrents. It has powerful file transferring capacity, bandwidth chart and traffic saving function. It also has visual bandwidth and P2P peers information. Users can move downloaded files to a new destination. It supports DHT, PEX and magnet links.
description.slogan: You can always found a faster node.

description.name: Tixati
description.description: Tixati是一款BT下载工具，支持所有的BT种子，有着强大的文件传输能力，还具有强大的带宽图表和节流能力。拥有可视化的带宽和P2P结点信息，文件正在传输时也可将已下载文件移到新分区中，支持DHT，PEX和磁力链接。

description.name: Uncolored
description.description: Uncolored is a content editor with rich content tools & emoji. It focuses on what you write and allows you to open & save Markdown documents with a WYSIWYG editor. You can start taking notes super fast  and can also customize the themes.

description.name: Uncolored
description.description: Uncolored是一款文本编辑器，采用极简界面设计让你专注于写作，工具栏和菜单自动隐藏在顶部，方便调用。除了支持常规的图文编辑功能，还支持插入流媒体视频和在线音乐，甚至还支持表情包。兼容HTML和Markdown语法，支持自定义主题。

description.name: Xonotic
description.description: Xonotic is an addictive, arena-style first person shooter with crisp movement and a wide array of weapons. It combines intuitive mechanics with in-your-face action to elevate your heart rate. Xonotic has 9 core weapons and 16 full weapons in its armory. Each has a primary fire and a UT-like secondary fire.
description.slogan: The free and fast arena shooter.

description.name: Xonotic
description.description: Xonotic是一款第一人称射击游戏，有着精良的图形建模、种类繁多的武器，玩家可以在游戏中高速移动、漂移式跳跃。在这款游戏中，玩家可以凭借武器射击的爆炸效果所带来的推力，进行水平与垂直方向上的加速。除此之外，Xonotic中的武器在不同的射击模式下有着不同的特性。

description.name: ANGRYsearch
description.description: ANGRYsearch is a file fast searching tool. It provides an easy interface, you can find the file you need in no time, and it's similar to the Everything in Windows. It has two mode: easy mode and full mode. Easy mode only shows the filename and location, and it's very fast. You can also set the search mode as fast, slow and regex mode.
description.slogan: You can find files more easily.

description.name: ANGRYsearch
description.description: ANGRYsearch是一款文件快速搜索工具，它提供了简单的界面，可以瞬间搜索到你需要的文件。类似windows下的软件 Everything 。具有简易模式和完整模式两种，简易模式只显示文件名和地址，但是反应更加迅捷。搜索也可以设置为快速，慢速和正则表达式三种模式。

description.name: Rainlendar
description.description: Rainlendar is a customizable calendar application that is easy to use and doesn't take much space on your PC, but keeps all your important events and tasks always visible on your desktop. With it, you can make your tasks organized, get notifications in advance before the event, easily transfer the events between applications, and custom your favorite skin.

description.name: Rainlendar
description.description: Rainlendar 是一款跨平台桌面日历软件，它的功能是能在桌面上显示一个漂亮的桌面日历及待办事项等等，最为关键的是这款程序点用系统资源非常少。你可以对闹铃设置以及桌面日历皮肤的选择，特别是对高级设置有了很多的功能设置，其中有日期和时间设置、窗口淡入淡出时间、日历事件提示、行程设置等。
description.slogan: 不会错过任何重要的日子。

description.name: Eclipse Modeling Tools
description.description: Eclipse is a cross-platform IDE, this is the installation package customized for code modeling. It includes Java development tool, Eclipse modeling framework, Eclipse plugin development environment, Gti and Mylyn.

description.name: Eclipse Modeling Tools
description.description: Eclipse是一款跨平台集成开发环境，这是Eclipse为代码建模定制安装包，其中包括Java开发工具、Eclipse建模框架、Eclipse插件开发环境、Git客户端和Mylyn插件。
description.slogan: 高效建模，代码更好写了。

description.name: Eclipse for Parallel Application
description.description: Eslipse is a cross-platform IDE, this is the installation package customized for parallel application developers. It includes C/C++ development tools, parallel tool platform, Git, XML editor and Mylyn.

description.name: Eclipse for Parallel Application
description.description: Eclipse是一款跨平台集成开发环境，这是Eclipse为并行应用开发者定制的安装包，其中包括C/C++开发工具、并行工具平台、Git客户端、XML编辑器和Mylyn插件。
description.slogan: Eclipse 并行应用集成开发环境。

description.name: Eclipse for RCP and RAP Developers
description.description: Eclipse is a cross-platform IDE, this is the installation package customized for RCP and RAP. developers. It includes Java IDE, Eclipse plugin development environment, remote system resource manager, Git, XML editor and Maven.

description.name: Eclipse for RCP and RAP Developers
description.description: Eclipse是一款跨平台集成开发环境，这是Eclipse为RCP和RAP开发者定制的安装包，其中包括Java集成开发环境、Eclipse插件开发环境、远程系统资源管理器、Git客户端、XML编辑器和Maven插件。

description.name: Eclipse IDE for Java and Report
description.description: Eclipse is a cross-platform IDE, this is the installation package customized for Java EE and BIRT report developers.  It includes Java IDE, BIRT framework, data tool platform, remote system resource manager, Java EE development tool, JavaScript development tool, Git, XML editor, Maven and Mylyn.
description.slogan: Eclipse IDE for Java and report.

description.name: Eclipse IDE for Java and Report
description.description: Eclipse是一款跨平台集成开发环境，这是Eclipse为Java EE和BIRT报表开发者定制的安装包，其中包括Java集成开发环境、BIRT框架、数据工具平台、远程系统资源管理器、Java EE开发工具、JavaScript开发工具、Git客户端、XML编辑器和Maven、Mylyn插件。
description.slogan: Java EE和报表集成开发环境。

description.name: Keeweb
description.description: Keeweb is a password manager which can store all your password in local or sync to your own cloud services. You are allowed to encrypt your password file by a complex password or a key file. Keeweb has a icon library to classify the password record, user can change, download more icons or import them from your computer to customize theme.

description.name: Keeweb
description.description: Keeweb 是一款密码管理器。它可以离线存储你所有的密码，并且能够同步到你自己的云存储服务上，你可以使用一个复杂的密码加密你的密码文件，也允许你使用一个秘钥文件来锁定密码文件，Keeweb拥有一个图标库，可以分类管理密码记录，可以改变图标的颜色、下载更多的图标，甚至可以直接从你的电脑中导入图标，支持自定义主题。

description.name: MegaGlest
description.description: MegaGlest is a 3D real-time strategy (RTS) game, where you control the armies of one of seven different factions: Tech, Magic, Egypt, Indians, Norsemen, Persian or Romans. A game of MegaGlest takes place on a map of varying size, such as large plains and fields, with terrain features like rivers, mountains, seas, or cliffs. Players must establish settlements to gain energy, food, gold, housing, stone and wood to built their bases, and defend against other players by micro management and strategy matter. It supports up to eight players online.
description.slogan: Who can win in war among seven states.

description.name: MegaGlest
description.description: MegaGlest 是一款3D即时战略游戏，取材于中世纪背景，有七种不同阵营：魔法、科技、埃及人、印度人、古挪威人、波斯人、罗马人，MegaGlest 有多种地图大小，而且有着平原、山脉、河流等多种地形，玩家需要通过获取能源、食品、黄金、石头、木材等多种资源来建设自己的基地，通过微观管理和战略思维来战胜敌人，最多支持8名玩家在线跨平台多人游戏。

description.name: Remarkable
description.description: Remarkable is a Markdown editor. It can live preview and has an easy interface. It supports realtime preview, defining CSS, syntax highlighting and realtime word count. It also supports keyboard shortcuts, you can export the document as PDF and HTML file.

description.name: Remarkable
description.description: Remarkable是一款Markdown编辑器。可以在线预览，有着简洁的用户界面。支持实时预览，支持定义CSS，语法高亮，而且字数实时统计，支持键盘快捷键，可以导出为PDF和HTML。

description.name: Shift
description.description: Shift is an integrated personal email management tool, it aims at helping users do integrated email management quickly. It supports Gmail and Outlook accounts at present. It also supports calendar, netdisk and desktop notifications. Users can also set HTTP proxy to solve network problems.
description.slogan: Easy to use multiple email accounts.

description.name: Shift
description.description: Shift是一款个人电子邮箱集成管理工具，它的主要作用是帮助用户进行快速的集成式的电子邮箱管理，目前仅支持Gmail与Outlook账号，并且同时支持日历与网盘， 支持桌面通知，还可以设置 http 代理，用来解决使用不畅的问题。

description.name: VNote
description.description: VNote is a Markdown note application base on Vim that focused on editing and reading Markdown text and providing comfortable editing experience. It supports adding pictures from clipboard, syntax highlighting, custom style, multiple tabs and split windows. It also supports Mermaid, Flowchart.js and MathJax.
description.slogan: No barriers to edit and read.

description.name: VNote
description.description: VNote 是一款基于VIM的专门为 Markdown笔记应用，专注于Markdown的编辑与阅读，以提供舒适的编辑体验为设计目标。支持直接从剪切板插入图片、代码语法高亮、自定义样式、多标签和窗口分割，支持Mermaid, Flowchart.js 和 MathJax。

description.name: Flail Rider
description.description: Flail Rider is a fast-paced desktop game. Player can drive a race car drawing a flail, and hit everything on the ground with the flail from top to bottom. Besides, the size of the flail can grow. The game is easy to play, colorful, stunning and exciting.

description.name: Flail Rider
description.description: Flail Rider是一款快节奏的桌面游戏，玩家可以驾驶一辆牵引连枷的赛车，自上而下地通过连枷打击一切地面物体，而且连枷的体积还可以变大，游戏操控起来非常简单，画面色彩也很丰富，整个过程令人惊叹刺激。

description.name: Android X Plane
description.description: X Plane is a professional shooter. It has fabulous scenes and cool actions. The more fine graphics will give you unexperienced shock. Players can choose among 4 different fighters, control them to fly through warzone, and destroy enemies in missions.
description.slogan: Let the fighter win the fight.

description.name: X计划安卓版
description.description: X计划是一款专业的射击游戏，华丽的场景，炫酷的动作，更加精细的游戏画面带给你前所未有的震撼，玩家可以选择四架不同实力的战机，同时控制战机穿梭在硝烟弥漫的战场中，摧毁关卡中敌机的进攻。

description.name: Tremulous
description.description: Tremulous is an FPS game with team FPS mode and RTS elements. Players can choose their own race. Players of each race can build constructions like in a RTS mode. Tremulous is currently one of the FPS games with highest online usercount.

description.name: Tremulous
description.description: Tremulous是一款第一人称的射击游戏，包含有团队FPS模式与即时战略元素。玩家可以自行选择自己的种族，每个种族的玩家都可以像即时战略游戏一样在游戏中进行建筑。目前，Tremulous是在线人数最多的第一人称射击游戏之一。
description.slogan: 体验不一样的射击感受。

description.name: Indivisible
description.description: Indivisible is an RPG action game. The player has to play as a girl Ajna with incarnation and integration capabilities to explore the game world; needs to fight with monsters and use her true form to unlock the world puzzles. And she will acquire new capabilities, needs more precise defensive strategy to observe, predict the enemy's attack and defeat the enemy in different environments.

description.name: Indivisible
description.description: Indivisible是一款RPG动作游戏，玩家要操纵一名拥有化身与融合能力的少女Ajna来探索游戏中的世界，需要与怪物进行战斗，要用自己的真正形态去解开世界中的谜题。在游戏中将会加入各种英雄，并获得新的能力，需要更精准的防守策略，观察预判敌人的攻击，在不同的环境下战胜各种敌人。

description.name: 2haohr
description.description: 2haohr is an online human resources management platform for small, medium sized enterprises in China. It adopts the cloud computing + Saas model to help enterprises manage the labor relations (including social security, labor contracts, etc.), remuneration, employee benefits and other issues; help to improve the efficiency of human resources management, do self-help personnel processes, and monitor employment risks, so that enterprises can focus on the main business.

description.name: 2号人事部
description.description: 2号人事部是一款人力资源管理工具，包括员工管理、社保公积金管理、考勤管理、电子工资条、人事仪表盘、员工福利、员工自助服务、用工风险评估等功能模块，可以有效的提高人力资源管理效率。

description.name: Ajenti
description.description: Ajenti is an open source Linux server control panel system, providing you with a fast and secure way to manage a remote Linux box at any time using everyday tools like a web terminal, text editor, file manager and others.
description.slogan: Fast remote access for every occasion.

description.name: Ajenti
description.description: Ajenti是一款基于Web的系统管理控制面板，可用于通过Web浏览器，管理远程系统管理性任务，它提供了快速的、反应灵敏的Web界面，可用于管理小型服务器环境，还最适合虚拟专用服务器（VPS）和专门服务器。（安装后访问https://localhost:8000/）
description.slogan: 快速远程访问每台服务器。

description.name: Albert
description.description: Albert is a unified and efficient access to your machine. Technically it is a keyboard launcher written in C++/Qt. The plugin based architecture makes it extremely flexible and powerful. Plugins can be used to create modular frontends or native extensions. Extensions can also be implemented using embedded Python modules or via a CGI approach in any language you want. The frontends shipped heavily focus on customizability.

description.name: Albert
description.description: Albert 是一款的桌面快捷工具, 可用于执行命令, 查找和打开应用程序、文件，支持文件预览和复制粘贴。支持维基搜索插件，可以执行终端命令，支持强大的扩展功能。

description.name: Allo
description.description: Allo is a native desktop app for Google Allo. You can use your OS's built-in notification system to make sure no message missed. Add it to your taskbar, dock, desktop, or create as many shortcuts as you'd like. Use your favorite browser to start chatting!
description.slogan: Chat on your favorite OS for free!

description.name: Allo
description.description: Allo是一款即时通讯应用，它能让聊天更加生动有趣，还提供多种实用功能。海量贴纸、自带的涂鸦功能以及超大表情符号和文字，让你尽情表达心中所想。Allo 还引入了试用版的 Google 智能助理。

description.name: AllToMP3
description.description: AllToMP3 is a desktop application to download and convert YouTube, SoundCloud, Spotify and Deezer in 256 kb/s MP3, with tags: cover, title, artist, genre, and even lyrics!.
description.slogan: Collect massive online music for you.

description.name: AllToMP3
description.description: AllToMP3网络音乐资源下载和转换工具，可以下载YouTube，SoundCloud，Spotify和Deezer上的音乐到本地，并转换为256 kb / s的MP3格式，还可以下载音乐的与标签：封面，标题，艺术家，流派，甚至歌词！

description.name: Ao
description.description: Ao is a desktop to-do-list tool. Shortcuts supported, you can also customize shortcuts and themes, adjust the window size and display mode with list management and task search functions.

description.name: Ao
description.description: Ao是一款桌面待办记录工具，可以用来排列你的待办事项清单，支持快捷键操作，也可以自定义快捷键，可以自定义主题，调整窗口大小和显示模式。支持清单管理和任务搜索功能。

description.name: Aptana Studio
description.description: Aptana Studio is a professional, open source development tool for the open web. It supports developing and testing your entire web application using a single environment, the latest browser technology specs such as HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Ruby, Rails, PHP and Python, and provides deployment wizard, integrated debugger, git integration, built-in terminal, and IDE customization.

description.name: Aptana Studio
description.description: Aptana Studio 是一个集成式的Web应用程序开发环境，它不仅可以作为独立的程序运行，而且还可以作为Eclipse插件使用。其最广为人知的是它非常强悍的JavaScript编辑器和调试器。AptanaStudio可以支持多种AJAX和JavaScript工具箱，包括JavaScript编辑和调试。此外，Aptana还吸收了Radrails项目，添加了非常强大的RubyonRails支持。
description.slogan: 强悍的JS编辑器和调试器。

description.name: Aptik
description.description: Aptik is a simple utility to backup and store software packages, application settings, PPA, icons and themes after upgrading/re-installing Ubuntu-based distributions.
description.slogan: Backup app and theme in Linux.

description.name: Aptik
description.description: Aptik 是一款软件包安装和备份工具。用户可以选择确切的包，PPA，软件，图标和主题进行备份，需要的时候可以一键恢复你的软件和主题包。

description.name: Archimedes
description.description: Archimedes is a free open source CAD software developed with architects based on Eclipse, supporting trimming, filleting, area measurement, autosave, and exporting in SVG and PDF.

description.name: Archimedes
description.description: Archimedes是一款基于eclipse开发的CAD（计算机辅助设计）应用，适合学生和建筑师。支持商用CAD系统中的大部分绘制功能，支持自动保存，可以导出SVG和PDF格式的文件。

description.name: Auryo
description.description: Auryo is a Soundcloud desktop client with keyboard shortcuts and MPRIS integration. You can play, pause and skip tracks by shortcuts. It supports playlist management, track search, hidden play.

description.name: Auryo
description.description: Auryo是一款Soundcloud桌面客户端，具有键盘快捷键支持和MPRIS集成，您可以使用键盘播放，暂停和跳过曲目。支持播放列表管理和曲目搜索功能，可以隐藏到后台播放。
description.slogan: 用音乐带动工作的节奏。

description.name: Bookworm
description.description: Bookworm is an e-book reader that can be used to read your favorite books in EPUB, PDF, comic (CBR and CBZ) format and other formats. It supports list management to sort and search books, provides 3 background colors for selection. You can skip to contents by bookmarks, chapters or search, and it also supports custom settings and theme switch.

description.name: Bookworm
description.description: Bookworm是一款电子书阅读器，可以用来阅读您喜爱的书籍，支持EPUB，PDF和漫画（CBR和CBZ）格式，支持更多格式。支持列表管理，可以排序和搜索图书，提供3种背景颜色选择，可以使用书签或章节来跳转内容，也可通过搜索跳转，支持自定义设置和主题切换。

description.name: Bitwig Studio
description.description: Bitwig Studio is a multi-platform music-creation system for production, performance and DJing, with a focus on flexible editing tools and a super-fast workflow. It comes loaded with industry-standard to industry-leading features, designed to meet the demands of present day musicians, producers and sound designers.

description.name: Bitwig Studio
description.description: Bitwig Studio 是一款音乐创作工具，提供了艺术级的音频引擎，带有完整的多处理支持，统一的调制系统，32/64-位 VST 插件桥接，以及 VST 插件崩溃保护。包含超过 50 个设备。常规乐器和效果，以及 Container设备，Note FX（音符效果）和 Modulator（调制）设备。

description.name: Boomaga
description.description: Boomaga is a virtual printer for viewing a document before printing it out using the physical printer, and help you get your documents prepared a bit before printing.

description.name: Boomaga
description.description: Boomaga是一款虚拟打印机，用于在使用物理打印机打印文档之前查看文档，为不同的CUPS和gutenprint提供驱动程序，允许用户在打印前查看文档、调整页边距、管理文档页面数量，打印PDF文件和其他文件，帮助您在打印之前准备好文档。
description.slogan: 把问题排除在打印之前。

description.name: Boostnote
description.description: Boostnote is an open source note-taking app designed for programmers. For code snippets the app is able to highlight code syntax in more than 100 languages, including Javascript, Python, HTML and CSS and you can store multiple code snippets within the same snippet. Boostnote works everywhere.

description.name: Boostnote
description.description: Boostnote 是一款笔记编辑工具，除了日常笔记记录，最大的用处就是帮你记录无数的代码资源，你甚至可以以一个单个笔记为单位，在里面创建多个 Tab，以组成一个独立的 Code 项目。软件支持收藏、标签、分组、搜索、栏目切换等笔记应用应有的功能。
description.slogan: 代码改变世界，笔记造福大众。

description.name: BRL-CAD
description.description: BRL-CAD is a powerful Open Source combinatorial Constructive Solid Geometry (CSG) solid modeling system that includes interactive 3D solid geometry editing, high-performance ray-tracing support for rendering and geometric analysis, network-distributed framebuffer support, image and signal-processing tools, path-tracing and photon mapping support for realistic image synthesis, a system performance analysis benchmark suite, an embedded scripting interface, and libraries for robust high-performance geometric representation and analysis.

description.name: BRL-CAD
description.description: BRL-CAD是一款实体建模系统，与AutoCAD具有类似功能，它应用了构型实体方式建模，可以进行几何编辑、几何分析，支持分布式网络，可以进行图像处理和信号处理。

description.name: Buttercup
description.description: Buttercup is a password manager - an assistant for helping you store all of your login credentials. All you need to do is remember just one password: your master password. Archives are encrypted using the AES 256bit specification, and cannot be read by anyone besides those with the master password. Brute-force decryption is not technically possible. There's also a mobile app and browser extension so that you can access your credentials anywhere. No personal data is collected and no accounts are required.

description.name: Buttercup
description.description: Buttercup密码管理器具有非常强大的256位AES加密功能，能够让你的电脑不被黑客的破解系统所侵蚀，你可以设置一个主密码，从此可以保护你的敏感信息并随时为每项服务使用更强更加复杂的密码。易于使用的界面使存储和查找您的登录密码变为小菜一碟。将它与浏览器扩展和移动应用一起使用，以获得完全可移植的体验。Buttercup 数据库位于本地，支持使用第三方网盘进行数据云同步，包括 Dropbox、ownCloud、Nextcloud、WebDAV。

description.name: Calf Studio Gear
description.description: Calf studio gear is designed to give you a professional production environment for high-quality sound processing. It provides instruments and tone generators, modulation effects, delay effects, dynamic processors, filters and equalizers, distortion and enhancement and tools. Play your SF2 sample banks, create filthy organs, fatten your sounds with phasers, delays, reverbs and other FX, process your recordings with gates, compressors, deesser and finally master your stuff with multiband dynamics - for free!

description.name: Calf Studio Gear
description.description: Calf Studio Gear是一款用于LV2标准的音频插件集合，为开源操作系统提供专业的生产环境。它提供乐器和音源，调制效果，延迟效果，动态处理器，滤波器和均衡器，失真和增强以及工具。播放您的SF2样本库，混响，合唱，镶边，延迟和其他效果增强声音。

description.name: Caprine
description.description: Caprine is an elegant Facebook Messenger desktop app. You can freely send and receive messages from friends. It supports to switch theme, adjust window size, hide to system tray.
description.slogan: Grasp the online dynamic at any time.

description.name: Caprine
description.description: Caprine是一款Facebook桌面客户端，使您可以即时发送和接收来自朋友的邮件，支持切换主题，可以自由调整窗口大小，支持隐藏到托盘和桌面通知，可以让你随时随地了解Facebook好友的最新动态。

description.name: Caret
description.description: Caret is a beautiful & clever markdown editor with simple interface. It supports code highlight, there are a lot of combination of shortcuts, themes and font switching. In addition to hyperlink syntax, it provides a multi-function menu, provide open hyperlinks, link name and other actions.
description.slogan: Focus on writting and highlight codes.

description.name: Caret
description.description: Caret是一款markdown编辑器，界面简洁，支持代码高亮，还有非常多的组合快捷键，支持主题和字体切换，另外还针对超链接语法提供了多功能菜单，提供打开超链接、搜索超链接名称等动作。

description.name: Cerebro
description.description: Cerebro is a desktop quick launch tool. You can search everything in few clicks on your machine or in the Internet. Open file in default program or reveal in finder, copy contact details to clipboard, see google suggestions. Using included plugin manager you always can find and use what you want. There is no plugin that you are looking for? Use simple, but powerful API to build your own plugins and share them with community.

description.name: Cerebro
description.description: Cerebro 是一款的桌面快捷工具, 可用于执行命令, 查找和打开应用程序、文件，支持文件预览和复制粘贴。内置了地图和翻译插件，可以直接查询地址和翻译。包含插件管理器，支持强大的扩展功能。
description.slogan: 生产力与大脑的助推器。

description.name: Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead
description.description: Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead is a roguelike set in a post-apocalyptic world. Struggle to survive in a harsh, persistent, procedurally generated world. Scavenge the remnants of a dead civilization for food, equipment, or, if you are lucky, a vehicle with a full tank of gas to get you the hell out of Dodge. Fight to defeat or escape from a wide variety of powerful monstrosities, from zombies to giant insects to killer robots and things far stranger and deadlier, and against the others like yourself, that want what you have...

description.name: 大灾变：劫后余生
description.description: 大灾变：劫后余生是一款Roguelike游戏，整个游戏发生于末日后的世界。在这个游戏中，生存是非常困难的，你将处于一个非常恶劣的环境中，不但物资匮乏、装备稀缺，而且随处可见食肉的僵尸和各种奇怪甚至畸形的生物。在严峻的形势面前，你也会面对许多机遇和挑战，它们将是你改变人生的转折点。

description.name: CloudCompare (Flatpak)
description.description: CloudCompare is a 3D point cloud and triangular mesh processing tool designed to perform comparison between 3D points clouds. It features many algorithms for point cloud processing such as registration, resampling, color/normal/scalar fields management, statistics computation, sensor management as well as display enhancement tools.

description.name: CloudCompare (Flatpak)
description.description: CloudCompare是一款三维点云和三角网格处理工具，旨在执行3D点云之间的比较。它具有许多点云处理算法，如配准，重采样，颜色/标准/标量场管理，统计计算，传感器管理以及显示增强工具。
description.slogan: 用点云复制物体的原貌。

description.name: CloudCompare
description.description: CloudCompare is a 3D point cloud and triangular mesh processing tool designed to perform comparison between 3D points clouds. It features many algorithms for point cloud processing such as registration, resampling, color/normal/scalar fields management, statistics computation, sensor management as well as display enhancement tools.

description.name: CloudCompare
description.description: CloudCompare是一款三维点云和三角网格处理工具，旨在执行3D点云之间的比较。它具有许多点云处理算法，如配准，重采样，颜色/标准/标量场管理，统计计算，传感器管理以及显示增强工具。
description.slogan: 用点云复制物体的原貌。

description.name: CocoMusic
description.description: CocoMusic is an online music tool. You can listen to and download online music, search music by category, album and name. Favorites supported, you can collect your favorite music, and lyrics can be shown in the play details page.
description.slogan: A new way to listen to Music.

description.name: CocoMusic
description.description: CocoMusic是一款在线音乐工具，是企鹅音乐的一个本地客户端，可以收听和下载在线音乐，可以根据分类、专辑、名称搜索音乐，支持收藏夹功能，可以将你喜欢的音乐添加到收藏夹，播放详情页可以显示歌词。

description.name: Codelobster
description.description: Codelobster is a portable integrated development environment (IDE) primarily for PHP, which also supports HTML, CSS, and JavaScript development. Plug-ins are available for Drupal, WordPress, Smarty, Joomla, JQuery, Facebook, Codeigniter, Yii, and CakePHP. The program features syntax highlighting and auto-completion for SQL, PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and XML, as well as automatic syntax checking. There is a HTML and CSS inspector like Firebug.

description.name: CodeLobster IDE
description.description: CodeLobster IDE是一款集成开发环境，主要用于创建和编辑PHP、HTML、CSS、JavaScript文件，支持Drupal CMS、Joomla CMS、Magento CMS、Smarty模板引擎、Twig模板引擎、JQuery库、AngularJS、BackboneJS、Laravel、MeteorJS、Phalcon、CodeIgniter、CakePHP、Symfony、Yii和WordPress。它包括全功能PHP调试器、动态帮助、高级自动完成和ftp/SFTP客户端。
description.slogan: 重量级的集成开发工具。

description.name: CopyChar
description.description: CopyChar is a basic web app that allows you to find and copy special characters to your clipboard just at one click. It provides letters, punctuation, math, numbers, currency, symbols, arrows, and emoji.

description.name: CopyChar
description.description: CopyChar是一款特殊符号表情拷贝输入工具，可以用来找寻自己需要的特殊符号，点击后快速复制到剪切板上使用，目前该网站收录的特殊符号包括字母、标点符号、数学、数字、货币、符号、箭头和表情等。
description.slogan: 轻松输入任何特殊符号。

description.name: Cool Retro Term
description.description: Cool Retro Term is a terminal emulator which mimics the look and feel of the old cathode tube screens. It has pre-configured templates so you can use them with just one click. Further more you can create your own profile and use it. It's preferences offers a lot of customization: you can adjust brightness, contrast, and opacity; font; font scaling and width; cool effects for terminal; and you can control FPS, texture quality, scanlines quality, and bloom quality. It requires Qt 5.2 or higher to run.

description.name: Cool Retro Term
description.description: Cool Retro Term 是一款复古终端应用，它的作用与系统中的终端完全一致，特别的是，它模拟了各种古董级显示器的显示效果，年代感十足。应用内置了 9 种不同种类的显示效果供你选择，每一种的配色、字体、效果都不相同，如果你观察够仔细的话，开发者甚至还特意做出了烧屏效果。如果这些效果你都不喜欢，应用还允许你自定义显示的样式，字体、配色、动效都可以调节
description.slogan: 把终端变成复古显示器。

description.name: Cozy
description.description: Cozy is a modern audio book player. You can import all your audiobooks into cozy to browse them comfortably. It supports to remember your playback position, search in library, sort your audio books by author, reader & name, drag & drop to import new audiobooks.

description.name: Cozy
description.description: Cozy是一款有声读物播放器，内置有声读物浏览器，支持多种排序方式，支持多种音频文件格式，可以记录上次播放位置，可以设置定时休眠，支持键盘快捷键，支持拖拽导入。

description.name: CPU-X
description.description: CPU-X is a free and open source software that gathers information on processor, motherboard, memory, system, graphic card and performance. It can be used in graphical mode (GTK) or in text-based mode (NCurses or dump).

description.name: CPU-X
description.description: CPU-X是一款查看CPU、主板等信息的工具，类似CPU-Z，但CPU-X是专门为linux设计的，可用于查看CPU、主板、内存、系统、显卡的相关参数。

description.name: Cryptomator
description.description: Cryptomator provides transparent, client-side encryption for your cloud. Protect your documents from unauthorized access. While the vault containing your encrypted data resides somewhere in your cloud folder, Cryptomator provides a virtual hard drive through which you can access your files. Compared to other disk encryption utilities, Cryptomator encrypts each file individually. So if you edit just a small text file, only the corresponding encrypted file is changed.
description.slogan: Free client-side encryption for cloud files.

description.name: Cryptomator
description.description: Cryptomator是一款客户端加密应用，它能够在本地帮你加密数据，然后上传云端服务，目前支持 iCloud Drive, Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive 和 WebDAV 等内容，可以配合网盘进行使用，也能当作独立的单机加密软件来使用。加密解密全自动，就像用U盘一样简单。

description.name: Cumulonimbus
description.description: Cumulonimbus is a podcast client with iTunes Podcast directory. It supports searching and subscribing to podcast, managing playlist and managing subscription, filtering podcast by time and date, importing and exporting.
description.slogan: Listen to podcast and broaden horizon.

description.name: Cumulonimbus
