description.description: Cumulonimbus是一款播客客户端，使用iTunes播客目录。支持搜索和订阅播客，管理播放列表和管理订阅，可以按时间和日期过滤播客，支持导入和导出。

description.name: CuteReport
description.description: CuteReport is an easy, powerful and extendable report solution based on Qt framework. Generally CuteReport consists of two parts: core library and template designer. Both are totally modular and theirs functionality can be simply extended by writing additional modules. It's totally abstract of used data and can use as storage: file system, database, version control systems, etc. The project's goal is to provide powerful, but yet simple to use for inexperienced user and report designers, reporting system.
description.slogan: Your report can be more attractive.

description.name: CuteReport
description.description: CuteReport是一款报表生成工具。它具有各种强大的功能模块，如模板设计器、表单设计器、页面编辑器、数据集编辑器等。支持编写自定义插件，可以用于多种数据源，内置一套图形工具，你可以使用它快速的创建模板报表。

description.name: CVAssistant
description.description: CVAssistant is a tool to help you prepare resumes and cover letters, and organize your job application process. It stores all your skills and experiences; creates resumes tailored for each job you apply; creates cover letters summarized to match each job advertisement; keeps a history of job applications so you are ready when you receive a phone call. All languages are supported! No subscription, email, username, password are required, nothing!
description.slogan: Fit all your needs for applying a job.

description.name: CVAssistant
description.description: CVAssistant是一款简历和求职信制作的工具。 它会储存你所有的技能和经验; 为您申请的每项工作创建专用简历;自动总结你的简历内容来匹配每个招聘广告，保存工作申请的历史，以便您在接到电话时准备好。

description.name: DBGlass
description.description: DBGlass is fast and simple PostgreSQL client for all platforms allowing you to create, read, update and delete your data without a need to write the queries. With it, you can search, filters and moder widgets; Add and remove columns, rename them, change types; Modify tables and views without having to remember the ALTER TABLE syntax.

description.name: DBGlass
description.description: DBGlass是一款PostgreSQL客户端，允许您创建，读取，更新和删除您的数据，而无需编写查询。内置Markdown编辑器，使用公钥密码和SSH隧道连接，查看大型表格也十分流畅。

description.name: DBeaver EE(Enterprise Edition)
description.description: DBeaver EE is a multi-platform database tool for developers, database administrators and analysts. It is a data viewer/editor, rich SQL editor, ER diagrams, metadata editor with user-friendly interface, and supports data transfer, backup, restore, and much more for any database.

description.name: DBeaver EE（企业版）
description.description: DBeaver是一款通用的数据库管理工具和 SQL 客户端，支持 MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, DB2, MSSQL, Sybase, Mimer, HSQLDB, Derby, 以及其他兼容 JDBC 的数据库。DBeaver 提供一个图形界面用来查看数据库结构、执行SQL查询和脚本，浏览和导出数据，处理BLOB/CLOB 数据，修改数据库结构等等。

description.name: DbSchema
description.description: DbSchema uses its own project with schema structure and diagrams - this makes possible to deploy schema on multiple databases. There is no need to be connected to the database to be able to design the schema. Later you may connect to the database and deploy or synchronize the schema. Foreign keys are crucial for a good database design.
description.slogan: The beat diagram designer & GUI tool.

description.name: DbSchema
description.description: DbSchema是一款商业的数据库 ER 图绘制工具，它提供了一个完整的和强大的数据库导出方案。用dbschema工具可以导出informix数据库的结构，也可以导出整个库的结构也可以导出某个表的结构如：dbschema -d dbname -t tabname db.sql就是导出tabname表的结构保存在db.sql这个文档里。

description.name: DDNet
description.description: DDraceNetwork (DDNet) is an actively maintained version of DDRace, a Teeworlds modification with a unique cooperative gameplay. Help each other play through custom maps with up to 64 players, compete against the best in international tournaments, design your own maps, or run your own server. The official servers are located in Germany, Russia, USA, Canada, China, Chile, Brazil and South Africa. All ranks made on official servers are available worldwide and you can collect points!

description.name: DDNet
description.description: DDNet是二维射击游戏Teeworld的修改版。但是在DDNet中你不会互相对抗。相反，您可以与多达64人合作，在特定的地图中进行游戏。你可以在游戏中收集各种武器，并使用钩子来保存你的队友。支持自定义地图，你可以自己制作地图，也可以去社区下载别人设计的地图。
description.slogan: 玩游戏也别忘了相互帮助。

description.name: DCP-o-matic
description.description: DCP-o-matic is a free, open-source program to create Digital Cinema Packages (DCPs) from videos, images, sound and subtitle files. You can use it to make content for playback on DCI-compliant cinema projectors.

description.name: DCP-O-MATIC
description.description: DCP-O-MATIC是一款数字电影包打包工具。 用于从视频，图像，声音和字幕文件创建数字电影包。 您可以使用它在DCI兼容的电影放映机上播放内容。它可以采取许多不同格式的文件，包括MP4，苹果ProRes，MOV，AVI，M2TS（从蓝光），VOB（从DVD），WMV，MKV，JPEG，PNG，TIFF和许多其他格式。
description.slogan: 全能数字电影包制作器。

description.name: DeckHub
description.description: DeckHub is a tweetdeck style desktop client for GitHub. It provides notifications, and allows you to add, customize, rename and reorder feeds; Mix different repos, users and organizations into one unified feed; Add and use any account to your deck. No limitations.

description.name: Deckhub
description.description: Deckhub是一款Github桌面客户端，支持系统通知，可以自定义界面和排列列表，可以将不同的项目和用户组织在一起，支持添加多用户。DeckHub为您提供了与GitHub平台交互的可能性，就像您使用Twitter帐户一样。

description.name: Deepin Manual
description.description: Deepin Manual as a manual carrier aims to help more deepin users! Whether a new or an advanced deepin user, you can learn more about deepin and its family applications from it. Deepin Manual has been integrated in the system. When you encounter problems in the use of applications, you can click on Help in the main menu, or press [F1] to call the manual, and search the content you want easily.

description.name: 深度帮助手册
description.description: 深度帮助手册作为一个提供帮助的载体，旨在将帮助分享给更多的人！无论是初学者还是深度操作系统的资深用户，都可以通过它进一步了解系统和深度家族应用。深度帮助手册已经集成在系统中，您在使用具体的应用过程中遇到问题时，可以点击应用中的【帮助】来查看手册，还可以通过按下【F1】快捷键调用显示。

description.name: Remote Assistance
description.description: Remote Assistance is used to help users and technicians to solve all kinds of issues, and seek for help when issues are encountered. With Remote Assistance, remote work, training and interactive teaching can be easily done.
description.slogan: Make your system to be rebirth.

description.name: 远程协助
description.description: 远程协助主要是帮助用户、技术人员解决各种问题，同时遇到问题可以发起寻求别人的帮助，通过远程协助可以轻松的实现远程工作、培训、交互式教学等。

description.name: Deepin Picker (Flatpak)
description.description: Deepin Picker is a fast screen color picking tool. RGB and HEX code can be obtained according color picked and auto saved to clipboard. The color picking area is where mouse clicked.

description.name: 深度取色器 (Flatpak)
description.description: 深度取色器是一款帮助你快速在屏幕上取色的工具。并且能根据你取的颜色得到RGB、HEX代码。打开软件后，鼠标经过的地方即为深度取色器取色的区域。

description.name: Deepin Screenshot
description.description: Deepin Screenshot is a sophisticated screenshot software developed by deepin technology team. It's characterized with smart window identification, shortcuts supporting, image editing, delay screenshot, smart saving, image resolution adjusting and other functions.
description.slogan: Freeze your memory, rich our life.

description.name: 深度截图
description.description: 深度截图是深度科技团队开发的一款精巧截图应用，它具有智能窗口识别、快捷键支持、图片编辑、延迟截图、智能保存、调节图像分辨率等功能。

description.name: Deepin Presentation Assistant
description.description: Deepin Presentation Assistant is an application to share phone contents. It supports photo sharing annotation, phone screen sharing, PPT remote control and so on.

description.name: 深度演示助手
description.description:
深度演示助手是一款用于手机内容分享的演示工具。它支持照片分享功能，分享时可以对照片进行旋转、标记、聚焦等操作。甚至还可以直接将手机屏幕投射到电脑上，视频、游戏都轻松分享。另外还支持幻灯片远程控制，让您在演示幻灯片时无拘无束。

注：Android系统需要5.0及更高。

description.name: Deepin Music (Flatpak)
description.description: Deepin Music is an application developed by Deepin Technology Team which focused on local music playing. It brings all brand new UI design, extreme playing experience, and it has local music scanning and lyric sync functions, etc.

description.name: 深度音乐 (Flatpak)
description.description: 深度音乐是武汉深之度科技有限公司重新打造的一款专注于本地音乐播放的应用程序，为您提供全新的界面设计、极致的播放体验，同时还具有扫描本地音乐、歌词同步等功能。

description.name: Deepin Picker
description.description: Deepin Picker is a fast screen color picking tool. RGB and HEX code can be obtained according color picked and auto saved to clipboard. The color picking area is where mouse clicked.

description.name: 深度取色器
description.description: 深度取色器是一款帮助你快速在屏幕上取色的工具。并且能根据你取的颜色得到RGB、HEX代码。打开软件后，鼠标经过的地方即为深度取色器取色的区域。

description.name: Deepin Cloud Print
description.description: Deepin Cloud Print is a new printing solution developed by Wuhan Deepin Technology Co., Ltd.. It will connect your printer to the network, and is enabled for network printing via daily used applications. Deepin Cloud Print is suitable for desktops, laptops, some tablets and other networking devices that you have authorized to print.

description.name: 深度云打印
description.description: 深度云打印是由武汉深之度科技有限公司开发的一种新型打印解决方案，它可以将您的打印机连接到网络，借助深度云打印，您可以通过日常使用的应用程序进行网络打印。同时深度云打印适用于台式机、笔记本电脑、部分平板电脑以及其他所有您已授权打印的联网设备。

description.name: Deepin OpenSymbol
description.description: Deepin OpenSymbol is a series of symbol fonts redrawn by Deepin Technology Team, the fonts are based on Wingdings fonts. It includes shorthand notations, gesture symbols, arrow signs, star signs and general symbols that people use in work and daily life.

description.name: Deepin OpenSymbol
description.description: Deepin OpenSymbol是深度科技团队在Wingdings系列字体内容上，重新绘制一系列符号字体，它包含了人们在工作及生活中常用的一些速记符号、手势符号、箭头符号、星形符号以及世界通用的一些常用符号。

description.name: Deepin Screen Recorder (Flatpak)
description.description: Deepin Screen Recorder is a screen recorder tool, it supports to save the recorded screens as gif or mp4 format. It can select the recorded window automatically or manually by selecting the area. Users just need to start and stop the recording process, and the file will auto save to the desktop.
description.slogan: Viewing what you see, knowing what you think.

description.name: 深度录屏 (Flatpak)
description.description: 深度录屏是一款屏幕录制工具，支持将录屏保存为gif和mp4格式，可以自动选定录制窗口，也可手动选择录制区域，只需控制录制的开始和结束即可，文件会自动保存到桌面上。

description.name: Deepin Voice Recorder
description.description: Deepin Voice Recorder is a beautiful and easy to use voice recording application with simple design. No matter recording your singing, phone call or meeting conversation, you can finish all these tasks by Deepin Voice Recorder. It also supports visual recording, recording playback, recording list management and other functions.

description.name: 深度录音
description.description: 深度录音是一款设计简洁、美观易用的录音应用，无论您是想记录自己的歌声还是通话和会议录音，都可以使用深度录音来完成；它还支持可视化录音、录音回放、录音列表管理等功能。

description.name: Deepin Music
description.description: Deepin Music is an application developed by Deepin Technology Team which focused on local music playing. It brings all brand new UI design, extreme playing experience, and it has local music scanning and lyric sync functions, etc.

description.name: 深度音乐
description.description: 深度音乐是武汉深之度科技有限公司重新打造的一款专注于本地音乐播放的应用程序，为您提供全新的界面设计、极致的播放体验，同时还具有扫描本地音乐、歌词同步等功能。

description.name: Deepin Voice Recorder (Flatpak)
description.description: Deepin Voice Recorder is a beautiful and easy to use voice recording application with simple design. No matter recording your singing, phone call or meeting conversation, you can finish all these tasks by Deepin Voice Recorder. It also supports visual recording, recording playback, recording list management and other functions.

description.name: 深度录音 (Flatpak)
description.description: 深度录音是一款设计简洁、美观易用的录音应用，无论您是想记录自己的歌声还是通话和会议录音，都可以使用深度录音来完成；它还支持可视化录音、录音回放、录音列表管理等功能。

description.name: Deepin Screenshot (Flatpak)
description.description: Deepin Screenshot is a sophisticated screenshot software developed by deepin technology team. It's characterized with smart window identification, shortcuts supporting, image editing, delay screenshot, smart saving, image resolution adjusting and other functions.
description.slogan: Freeze your memory, rich our life.

description.name: 深度截图 (Flatpak)
description.description: 深度截图是深度科技团队开发的一款精巧截图应用，它具有智能窗口识别、快捷键支持、图片编辑、延迟截图、智能保存、调节图像分辨率等功能。

description.name: Deepin Movie (Flatpak)
description.description: Deepin Movie is a video player built in deepin operating system. It provides an intuitive user interface and a rich range of shortcuts. You can complete all the play operations by keyboard to completely get rid of the shackle of mouse clicks. Video files in various formats can be played by Deepin Movie and online video resources can also be enjoyed by its streaming media function.
description.slogan: Freely enjoy your movie and TV feast.

description.name: 深度影院 (Flatpak)
description.description: 深度影院是深度操作系统自带的一款视频播放器，提供了直观易用的操作界面和丰富齐全的快捷键，依靠键盘您就能完成所有的播放操作，让您彻底摆脱鼠标点击的束缚。您可以使用深度影院播放多种格式的视频文件，利用流媒体功能轻松欣赏到网络视频资源。
description.slogan: 声色俱佳，尽享影视盛宴。

description.name: Deepin Image Viewer (Flatpak)
description.description: Deepin Image Viewer is an image viewer and manager elaborately produced by Deepin Technology. It is fashion and smooth, supports multiple image formats, user can view any kind of image. The image management in Deepin Image Viewer, allows user to rank images in Timeline by date, add image to My favorites or different albums. All images can be arranged in perfect order by Deepin Image Viewer.

description.name: 深度看图 (Flatpak)
description.description: 深度看图是深度科技精心打造的一款图片查看和管理应用。外观时尚、性能流畅，支持多种图片格式，任何图片想看就看。深度看图的照片管理功能，让您可以将图片按日期排列在时间线上，还可以将图片添加到收藏夹或归类到不同的相册中，将图片管理得井井有条。

description.name: Deepin Cloud Scan
description.description: Deepin Cloud Scan is a new scanning technology developed by Wuhan Deepin Technology Co., Ltd.. It will connect your scanner to the network, and is enabled for network scanning via daily used applications. Deepin Cloud Scan is suitable for desktops, laptops, tablets and other networking devices that you have authorized to scan.

description.name: 深度云扫描
description.description: 深度云扫描是由武汉深之度科技有限公司开发的一种新型扫描技术，它可以将您的扫描仪连接到网络，借助深度云扫描，您可以通过日常使用的应用程序进行网络扫描。同时深度云扫描适用于台式机、笔记本电脑、部分平板电脑以及其他所有您已授权扫描的联网设备。

description.name: Annex
description.description: Annex is a RTS game that brings fast paced combat with a diverse arsenal. Play as one of four factions: The East Ocean Alliance, the NEO Republic, the Shadow Organization, or the Renegades as they struggle for dominance all over the world, competeing for a priceless red mineral. The mod will contain 4 factions, over 30 tech trees, and supports single player and multi-player game modes.
description.slogan: Set foot on the journey of the Republic.

description.name: Annex
description.description: Annex是一个即时战略游戏，它带来不同兵工厂之间快节奏的战斗。玩家将扮演东太平洋联盟、新共和国、影子组织、或者赤色红狼四个派别中的其中之一。他们为争夺世界的统治权，为争夺一个无价的红色的矿物而斗争四个组织派系，超过30种科技树，同时支持多人和单人游戏的战斗。

description.name: Android Angry birds
description.description: Angry birds is a casual puzzle game. You sling birds by a slingshot and hit the green pigs, you win by hitting all the pigs. The angle and strength of the birds are controlled by your fingers, you need to calculate them to hit the green pigs more accurately. The birds been slung will leave tracks as references of strength and angle.
description.slogan: Defend territory with their own bodies.

description.name: 愤怒的小鸟安卓版
description.description: 愤怒的小鸟是一款休闲益智类游戏应用，其游戏过程主要将弹弓上的小鸟弹出去，砸到绿色的肥猪，将肥猪全部砸到就能过关。鸟儿的弹出角度和力度由你的手指来控制，要注意考虑好力度和角度的综合计算，这样才能更准确的砸到绿皮猪。而被弹出的鸟儿会留下弹射轨迹，可供参考角度和力度的调整。
description.slogan: 用身体捍卫自己的领地。

description.name: Web Army of Ages
description.description: Army of Ages is a war strategy online game. By constantly building in the base, player can upgrade buildings to create powerful human army, kill alien enemies to gain money and experience, complete building upgrade and evolvement of war.
description.slogan: Trough space and time to defend Earth.

description.name: 时代战争网页版
description.description: 时代战争是一款战争策略类网游，玩家通过在基地不断的建造建筑，升级建筑产生强大的人类军队，杀掉外星异形敌人获得金钱和经验，完成建筑升级和战争过程的升级演化。

description.name: Contre Jour
description.description: Contre Jour is a good casual puzzle game. Player can enjoy beautiful game video/audio, while using physical properties of all kinds of items to control the mysterious creature Petit to absorb essence scattered around all the corners, dodge all sorts of dangerous obstacles and safely pass 60 stages.
description.slogan: Stage challenges in a dark journey.

description.name: Contre Jour网页版
description.description: Contre Jour是一款益智休闲游戏佳作，玩家可以一边享受美妙的游戏视听，一边利用各种道具的物理特性，控制神秘生物Petit吸收散落在各个角落的精华，躲过各类危险障碍到达目的地，安全地通过60个关卡。
description.slogan: 黑暗旅途中的通关挑战。

description.name: Endless Sky
description.description: Endless Sky is a 2D space trading and combat game inspired by the classic Escape Velocity series. Work your way up from a relatively wimpy shuttle, cargo ship, or fighter, to a highly upgraded and customized flagship or to a massive fleet of warships or freighters.
description.slogan: Explore and battle in the endless-sky!

description.name: Endless Sky
description.description: Endless Sky是一款太空探索战斗游戏，开始作为一个小小的太空船的船长，选择你想玩的情节或变成一个商人/赏金猎人/探险者去完成任务，其中包括去其他恒星通过交易挣钱、运输客人等，通过挣钱升级自己的飞船、武器或发动机等装备，然后去探索无尽的天空。
description.slogan: 在无尽的天空探索战斗吧！

description.name: Web Grepolis
description.description: Grepolis is a strategy online game based on Greek myths fantasy. The main task is city construction. Player need to recruit powerful army and navy. Together with characters from the myth, attack enemies from land, ocean and sky. Build a small city to a magnificent country and overrule Greek.
description.slogan: Build a magical kingdom in Greek.

description.name: Grepolis网页版
description.description: Grepolis是一款希腊神话魔幻类策略网游，游戏中以城建为主要任务，玩家需要招募强大的海陆军，同神话角色一起，攻击来自陆地、海洋和天空的敌人，将一个个小的城邦建成宏伟强大的国度，成为希腊最强的统治者。

description.name: Eclipse IDE for JavaScript and Web
description.description: Eclipse is a cross-platform IDE, this is the installation package customized for JavaScript developers. It includes JavaScript development tools, remote system resource manager, Git, XML editor and Mylyn.

description.name: Eclipse IDE for JavaScript and Web
description.description: Eclipse是一款跨平台集成开发环境，这是Eclipse为JavaScript开发者定制的安装包，其中包括JavaScript开发工具、远程系统资源管理器、Git客户端、XML编辑器和Mylyn插件。

description.name: Web Kingdom Rush Frontiers
description.description: Kingdom Rush Frontiers is an excellent TD game. In the game, player needs to build and upgrade turret or other defense architectures, defend waves of enemies by soldiers and heroes, destroy enemies to complete stages.

description.name: 王国保卫战：前线网页版
description.description: 王国保卫战：前线是一款塔防游戏神作，玩家需要在游戏中，通过在地图上建造和升级炮塔或其他防御建筑物，和士兵和英雄一起来阻止敌人一波一波的进攻，消灭敌人不断过关。

description.name: Web Pirates Love Daisies
description.description: Pirates Love Daisies is a TD game. Player can unite a group of pirates to defend sea creatures to loot the daisies. By setting different pirate members on the map to earn gold and points, each pirate member will do their best to destroy the invading creatures to protect daisies.

description.name: Pirates Love Daisies网页版
description.description: Pirates Love Daisies是一款塔防类游戏，玩家可以建立海盗团去防御海中生物对雏菊的抢夺，只要布置海盗团成员在不同的地图位置上，通过赚取金币和积累积分，每个海盗成员就会拿出看家本领来去消灭前来冒犯的生物，捍卫雏菊。
description.slogan: 团结起来，保护心爱的雏菊。

description.name: Web Shadow Kings
description.description: Shadow Kings is a war strategy online game. It allows player to play human, elf, dwarf and such characters in a fantasy world far from Earth, build cities with resources and material, recruit army to defend dark force, choose alliance, dominate diplomacy and have epic battles.
description.slogan: Civil and war in a fantasy planet.

description.name: 影子国王网页版
description.description: 影子国王是一款战争策略网游，游戏让玩家在远离地球的奇幻世界中，扮演人类、精灵和矮人等角色，通过物资和材料建设城市，招募组建军队抵挡黑暗力量，选择联盟和主导外交，进行史诗般的战斗。
description.slogan: 奇幻星球的文明与战斗。

description.name: Web Soldiers Inc
description.description: Soldiers Inc is a military strategy online game. As the commander designated by organization, player shall form an alliance by diplomacy and trading, develop and defend the military base, expand influence of the base, build a strong and competitive military bloc.
description.slogan: Perfect command to conquer the world.

description.name: Soliders Inc网页版
description.description: Soliders Inc是一款军事策略类网游，玩家作为组织任命的指挥官，利用外交和贸易建立联盟，开发和保卫自己的军事基地，扩大基地的影响力，建立强大有竞争力的军事集团。

description.name: Web Sonic
description.description: Sonic is a classic sonic adventure game. Player can select hedgehog sonic to run, jump, dodge and get points to complete stage challenges.

description.name: 刺猬索尼克网页版
description.description: 刺猬索尼克是一款经典的索尼克冒险游戏，玩家通过选择刺猬SONIC等角色奔跑、跳跃、躲避敌人、获取积分，完成一次又一次的关卡挑战。

description.name: Stunt Rally
description.description: Stunt Rally is a RAC game. Player can experience the charm of the game in 153 tracks and 24 missions. The game includes tournament, challenge, multiplayer and other game modes. In addition, real-time editing of the tracks and their parameters is allowed in Stunt Rally. Enjoy doubling the fun by changing the track parameters, adjusting the landform, and even modifying the car.

description.name: Stunt Rally
description.description: Stunt Rally是一款赛车游戏，玩家可以从153条赛车轨道和24个关卡中感受到游戏的魅力。游戏设置有锦标赛、挑战赛以及多人比赛等，除此之外，Stunt Rally允许用户实时编辑比赛道路和它们的参数，通过改变赛道的参数、调整地形，甚至修改自己的赛车，从而让驾驶乐趣倍增。
description.slogan: 生死极速，玩的就是刺激。

description.name: Web Tribal Wars
description.description: Tribal Wars is a medieval strategy battle game. In the background of mid-century, player can upgrade village, build strong fortress and train army. Meanwhile, play can unite with other players to form a strong tribe, then lead the tribe army to win fights and conquer rivalry villages to expand his/her own empire.

description.name: Tribal Wars网页版
description.description: Tribal Wars是一个中世纪策略类对战网游，玩家在中世纪背景下可以升级村庄、建造强大的堡垒、训练军队，同时与其他玩家联合起来，形成一个强大的部落，带领部落部队进入战斗，征服敌人的村庄，扩大自己的帝国。

description.name: Zero Ballistics
description.description: Zero Ballistics is a multi-user online easy-to-control 3D tank combat game. Player can make horizontal settings, select multiple main weapons and secondary weapons, use 6 different skills, and select 3 different game modes. The whole combat game feels like being there.

description.name: Zero Ballistics
description.description: Zero Ballistics是一款多人在线的3D坦克大战游戏，它操控简单，玩家在游戏中可以进行水平设置、选择多种主武器和二级武器，运用六中不同的技能，另外还可以选择三种游戏模式，整个对战游戏过程有一种身临其境的感觉。
description.slogan: 轰轰轰，过一把坦克手的瘾。

description.name: Web The West
description.description: The West is a role-play adventure game. Guided by a bar owner, the player will play cowboy and explore towns on the new continent. In each town, player can complete some missions, upgrade skills, collect fortunes, and experience endless adventures and rivals.

description.name: The West网页版
description.description: The West是一款角色冒险游戏，在酒吧老板的指导下，玩家通过扮演西部牛仔去探索新大陆上的城镇，在每个城镇中完成一些任务同时提高技能、积累财富，经历不断的冒险和对决。
description.slogan: 牛仔，开始神奇的探险吧。

description.name: Android Plants.Vs.Zombies
description.description: Plants. Vs. Zombies is a puzzle PC game. It merged RTS, TD, collectible cards and so on. Player needs to protect the garden by arming many kinds of plants, and planting them reasonably to counter the weaknesses of different zombies. 5 different game modes can be formed by different enemies and different methods.
description.slogan: Plants are iron armors against zombies.

description.name: 植物大战僵尸安卓版
description.description: 植物大战僵尸是一款益智策略类单机游戏，集成了即时战略、塔防御战和卡片收集等要素。玩家通过武装多种植物，针对不同僵尸的弱点来合理地种植植物，快速有效地把僵尸阻挡在入侵的道路上，达到保护植物园的目的，不同的敌人，使用不同的玩法构成五种不同的游戏模式。
description.slogan: 抵御僵尸，让植物化作铁桶阵。

description.name: Android YouJoyDDZ
description.description: YouJoyDDZ is a 2 vs 1 card game. It uses cute and refreshing character designs, exquisite interface and fit background music. It supports smart card tips, play, draw and auto-play. Intensive, exciting and hot matches are held regularly, so players can have the best game experience!
description.slogan: Play smart & brave to beat landlord.

description.name: 有乐斗地主安卓版
description.description: 有乐斗地主是一款斗地主游戏，采用Q版清新可爱的人物设计，界面精美，背景音乐恰到好处。支持智能化的提牌、出牌、取牌及托管等功能，定期举办多种紧张、激烈、刺激的比赛，让玩家获得最佳的游戏乐趣！

description.name: Deepnest
description.description: Deepnest is designed for laser cutters. It packs your parts into a compact area, and automatically merges common lines so the laser doesn’t cut the same path twice. It has a user-friendly interface, an easy-to-use options for changing space tolerances between pieces, and allows you to select individual objects and place them multiple times in the nested file. It accepts DXF, SVG,and CDR files, and exports to both DXF and SVG.
description.slogan: Save time and money on laser cuts.

description.name: Deepnest
description.description: Deepnest是一款激光切割排版工具，可以将您的零件自动布局到一个紧凑的区域，以节省材料和时间。 它会自动合并通用线，所以激光不会两次切割相同的路径，支持DXF、SVG、CDR等格式文件导入。
description.slogan: 找到最省的激光切割方案。

description.name: Drawpile
description.description: Drawpile is a Free software collaborative drawing program that allows multiple users to sketch on the same canvas simultaneously. It supports the OpenRaster image file format and thus works well with applications such as MyPaint, Krita and GIMP. It supports recording a whole drawing session and creating short animations, using layers as frames.

description.name: Drawpile
description.description: Drawpile是一款带有协同功能的免费绘画软件，允许最多255个用户同时在一个画布上绘制草图。它具有漫画设计、图形设计、图片处理、文字添加、图片合并等多种功能，可以为用户提供专业的绘画服务。还具有录制的功能，可以将整个绘图过程录制下来，然后添加录音。

description.name: Duplicati
description.description: Duplicati is a free backup software to store backups online with strong AES-256 encryption. It works with FTP, SSH, WebDAV, OneDrive, Amazon S3, Google Drive and many others, and saves space with incremental backups and data deduplication. Run backups on any machine through the web-based interface or via command line interface.

description.name: Duplicati
description.description: Duplicati可以将文件定时备份到电脑中的文件夹、Windows或Samba文件服务器、FTP服务器、WebDAV服务器、Amazon S3云端储存服务，甚至以SSH方式备份。备份可通过密码进行加密，数据备份和恢复也可通过图形界面进行。Duplicati更可管理备份历史、设定备份次数、使用的容量上限，也可指定不备份某些类型的文件。

description.name: Dynalist
description.description: Dynalist is a  multi-level note application. It supports to track tasks and projects, organize notes and research. With infinitely nestable lists, you can organize your stuff in the most logical way, and work with exactly what you need.

description.name: Dynalist
description.description: Dynalist 是一款类似于WorkFlowy的笔记工具，其功能WorkFlowy 有的基本都有，所不同的是更适合于需要进行逻辑思维组织的用户使用，它以大纲清单的形式，内涵笔记整理、任务管理的功能，帮我们在简洁但又变化多端的界面中整理思绪并记录下来。

description.name: Edraw MindMaster
description.description: Edraw MindMaster is a multi-functional mind mapping software. It provides effective mind mapping solutions for problem-solving, brainstorming, knowledge management, business planning, note-taking, and project management. Users can enjoy from a wide range of impressive features including user-friendly interface, abundant layout options, exquisite icons and cliparts, high quality preset themes, impo

description.name: 亿图思维导图
description.description: 亿图思维导图是一款多功能的思维导图工具。提供了丰富的智能布局、多样性的展示模式、结合精美的设计元素和预置的主题样式，努力帮用户打造一款真正的效率神器。被广泛应用于解决问题，时间管理，业务战略和项目管理等领域中。

description.name: Elauncher
description.description: Elauncher is a desktop launcher based on Electron. You can quickly search and start the installed application, browse the file and open the folder. With a web search plug-in, you can directly open the browser to search keywords. With Youdao Dict. and Calculator plugins, you can query the word directly and display the calculation results.

description.name: Elauncher
description.description: Elauncher是一款桌面启动器，启动后可以快速搜索和启动已安装的应用程序，浏览文件并打开文件夹，带有网络搜索可插件，可以直接打开浏览器搜索关键字，带有有道词典和计算器插件，可以直接查询单词和显示计算结果。

description.name: 虾米播放器
description.description: 虾米播放器是一款在线音乐播放器，虾米音乐集合了市面上等众多音乐播放器优点于一身,找不到的歌曲均能在虾米音乐轻松获得，可以登录虾米账号收藏歌曲、播放收听历史、自定义播放列表。可以自由搜索歌曲或歌手，收听热门歌单电台。

description.name: 虾米播放器
description.description: 虾米播放器是一款在线音乐播放器，虾米音乐集合了市面上等众多音乐播放器优点于一身,找不到的歌曲均能在虾米音乐轻松获得，可以登录虾米账号收藏歌曲、播放收听历史、自定义播放列表。可以自由搜索歌曲或歌手，收听热门歌单电台。

description.name: bilibili
description.description: 哔哩哔哩弹幕网（bilibili）是国内知名的弹幕视频分享站， 哔哩哔哩专注于ACG相关内容的在线视频分享，目前有七个板块：动画，游戏，音乐，娱乐，合辑，新番，以及科学技术。除了搬运外，也有很多同人创作的作品和分享的视频在哔哩哔哩首发。

description.name: 哔哩哔哩TV版
description.description: 哔哩哔哩弹幕网（bilibili）是国内知名的弹幕视频分享站， 哔哩哔哩专注于ACG相关内容的在线视频分享，目前有七个板块：动画，游戏，音乐，娱乐，合辑，新番，以及科学技术。除了搬运外，也有很多同人创作的作品和分享的视频在哔哩哔哩首发。

description.name: Android Thunderbattle
description.description: Thunderbattle is a shooter of the Thunderbattle series. In the game, there are cool planes, fantastic barrage, superb fight and easiest operation. There are many fighters wait for the player to unlock. Players only need to move the mouse to fly freely, it is a game of total enjoyment.

description.name: 飓风战机安卓版
description.description: 飓风战机是飓风系列下的一款射击游戏，游戏拥有酷炫的机体，华丽的弹幕，超爽快的战斗，最简单的操作。在游戏中有许多的战机、关卡需要玩家去解锁，玩家只需要动动鼠标，就能自由驰骋天空，游戏的趣味性十足。

description.name: Android Break Bricks
description.description: Break Bricks is a brick breaking action game. Before it starts players can choose the difficult level. Players will have a block to catch the bouncing ball, then the ball will break bricks above the block and bounce back after launching, players need to catch the ball and continue to break bricks, and collect items to complete the level.
description.slogan: Burn yourself to turn bricks into ashes.

description.name: Break Bricks安卓版
description.description: Break Bricks是一款打砖块的动作游戏，在游戏开始前可以选择难易程度，玩家将会获得一个接弹球的木块，然后球在发射之后会与上方的砖块相撞，并且弹回来，玩家需要将球接住并不断打掉砖块，收集道具来进行挑战通关。
description.slogan: 燃烧自己让砖块灰飞烟灭。

description.name: Web Rune Raiders
description.description: Rune Raiders is an RPG focused on tactics and skills. There are 12 roles to join your team in the game, each equipped with unique weapons, armors, speed, damage and so on. The story is simple, players gather some heroes and go to the territory of monsters to fight, and experience epic battles.
description.slogan: Form up and enjoy the battle!

description.name: Rune Raiders网页版
description.description: Rune Raiders是一款角色扮演游戏，该游戏着重于战术安排和技能的使用，游戏中会有超过12名的角色加入你的队伍。每个角色都有独具特色的武器、防御、速度、破坏力等各不相同，游戏剧情很简单，集结一帮英雄跑到怪物的地盘去战斗，让置身其中的玩家有种史诗级战斗的体验!

description.name: Enpass
description.description: Enpass is a free password manager to securely store passwords and other credentials. It encrypts the data with the strong AES-256 Encryption, has cloud synchronization for Google Drive, Box, Dropbox, OneDrive and ownCloud server, autofills the information in just a single click, generates strong and unique password, allows you to easily access your password or PINs right from your Apple Watch or Android wear, and unlock the Enpass on your mobile using your fingerprint.

description.name: Enpass
description.description: Enpass是一款密码管理工具，帮你轻松管理所有的账号密码，日后你只需记住一个主密码即可轻松畅游网络。EnPass 的浏览器扩展、移动版客户端都可以支持一键填写账号密码、一键登录，支持网页表单填写；可以同步密码数据；可以生成各种安全复杂的密码；可以保存信用卡、银行账号、证件信息等各种机密信息；支持添加文件附件加密；支持数据备份/恢复；支持从其他密码管理器导入数据等等。
description.slogan: 建立一套安全密码体系。

description.name: Everdo
description.description: Everdo is a modern and beautifully-designed task management app. Features: capture to-dos with convenient shortcuts; remind deadlines; filter task based on tags, available time and energy; use text-based checklists to break down multi-step actions; separate commitments such as Home/Work with areas; keep track of high-priority and urgent tasks. What is more, it allows you to migrate data from other todo apps in a variety of formats.
description.slogan: Get things done, on your own terms.

description.name: Everdo
description.description: Everdo是一款待办事项记录和提醒工具，同时还支持记事本功能，支持标签和上下文关联，支持任务跟踪和过滤，可以设置任务的优先级，每个项目和活动都可以对应多个清单，支持数据导入和导出。
description.slogan: 美丽清单助力美好生活。

description.name: Extraterm
description.description: Extraterm is more than just a terminal emulator with multiple tabs and panes. It provides a toolbox for working with your terminal and command line applications. Previous command output can be used as input for new commands. You can split and tile any way you like.
description.slogan: The swiss army chainsaw of terminal emulator.

description.name: Extraterm
description.description: Extraterm是一款终端仿真工具，和xterm兼容，支持多选项卡和任意分割窗口，支持键盘光标选择，可以隔离和“框架”命令输出，可以插入图片和表情，支持自定义快捷键命令输入。
description.slogan: 用命令行解决所有问题。

description.name: FastoRedis
description.description: FastoRedis is a cross-platform open source Redis management tool (i.e. Admin GUI). It put the same engine that powers Redis's redis-cli shell. Everything you can write in redis-cli shell — you can write in Fastoredis! It supports main Redis database features, like: modules, cluster, sentinel, ssh tunneling, and provides you with syntax highlighting, autocompletion, different view modes (text, tree, table) and other.

description.name: FastoRedis
description.description: FastoRedis是一款NoSQL数据库管理工具，它放置了与Redis的redis-cli shell相同的引擎。你可以使用Fastoredis编写代码，支持语法高亮，自动完成，不同视图模式（文本，树，表格）等功能。

description.name: Gaffer
description.description: Gaffer is an open source application framework designed specifically for creating tools for use in visual effects production. It builds on top of the Cortex libraries, adding a flexible node-based computation framework and a user interface framework for editing and viewing node graphs. Gaffer ships with a number of sample modules and applications, not least of which is a module for the on-demand generation of procedural scenes for rendering.
description.slogan: Create tools to make visual effects.

description.name: Gaffer
description.description: Gaffer是一款专门用于创建视觉特效制作的工具，包含了一个基于节点的计算框架和用于编辑和查看节点图的用户界面框架。它提供了程序场景生成，着色器创作，渲染和图像合成的基本工具，支持自定义节点或用户界面，可以随意添加新的渲染器，新节点，或与您的渲染场景集成。

description.name: GDevelop 5
description.description: GDevelop is a full featured, open source game development software, allowing to create HTML5 and native games without any knowledge in a specific programming language. All the game logic is made thanks to an intuitive and powerful event based system.

description.name: GDevelop 5
description.description: GDevelop 是一款开源游戏引擎，采用拖曳与事件方式，通过快速加入游戏中的物件并且为其安排事件行为，可以用非常视觉化的方法制作游戏，支持本机(SFML)与 HTML5(网页)两种游戏引擎。
description.slogan: 无需编程，也能制作游戏。

description.name: Git-cola
description.description: Git-cola is a git GUI optimized for working with the git index. Git-cola can compare arbitrary commits using standard merge tools. With it you can search commit messages, content, authors, paths, data ranges etc. and it makes it easy to interactively edit the index.

description.name: Git Cola
description.description: Git Cola是一款Git桌面客户端，支持差异比较、提交、搜索、合并、隐藏、版本库操作、分支等功能，让你可以更加轻松的管理和审查Git上的代码。

description.name: Git Cola (Flatpak)
description.description: Git-cola is a git GUI optimized for working with the git index. Git-cola can compare arbitrary commits using standard merge tools. With it you can search commit messages, content, authors, paths, data ranges etc. and it makes it easy to interactively edit the index.

description.name: Git Cola (Flatpak)
description.description: Git Cola是一款Git桌面客户端，支持差异比较、提交、搜索、合并、隐藏、版本库操作、分支等功能，让你可以更加轻松的管理和审查Git上的代码。

description.name: GitEye
description.description: GitEye is a desktop for Git. It works with TeamForge, CloudForge and other Git services. GitEye combines a simple-to-use graphical Git client with central visibility into essential developer tasks such as defect tracking, Agile planning, code reviews and build services.

description.name: GitEye
description.description: GitEye是一款Git桌面客户端，它可以轻松与规划、跟踪、代码审查和构建工具（比如TeamForge、GitGub、Jira、Bugzilla及更多）整合起来。 它很灵活，并拥有强大的可视化和历史管理功能。
description.slogan: 更清晰的审视代码和项目。

description.name: Gitter
description.description: Gitter is an open source instant messaging and chat room system for developers and users of GitHub repositories. It's provided as software-as-a-service, with a free option providing all basic features and the ability to create a single private chat room, and paid subscription options for individuals and organisations, which allows them to create arbitrary numbers of private chat rooms.

description.name: Gitter
description.description: Gitter是一款即时通讯工具，用户可以自由地创建、搜素、加入社区、聊天室。支持单独私人聊天、markdown编辑、媒体文件发送等功能。支持github项目库关联创建社区，一键即刻加入聊天讨论，仅在一个浏览器页面中即可查看和订阅多个聊天室。所有社区支持对外分享并可被搜索到，一个链接即可访问参与聊天讨论，用户头像显示其GitHub账号的相关信息。
description.slogan: 让开发者和用户随心交流。

description.name: Gnome Tweak Tool
description.description: Gnome Tweak Tool is a graphical interface for advanced GNOME 3 settings, but can be used in other desktops. It allows customization at a deeper level than the standard Settings frame.

description.name: GNOME Tweak Tool
description.description: GNOME Tweak Tool 是一款 GNOME 3 的优化配置工具，为我们带来 GNOME Shell 扩展安装功能，方便Linux用户对 Gnome Shell 进行一些调整。可以用来安装，更改 Gnome-shell 主题，更改 GTK 主题，更改图标主题。

description.name: Godot
description.description: Godot is an advanced, feature-packed, multi-platform 2D and 3D open source game engine. It provides a huge set of common tools, so you can just focus on making your game without reinventing the wheel.

description.name: Godot
description.description: Godot是一款2D和3D游戏引擎，有着灵活又功能丰富的编辑器，使用专属的2D游戏引擎、像素坐标以及大量工具来开发2D游戏。在3D游戏开发方面支持阴影、后期处理以及骨骼动画等。通过脚本语言拓展从而为任意对象添加自定义行为，内置编辑器具有语法高亮和代码补全功能。
description.slogan: 为游戏设计而诞生的工具。

description.name: Gradio
description.description: Gradio is a GTK3 app for finding and listening to internet radio stations for Ubuntu and Linux Mint. With Gradio, you can select from over 100 stations, search by Languages, Codecs, Countries, Tags and States, view Connection Information, save Stations to the Library.

description.name: Gradio
description.description: Gradio 是一款在线音乐播放器，让您在桌面上查找和收听你的的互联网广播电台。 Gradio内置大量电台可以让您收听喜欢的BBC电台，爵士收音机，披头士乐队等等。

description.name: Headset
description.description: Headset is a free desktop app that lets you use YouTube as a music source, letting you stream YouTube audio on your desktop. Think of it like an ad-free Spotify, with the world’s biggest music catalogue accessible outside of your web-browser. You need to sign up for a free account to ‘unlock’ other features, like the ability to create playlists, favourite songs and, most notably, tune-in to a music subreddits as ad-hoc radio stations.
description.slogan: Turn YouTube into a desktop music player.

description.name: Headset
description.description: Headset是一款开源的 Youtube 影像资源音频播放器，把 YouTube 整站的视频以音频的方式集合到了一起。Headset 支持直接搜索 YouTube 资源，你可以在搜索栏里输入视频的标题、播放列表，甚至是所属专辑名称；同时这款软件也提供了默认的热门收藏列表供你挑选，你可以在收藏列表里挑选更多的音乐单曲，并标记「喜欢」、保存至你自创的收藏列表。此外，Radio 频道由 Reddit 众多电台子节点导入进来的架构组成，可以在这里欣赏到 Reddit 网友们推荐的好歌曲。

description.name: IG:dm Messenger
description.description: IG:dm Messenger is a desktop application for Instagram direct messages. You can simply continue your chats from your phones to your computers. It allows you to search for users and start chat, view the list of users not following you back, quote a chat message, and view chat images.
description.slogan: Continue Instagram DMs on your PC.

description.name: IG:dm Messenger
description.description: IG:dm Messenger是一款Instagram桌面客户端。目前支持上传图片、查看图片、点赞、评论、搜索等常用功能。可以搜索用户、支持查看取消关注列表，可以直接引用聊天信息。
description.slogan: 在电脑上继续你的ins社交。

description.name: Joplin
description.description: Joplin is a free, open source note taking and to-do application, which can handle a large number of notes organised into notebooks. The notes are searchable, can be copied, tagged and modified either from the applications directly or from your own text editor. The notes are in Markdown format. Notes exported from Evernote via .enex files can be imported into Joplin. The notes can be synchronised with various targets including the file system or with Microsoft OneDrive.
description.slogan: Keep trace of your notes and to-dos.

description.name: Joplin
description.description: Joplin是一款笔记和待办事项的应用程序，笔记采用Markdown格式，可以处理笔记本组织成的大量笔记。支持笔记搜索功能，可以直接从应用程序复制、标记和修改，也可以从自己的文本编辑器进行修改。  可以通过.enex文件从Evernote导出Notes并导入到Joplin中。 笔记可以与各种笔记工具同步。

description.name: Krusader
description.description: Krusader is an advanced orthodox file manager for KDE and other desktops in the Unix world. It supports extensive archive handling, mounted filesystem support, FTP, advanced search, viewer/editor, directory synchronisation, file content comparisons, batch renaming, etc. It supports the following archive formats: tar, ZIP, bzip2, gzip, RAR, ace, ARJ, LHA, 7z and RPM and can handle other KIO Slaves such as smb or fish.
description.slogan: Manage your files with twin panels.

description.name: Krusader
description.description: Krusader 是一款双面板文件管理工具，功能和 Total Commander 相似，能够处理广泛的压缩文件格式，支持挂载文件系统，包含 FTP 功能，具有高级的搜索模块，内置查看、编辑功能，还有目录同步、文件内容比较、批量重命名等许多功能。

description.name: LosslessCut
description.description: LosslessCut is an simple, cross platform tool for lossless trimming / cutting of video and audio files. Great for rough processing of large video files taken from a video camera, GoPro, drone, etc. It lets you quickly extract the good parts from your videos and discard GBs of data without losing quality. It doesn't do any decoding/encoding and is therefore extremely fast. Also allows for taking JPEG snapshots of the video at the selected time.
description.slogan: Lossless and efficient, cut what you want!

description.name: LosslessCut
description.description: LosslessCut是一款视频剪切软件，用于无损修剪/切割视频和音频文件。 非常适用于从视频摄像机，GoPro，无人机等拍摄的大型视频文件的粗加工。 它不执行任何解码/编码，因此非常快。可以将指定时间的视频截图为JPG格式,还支持最常见的音频格式的无损切割。

description.name: Luppp
description.description: Luppp is a music creation tool, intended for live use. It allows loading & recording audio loops on multiple tracks while applying effects to them in real time. With extensive MIDI mapping support, you can get looping just how you like!
description.slogan: Create live music in real time!

description.name: Luppp
description.description: Luppp是专为现场演出的音乐创作工具。它允许在多个轨道上加载和记录音频循环，并实时对其应用效果。借助广泛的MIDI映射支持，您可以按照自己喜欢的方式循环播放！

description.name: Maltego
description.description: Maltego is an interactive data mining tool that renders directed graphs for link analysis. The tool is used in online investigations for finding relationships between pieces of information from various sources located on the Internet. It uses the idea of transforms to automate the process of querying different data sources.

description.name: Maltego
description.description: Maltego是一款互联网情报收集工具，它允许你从一个Email，或者Twitter，或是网站，甚至姓名等等，能找到一个人千丝万缕的联系，并把这些联系整合，利用起来整合数据，并允许用户很大程度上的自定义，从而实现整合出最适合用 户的“情报拓扑”。

description.name: Mailspring
description.description: Mailspring is a powerful email client. It lets you create unlimited custom signatures and use them across all the accounts in your unified inbox. Supports every major mail provider—Gmail, iCloud, Office 365, Outlook.com, Yahoo!, and IMAP/SMTP—so you have a single, streamlined command center for all your messages. Mailspring can translate messages written in English into Spanish, Russian, simplified Chinese, French, and German with spell checking.

description.name: Mailspring
description.description: Mailspring是一款邮件客户端，支持多种在线邮箱，统一收发件箱，强大的搜索功能和通讯录，支持阅读回执和链接跟踪，可以设置延迟发送，可以自定义主题样式。
description.slogan: 从阅读邮件开始新一天。

description.name: MathMod
description.description: MathMod is a mathematical modeling software that visualize and animate implicit and parametric surfaces. It supports: 3D and 4D plotting and animation, OBJ output file format, Textue and pigmentation support, Noise and Turbulence effects support, Large set of scripted examples.

description.name: MathMod
description.description: MathMod是一款数学建模工具，可以对隐式和参数曲面进行可视化和动画处理。支持3D和4D绘图和动画，OBJ输出文件格式，Textue和色素支持，噪声和湍流效果支持，大量脚本示例。

description.name: MellowPlayer
description.description: MellowPlayer is a free, open source and cross-platform desktop application. Many web-based music streaming services are supported. Plugin based application, you can add support for a new service by writing a plugin.
description.slogan: Cloud music integration for your desktop!

description.name: MellowPlayer
description.description: MellowPlayer是一款集成式在线流媒体工具，可以用来启动多种流行的网络音乐和视频流媒体服务，支持桌面通知和隐藏图托盘功能，可以保存播放历史记录，支持插件扩展。

description.name: Mixnode
description.description: Mixnode is an online streaming music player. It's Mixcloud's unofficial desktop client with a wide range of music and DJ resources, and playlist creation. In addition, Mixcloud also supports podcasts and radio programs, built in a number of popular network podcast services.
description.slogan: Help you find the best radio station.

description.name: Mixnode
description.description: Mixnode是一款在线流媒体音乐播放软器，是Mixcloud的非官方桌面客户端。，拥有相当广泛的音乐和DJ资源，支持创建播放列表。此外Mixcloud还支持播客和广播节目，内置了不少流行的网络播客服务。

description.name: mpv
description.description: mpv is a media player based on MPlayer and mplayer2. It supports a wide variety of video file formats, audio and video codecs, and subtitle types. It has an OpenGL based video output that is capable of many features loved by videophiles, such as video scaling with popular high quality algorithms, color management, frame timing, interpolation, HDR, and more. It leverages the FFmpeg hwaccel APIs to support VDPAU, VAAPI, DXVA2, VDA and VideoToolbox video decoding acceleration. mpv can be used as a library and easy integrated into other apps.
description.slogan: Play your videos without any trouble.

description.name: mpv
description.description: mpv是一款基于MPlayer和mplayer2的全能播放器，支持各种视频格式、音频解码、支持特效字幕（电影动漫的ass特效字幕都没啥问题），不仅支持本地播放，同样支持网络播放。重点是 MPV 具有多系统平台支持、命令行、自定义、GPU 解码、脚本支持等特点。
description.slogan: 极简全能播放器, 开发者的首选。

description.name: MultiBootUSB
description.description: MultiBootUSB is a cross platform software written in python which allows you to install multiple live linux on a USB disk non destructively and option to uninstall distros. Try out the world's first true cross platform multi boot live usb creator for free.

description.name: MultiBootUSB
description.description: MultiBootUSB是一款Linux系统多重启动工具，不管你用多少个发行版，都可以统一使用一个 USB 设备来启动或者安装。制作时可以镜像的体积大小、USB 设备的写入速度等等。一个镜像制作完毕后可以载入第二个继续制作。

description.name: Museeks
description.description: Museeks is a simple, clean and cross-platform music player. It provides music shuffle or loop, light and dark theme, playback speed control, sleep mode blocker, and supports formats: MP3, MP4, M4A/AAC, FLAC, WAV, OGG, 3GPP.

description.name: Museeks
description.description: Museeks 是一款音乐播放器，支持 m4a、aac、mp4、flac、wav、ogg 格式的音乐文件。支持快速添加本地文件夹，快速建立、更新你的音乐库，而且支持播放列表管理，播放速率控制、黑白两色主题以及播放时免休眠的控制机制。可以隐藏到托盘，支持桌面通知。

description.name: Mythruna
description.description: Mythruna is a sandbox game that combines serious role playing elements with an endless, living, and completely modifiable randomly generated sandbox world. If you like minecraft (although it's different) you'll like this.

description.name: Mythruna
description.description: Mythruna是沙盒角色扮演类游戏，其游戏原理类似于《当个创世神》，玩家可以在游戏中与周围的环境进行互动，风靡有趣。这也就意味着你可以控制游戏中任何因素并进行破坏，修复和建筑等等。

description.name: Musixmatch
description.description: Musixmatch is the world’s largest collection of song lyrics. Link your Apple Music or your Spotify Premium account to stream the music directly from Musixmatch. Musixmatch lyrics come with their translation. Fire up your favorite song and learn a new language in a fun way. Select your favourite part of any lyrics and share it with beautiful backgrounds and cool fonts.

description.name: Musixmatch
description.description: Musixmatch是一款在线音乐播放工具，有着非常强大的歌词同步功能。支持歌词同步翻译功能，听外语歌曲也毫无障碍。可以识别周围播放的音乐，包括电台、电视台、其他任何音频源。

description.name: NATTT
description.description: NATTT is your tracking mate. It helps you keep track of your work and time you have spent. Just create a new task or use an existing task. It will ask you what you are doing from time to time. You don't have to remind yourself. Work offline, if you are back online, automatically sync your data across all your devices in real time. To get an overview, just go to the calendar or export your data.

description.name: NATTT
description.description: NATTT是一款任务跟踪工具， 它可以帮助你跟踪你的工作和时间。它会不时问你你在做什么，支持离线工作，如果您重新上线，就会实时自动同步所有设备上的数据。 要获得总览，只需转到日历或导出数据。

description.name: NetHack
description.description: NetHack is a single player dungeon exploration game that runs on a wide variety of computer systems, with a variety of graphical and text interfaces all using the same game engine. Unlike many other Dungeons & Dragons-inspired games, the emphasis in NetHack is on discovering the detail of the dungeon and not simply killing everything in sight - in fact, killing everything in sight is a good way to die quickly.

description.name: NetHack
description.description: NetHack是一款单人冒险探索游戏。 玩家需要选择自己所扮演的角色并指定性别、种族、职业和阵营，或者选择让系统随机产生一个角色。玩家的角色和阵营决定了其在游戏中需要侍奉的神灵。玩家需要从第一层开始不断的向下探索，在不断的探索中发现游戏的魅力。

description.name: Nootka
description.description: Nootka is an application to learn classical score notation. It helps to understand the rules of reading and writing scores and helps with developing skills of playing and singing notes. It has: interactive interface to discover the rules of musical notation; exercises with possibility to create own sets; accurate method for detecting sung and played sounds and melodies; natural sound of guitars; clefs (treble, bass and others) and grand stave; result analysis; different kinds of guitars and theirs tuning; and multi-language translations.

description.name: Nootka
description.description: Nootka是一款非常优秀的乐谱学习软件，可以用来学习古典乐谱记谱法，用准确的方法来检测歌唱和播放的声音和旋律，有助于发展演奏和演唱技巧。非常适合想要提高演奏和演唱技巧的人！

description.name: Nuclear
description.description: Nuclear is an online music player that allows you to get music from multiple sources. You can search for favorite music or albums, create custom playlists, or download your favorite music to the local for play.
description.slogan: Listen to new music every day.

description.name: Nuclear
description.description: Nuclear是一款在线音乐播放器，可以从多个来源流获取音乐资源，您可以搜索喜欢的音乐或者专辑，创建自定义播放列表，也可以将喜欢的音乐下载到本地播放。

description.name: Nuvola
description.description: Nuvola Apps is a runtime for web-based music streaming services providing more native user experience and integration with Linux desktop environments than usual web browsers can offer. It integrates a wide variety of music streaming web apps as well as generic web apps. Nuvola handles multimedia keys, shows desktop notifications, integrates with various sound indicators, media player applets, GNOME lock screen and launchers and more.

description.name: Nuvola Player
description.description: Nuvola是一款网络音乐服务集成工具，它可以将网络音乐服务运行在桌面上，看起来和客户端应用一样，并且可以实现更多的桌面功能，当你安装了Nuvola之后需要自己安装需要的音乐服务。注意安装的网络应用通常会比本地应用占用的内存要多一些。
description.slogan: 将各种云音乐整合到桌面。

description.name: Nuke
description.description: Nuke offers cutting-edge toolkits for node-based compositing, editorial and review. It is 3D compositor, designed to streamline day-to-day workflow. Flexible, efficient and feature packed, this toolset delivers film-grade results, fast. The perfect choice for compositors, lighters and animators after a robust toolset for compositing tasks.

description.name: Nuke
description.description: Nuke是The Foundry公司发布的一款强大的影视后期特效合成工具，该软件经历了10年的历练，具有先进的将最终视觉效果与电影电视的其余部分无缝结合的能力，无论所需应用的视觉效果是什么风格或者有多复杂，都可以轻松的胜任，为视频人员提供了高素质的创作能力。包括实时组预览，时间去噪，镜头扭曲，时间轴磁盘缓存等功能，可视化脚本诊断功能，可以更好的帮助识别脚本中可能的优化区域。
description.slogan: 轻松胜任影片后期制作。

description.name: OCRFeeder
description.description: OCRFeeder is a document layout analysis and optical character recognition system. Given the images it will automatically outline its contents, distinguish between what's graphics and text and perform OCR over the latter. It generates multiple formats being its main one ODT.

description.name: OCRFeeder
description.description: OCRFeeder是一款文本光学识别工具。 支持图片识别，它会自动区分什么是图形和文字，然后识别出图像中的字符，可以生成多种格式，主要的格式是ODT。另外OCRFeeder还支持扫描识别一步到位，直接从扫描仪获取图像进行识别。

description.name: ODrive
description.description: ODrive is an application to make cloud storage. It makes any cloud storage unified, synchronized, shareable, and encrypted. Your cloud files work like local files, any changes automatically sync with the cloud. Securely share weblinks to files and folder, or make sharing a group experience and invite whoever you want to sync any odrive folder. Odrive uses zero-knowledge encryption to protect your data before it leaves your computer.
description.slogan: Sync your files and folders simply.

description.name: ODrive
description.description: ODrive是一款云端存储工具。可以让所有云存储统一同步，共享和加密。让云端文件像本地文件一样工作，任何更改都会自动与云同步。安全地共享网页链接，或共享到群组。Odrive使用zero-knowledge加密来保护数据。
description.slogan: 简化文件同步的复杂度。

description.name: OneNote
description.description: Microsoft OneNote is a suite tool for free-form information access and multi-user collaboration. It can be used to record notes directly, but also be used to collect printed "pages" or pages sent by other applications. The page can be moved inside the binder with annotating, text processing or drawing,  audio or web links can also be embedded multimedia.

description.name: OneNote
description.description: OneNote是一套用于自由形式的信息获取以及多用户协作工具。可用于直接记录笔记，但也可用于收集打印的“页面”，或由其他应用程序发送过来的页面。页面可以在活页夹内部移动，同时可通过电子墨水技术添加注释，处理文字，或绘图，并且其中还可内嵌多媒体影音或Web链接。
description.slogan: 创意在 OneNote 中成型。

description.name: Paintstorm Studio
description.description: Paintstorm Studio is a professional sofware for digital painting. It's featured with incredible passibilities for brush settings, full control of all brush options, stroke post correction, dynamic interface, custom panels, individual hotkeys for any brush.
description.slogan: Painting has never been so delightful!

description.name: Paintstorm Studio
description.description: Paintstorm Studio是一款电脑绘画工具，支持丰富的画笔选择功能、自定义面板、支持PS图象处理软件PSD和ABR等功能，支持数位板操作，对笔压和倾斜的识别度良好。

description.name: OpenOffice
description.description: OpenOffice is an open-source office productivity software suite containing word processor, spreadsheet, presentation, graphics, formula editor, and database management applications. It is available in many languages, stores data in ODF, and is able to read and write files in the format used by the most common office suite packages. OpenOffice supports exporting files in PDF format, and has supported extensions, making easy to add new functionality.
description.slogan: Free office suite, open standard format.

description.name: OpenOffice
description.description: OpenOffice是一款先进的开源办公软件套件，它包含文本文档、电子表格、演示文稿、绘图、数据库等。它能够支持许多语言，其功能绝对不比微软的MS Office还差，不但可以有Word一样的字处理，制作简单的图形，更有功能强大的图表功能，也能编写网页，还可以做出MS Office中很难处理的数学符号等等，支持了XML、微软的doc、Excel、ppt文件等格式。如果你已经有使用其它办公软件包的经验，你会发现OpenOffice很容易上手。

description.name: pCloud
description.description: pCloud is the secure place, where you can store, share and work on all your files from laptop, phone or the web, and access them wherever you are. It allows you to collaborate with friends and colleagues by sharing a link, even if they don't have a pCloud account. Sign up and get up to 20 GB free storage space.

description.name: pCloud
description.description: pCloud 是一款云存储平台，支持PC端、多系统移动端，支持公开文件夹给访客上传文件 远程上传和离线下载，支持中文界面;其中特色服务就是支持开放 API ，支持HTTPS加密，免费提供20G，连接至 OneDrive 可增加至 50G 永久空间。
description.slogan: 无论上哪，文件总是如影随形。

description.name: ParaView
description.description: ParaView is an open-source, multi-platform data analysis and visualization application. ParaView users can quickly build visualizations to analyze their data using qualitative and quantitative techniques. The data exploration can be done interactively in 3D or programmatically using ParaView’s batch processing capabilities.

description.name: ParaView
description.description: ParaView是一款数据分析和可视化工具，可以使用定性和定量技术快速构建可视化来分析其数据。 数据探索可以使用ParaView的批处理功能在3D中以交互方式完成或以编程方式完成。

description.name: Phoduit
description.description: Phoduit is a non-destructive photo editor with a node-based user interface. Phoduit includes all of the nodes you need to make photo editing fast. Mix nodes together to perform techniques like tone mapping, frequency separation, or experiment and develop your own. Nodes give you the freedom to make any change in any order and see the result in real time. It supports fast batch processing, CMYK soft proofing, color management, 16-bits per channel.

description.name: Phoduit
description.description: Phoduit是一款图片编辑工具，可以基于节点无损的编辑照片，每个处理步骤都可以成为一个节点，你可以自由的按照任意顺序进行节点更改，也可以将批量处理相似图形归纳为同一个节点。

description.name: Persepolis Download Manager
description.description: Persepolis is a ready-to-use client for aria 2 to download files on the network. It supports protocols such as HTTP / HTTPS, FTP, SFTP, BitTorrent, and Metalink. Featured with  multi-threaded download, multi-protocol support, BT client and remote access without system resources consumed.

description.name: Persepolis Download Manager
description.description: Persepolis Download Manager是一款即开即用的 aria2 客户端，用来下载网络上的文件，支持 HTTP / HTTPS，FTP，SFTP，BitTorrent 和 Metalink 等协议。aria2 不占用系统资源，支持多线程下载、多协议支持、BT 客户端，支持远程访问。

description.name: Pixeluvo
description.description: Pixeluvo is a beautifully designed image and photo editor, covers from simple photo cropping and resizing to complex image manipulations and effects. It contains a wide range of advanced features including non-destructive editing via adjustment layers, full support for raw image formats, powerful color correction tools, realistic pressure-sensitive drawing tools and many image enhancement filters.

description.name: Pixeluvo
description.description: Pixeluvo是一款图像编辑工具，涵盖简单的照片裁剪和调整大小和复杂的图像操作和效果。 支持调整大小、裁剪、旋转功能，带有图层管理器，更是具有强大的色彩校正工具和逼真的压力绘图工具和许多图像增强滤镜。
description.slogan: 编辑和特效，让图片出彩。

description.name: PomoDoneApp
description.description: PomoDoneApp is the easiest way to track your workflow using Pomodoro technique, on top of your current task management service. PomoDoneApp chrome extension allows you to create tasks right from the browser (Mac & Win version only).

description.name: PomoDoneApp
description.description: PomoDoneApp 是一款时钟工具，可以与云端任务服务整合同步，帮你给这些待办清单、专案管理工具添加原本没有的时钟功能。它能够帮助用户快速的记录待办事项，并支持用户设置提醒，而且所有事件将以日期的形式进行排列，便于用户的预览。
description.slogan: 给工作表插上高效的翅膀。

description.name: Popcorn Time
description.description: Popcorn Time constantly searched all over the web for the best torrents from the most important sites. You can immediately watch the newest high-definition movie and TV play with subtitles. It's fully free.
description.slogan: Watch movie and TV play immediately.

description.name: Popcorn Time
description.description: Popcorn Time是一款免费看国外电影和国外电视剧的播放器工具，无需完全下载就可以直接播放YTS网站里的高清电影，并且能够加载外挂字幕文件，没有任何形式的广告，支持以高清和全高清分辨率查看内容。

description.name: Postman
description.description: Postman is a powerful GUI platform to make your API development faster & easier, from building API requests through testing, documentation and sharing. It's built on a single underlying layer, ensuring consistent performance and user experience.

description.name: Postman
description.description: Postman是一款强大的网页调试工具，提供功能强大的 Web API & HTTP 请求调试。我们可以用来很方便的模拟get或者post或者其他方式的请求来调试接口。能够发送任何类型的HTTP 请求 (GET, HEAD, POST, PUT..)，附带任何数量的参数+ headers。

description.name: ProtonMail
description.description: ProtonMail is an encrypted email service client. It brings you easy-to-use email encryption with seamless PGP peer-to-peer encryption technology. It also offers a modern user interface and various innovative features, such as customizable swiping gestures.

description.name: ProtonMail
description.description: ProtonMail是一款加密电子邮件服务客户端，通过无缝对接的PGP点对点加密技术为你带来了易于使用的电子邮件加密功能。同时还提供了现代化的用户界面以及多种创新的功能，例如可自定义的划动手势以及发送可过期的电子邮件。

description.name: Pydio
description.description: Pydio, is an open-source file-sharing and synchronisation software that runs on the user's own server or in the cloud. It differs from solutions such as Google Drive or Dropbox, not based on a public cloud, but connects to the user's existing storages as well as to the existing user directories, which allows companies to keep their data inside their infrastructure.

description.name: Pydio
description.description: Pydio是一个开源的文件共享和同步平台，为开发人员和企业系统管理员设计。它采用直观的用户界面(web /移动/桌面)，并在您的服务器和云安全托管。Pydio提供企业级特性来获得控制和隐私数据。
description.slogan: 搭建企业级的网盘空间。

description.name: VNC Viewer
description.description: VNC Connect is the industry’s most flexible and secure remote access software. It supports remote access for friends and family, feature-rich and secure remote access for departments and small businesses, powerful, flexible and ultra-secure remote access for the enterprise.

description.name: VNC Viewer
description.description: VNC Connect是远程控制工具，在需要被控制端远程电脑安装VNC Server之后，还需要本地安装VNC Viewer来控制远程电脑，VNC支持多种操作系统，因此可将VNC Server及VNC viewer分别安装在不同的操作系统中进行控制，也可以通过一般的网页浏览器来控制被控端。

description.name: REAPER
description.description: REAPER is a complete digital audio production application for Windows and OS X, offering a full multitrack audio and MIDI recording, editing, processing, mixing and mastering toolset. It supports a vast range of hardware, digital formats and plugins, and can be comprehensively extended, scripted and modified.

description.name: REAPER
description.description: REAPER是一款数字音频制作应用程序，包含多轨录音、音频混缩、MIDI编辑与母带处理等多项功能,采用64位音频引擎，支持目前流行的各类DX、VST音频插件与软音源，并自带多个品质出色的音频效果器。
description.slogan: 卓越工具缔造史诗音效。

description.name: Riot.im
description.description: Riot.im is an integrated collaborative environment for integrating different conversations and applications into one program. Chat supports text, image, video and file sharing, voice and video call, viewing read receipt, email reminder for missing messages, interaction with robots and integrated third-party applications.
description.slogan: Open a new way to communicate.

description.name: Riot.im
description.description: Riot.im是一款集成协作环境，可将不同的对话和应用程序集成到一个应用程序中。聊天支持文字、图片、视频和文件分享，支持语音和视频通话功能，可以查看阅读回执，错过的消息支持邮件提醒，支持与机器人和集成的第三方应用程序交互。

description.name: Rider
description.description: Rider is a cross-platform .NET IDE by JetBrains. It's featured with code editing, code analysis, navigation and search, refactorings, unit test runner, debugger and more tools. Rider provides 2500+ live code inspections, hundreds of context actions and refactorings brought by ReSharper, and combines them with the IntelliJ platform's solid IDE features.

description.name: Rider
description.description: Rider是一款.NET集成开发环境，包含快速修复、检测、智能导航、反编译等功能。支持.NET Framework与Mono。它可以加载MSBuild与MSBuild解决方案，以及DNX项目。可以构建并运行.NET Framework、Mono与DNX项目，并且可以调试.NET与Mono应用。

description.name: Robo 3T
description.description: Robo 3T (formerly Robomongo) is the free lightweight GUI for MongoDB enthusiasts. It embeds real MongoDB shell, provides real autocompletion, not only analyzes the semantic of the code, but also executes it in an internal JavaScript VM. All operations are done asynchronously and do not block main application thread. This makes Robo 3T feel light and snappy.

description.name: Robo 3T
description.description: Robo 3T是专为MongoDB用户打造的一款强大数据库管理软件，该插件可以大大地提高开发者的效率，完美解决各类数据存储解决方案，MongoDB提供了一个直观的代码编辑区域，用户可以直接进行数据库的编辑操作，同时还拥有数据库查询、导入以及导出等操作。
description.slogan: 用新壳，数据管理更直观。

description.name: RuneScape
description.description: RuneScape is a popular free massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) in the world. It is able to be played on PC, and mobile. RuneScape takes place in the fantasy-themed realm of Gielinor, which is divided into several different kingdoms, regions, and areas. Players can travel throughout the gaming world on foot, by using magical teleportation spells or devices or mechanical means of transportation. Each region offers different types of monsters, materials, and quests to challenge players.

description.name: RuneScape
description.description: RuneScape是一款大型多人在线角色扮演游戏。该游戏以丰富的剧情、庞大的交易系统和可玩性、灵活性极强著称。不需要安装客户端，但需要安装Java方可运行。它以独创的世界“杰林诺”（Gielinor）为主题，玩家扮演一位冒险者，在这个世界探险，完成任务，还可以与其他玩家PK、交易等。

description.name: SafeEyes
description.description: SafeEyes is a free and open source software which protects your eyes from eye strain using continuous breaks reminder. It supports an optional strict break for computer addicts, shows notifications before every break, disables the keyboard during break, supports multi-workspace and multi-monitor, with elegant and customizable design. It is extensible with plug-ins, supports multiple languages around the world.

description.name: SafeEyes
description.description: SafeEyes是一款健康定时器，用于智能提示你离开显示器，休息一下，减少和防止重复性劳损（RSI）。每当你使用电脑时间过长，可以强制你去做一下运动，显示器会被锁定。支持多显示器，支持系统通知和声音提示，可以通过插件扩展。
description.slogan: 你的眼睛需要休息一会了。

description.name: Scrabble3D
description.description: Scrabble3D is a highly customizable Scrabble game. It supports board in OpenGL graphics with user-definable wavefront model, non-standard digraphs like CH, RR, LL and option for right-to-left reading. You can play local against the computer or connect to a game server to find other players.

description.name: Scrabble3D
description.description: Scrabble3D是一款高度可定制的拼字游戏，不仅支持经典拼字游戏和超级拼图游戏，还支持3D游戏和自定义棋盘。 您可以使用本地电脑单机游戏或连接到游戏服务器来查找其他玩家。

description.name: SeaMonkey
description.description: SeaMonkey is an all-in-one Internet application suite. It supports most functions of mozilla browser and continues to develop and provides high quality updates. Including Internet browsers, e-mail and newsgroup client, HTML editors, IRC chat and web development tools.

description.name: SeaMonkey
description.description: SeaMonkey是一款一体式互联网应用套件的，它继承了mozilla浏览器套件的大部分功能，并继续开发并提供高质量的更新。 包含互联网浏览器，电子邮件和新闻组客户端，包含网络馈送阅读器，HTML编辑器，IRC聊天和Web开发工具。
description.slogan: 一体式互联网应用套件。

description.name: Signal
description.description: Signal is a free messaging tool with most scalable encryption. Using Signal, you can communicate instantly, create groups, and send text, voice, video, document, and picture messages all with complete privacy. The server never has access to any of your communication and never stores any of your data. There are no ads, no affiliate marketers, no creepy tracking.
description.slogan: Privacy that fits in your pocket.

description.name: Signal
description.description: Signal是一款加密通信工具，这款应用的私密性和安全性非常高，在保障你短信私密安全的同时，它还不会记录你任何的信息数据，除此之外，该软件还支持群聊功能。

description.name: SeaMonkey
description.description: SeaMonkey is an all-in-one Internet application suite. It supports most functions of mozilla browser and continues to develop and provides high quality updates. Including Internet browsers, e-mail and newsgroup client, HTML editors, IRC chat and web development tools.

description.name: SeaMonkey
description.description: SeaMonkey是一款一体式互联网应用套件的，它继承了mozilla浏览器套件的大部分功能，并继续开发并提供高质量的更新。 包含互联网浏览器，电子邮件和新闻组客户端，包含网络馈送阅读器，HTML编辑器，IRC聊天和Web开发工具。
description.slogan: 一体式互联网应用套件。

description.name: Spring Tool Suite
description.description: The Spring Tool Suite is an Eclipse-based development environment that is customized for developing Spring applications.  It supports application targeting to local, virtual and cloud-based servers. It is freely available for development and internal business operations use with no time limits, fully open-source and licensed under the terms of the Eclipse Public License.

description.name: Spring Tool Suite
description.description: Spring Tool Suite是编程软件Spring的辅助工具，功能上和eclipse差不多，支持Spring核心框架、Spring Integration、Spring Batch、Spring Webflow、Spring Data等等。通过Spring Tool Suite，可以很轻易地生成一个spring的工程，比如web工程，而且工程里的配置文件都会自动为你生成。

description.name: Spring:1944
description.description: Spring:1944 is a free WWII themed 3D multiplayer game based on the libre Spring RTS Engine. Games on average take 40 minutes and feature up to 6 factions battling to the last man standing. All factions are complete with several types of infantry, towed and self-propelled guns, normal and rocket artillery, tanks, aircraft and littoral naval assets. The game supports big matches with thousands of units and double digit player counts. It lets you play either as one of the axis powers, or one of the allies, or even the Sweeden neutral faction.

description.name: Spring:1944
description.description: Spring:1944是一款二战背景的即时战略游戏，基于免费的SpringRTS引擎的WWII主题3D多人游戏。平均每场比赛需要40分钟，最多有6个阵营和最后一个存活的阵营获胜。所有派系都有几种类型的步兵，自行火炮，火箭炮，坦克，飞机和沿海海军资产。游戏支持数千个单位和两位数的玩家数量的大型比赛。

description.name: Super Productivity
description.description: Super Productivity is a simple free flexible ToDo List / Time Tracker / personal Jira and Github Task Manager. With it, you can plan your tasks with an clean and easy to use interface, track your time automatically, create time sheets and work summaries in a breeze, easily integrate with Jira and Github, order your tasks in a clean local ToDo list, automatically create worklogs and get notified right away, when something changes. What is more, a full history of all your work available, you can export a monthly time sheet for your employer.

description.name: Super Productivity
description.description: Super Productivity是一款待办列表/时间跟踪器/个人Jira和Github任务管理器。 有了它，您可以使用简洁易用的界面来规划您的任务，自动追踪时间，轻松创建时间表和工作总结，轻松与Jira和Github集成，将您的任务排列在干净的本地待办事项列表中，自动 创建工作日志并在事情发生变化时立即得到通知。 更重要的是，您可以获得所有工作的完整历史记录，您可以为您的雇主出口每月时间表。

description.name: SwitchHosts
description.description: SwitchHosts is an application for hosts management & switching with powerful functions. It supports to edit host files and switch between several solutions. Users can quickly add their own host analysis rules.

description.name: SwitchHosts
description.description: SwitchHosts是一款host编辑和切换工具，支持直接对host文件进行编辑，用户可以快速添加自己的host解析规则，SwitchHosts也支持在多个host方案直接快速的切换。

description.name: Sylaps
description.description: Sylaps is a convenient messaging tool for you to make a conversation just by sending one click. By connecting your social networks to Sylaps, you can start conversations with any of your contacts and invite them to participate even if they are not in the same network. Sylaps has been built with enterprise-grade security. All your data are encrypted and we assure you very high-quality audio and video and no size limit for file transfer.

description.name: Sylaps
description.description: Sylaps是一款即时通讯工具，通过将社交网络连接到Sylaps，您可以开始与任何联系人进行对话，即使他们不在同一个网络中也可以邀请加入。 Sylaps已经建立了企业级安全。 您的所有数据都经过加密，可以保证高质量的音频和视频通话，并且没有文件传输的大小限制。
description.slogan: 轻而易举的联系到任何人。

description.name: TeamViewer Host
description.description: TeamViewer Host is a tool to remotely connect with computer. It established incoming and outgoing remote desktop and computer-to-computer connections for real-time support or access to files, networks and programs. Collaborate online, participate in meetings, chat with other people or groups, and make video calls in one-click. After downloading and installing this software, you’ll have your first session up and running within seconds.

description.name: TeamViewer Host
description.description: TeamViewer Host 一款电脑远程连接工具，它是TeamViewer去除了控制端功能的简化版本，用途就是将电脑设置为一个可供其他人随时进行连接的服务器端系统。可以在任何防火墙和 NAT 代理的后台用于远程控制，桌面共享和文件传输的软件。第一次启动会在两台计算机上自动生成伙伴 ID。只需要输入你的伙伴的 ID 到 TeamViewer，就会立即建立起连接。

description.name: Textadept
description.description: Textadept is an ideal editor for programmers who want endless extensibility without sacrificing speed or succumbing to code bloat and featuritis. It understands the syntax and structure of more than 100 different programming languages and recognizes hundreds of file types. Both the graphical version and the terminal version of Textadept support unlimited vertical and horizontal view splitting, even of the same file.
description.slogan: A minimalist and remarkably text editor.

description.name: Textadept
description.description: Textadept是一款文本编辑器。作为C和Lua的组合，多年来为了速度和极简主义而不断优化，支持文档和源代码编辑，甚至可以编译和运行简单的源文件，支持多选项卡和自动补全，内置高级搜索功能，可以查找和替换，还可跳转到所在行，支持自定义主题。

description.name: Thomas
description.description: Thomas is a simple pomodoro timer. Features: 25/5 minutes interval by default, but you can configure this; Built-in configurable keyboard shortcuts; Minimal log that contains all completed intervals counts per day; Tray icon and progress bar.

description.name: Thomas
description.description: Thomas是一款简易计时器，可以自由设置任务时间和任务完成后的休息时间，内置可配置的快捷键，会对每天完成的任务进行日志记录，可以显示在托盘中或进度栏上。

description.name: Tracktion
description.description: Tracktion is a digital audio workstation for recording and editing audio and MIDI for musicians, composers and songwriters. It features an intuitive, single-screen interface. Input, waveform and mixer – including EQ, level, pan and plugins – are laid out from left-to-right. Simply drag-and-drop additional features and automation on any track as needed. Unlimited numbers of audio and MIDI tracks, combined with a professional feature set, allow you to compose, record, edit, mix and share your music with ease.
description.slogan: Creative DAW tool for creative minds!

description.name: Tracktion
description.description: Tracktion 是一款介面新颖美观的 Audio + MIDI Sequencing 软件。所有工作都在一个一个视窗内完成。主要功能: 支持无限多个VST插件；独特的track-freezing功能可以在你的电脑无法实时处理音频时提供给你方便；无限UNDO/REDO；内置混响，4段均衡器，延迟，合唱，相位，压缩，低通滤波，音高变化效果；完整的MIDI音序器，有钢琴卷帘窗，支持步进录音和loop；完整的多轨音频功能，并且有时间伸缩功能；支持DirectSound和多通道ASIO；支持ReWire。

description.name: Trillian
description.description: Trillian is an all-in-one instant messaging utility. It imports all the contacts of your selected instant messaging platform (AOL Instant Messenger, Yahoo! Messenger, Google Talk, ICQ, Skype), and also directly access social networks (Facebook, Foursquare, Twitter, LinkedIn). The chat history is better organized, here you can actually select a date from the calendar to access a conversation, as well as view any images exchanged between you and your friends. What’s more, the chat history can be synced between your computer and your smart phone.
description.slogan: Keep your chats organized and synced.

description.name: Trillian
description.description: Trillian 是一款即时通讯软件。它兼容ICQ、MSN Messenger、雅虎通、IRC、AOL Instant Messenger 等各大即时通讯软件，还提供了对Facebook、Twitter、Linkedin、Foursquare账号的支持，功能包括多线编辑对话框、好朋友上线提醒、多重连接、强力的界面更换语言、可轻松汇入现有的联络名单、可更换面版的表情符号、登入、"整体"的离开/隐形功能，以及统一的联络名单。
description.slogan: 最适合你的集成聊天工具。

description.name: TuxCut
description.description: TuxCut is an open source program that protects Linux computers against arpspoof attacks and also helps to block unwanted users on the network. Features: hide your machine (ip/MAC) from arp scanner utilities; list all the live host in your LAN; cut the connection between any live host and the gateway; use wondershaper to control your upload or download speed limits.

description.name: TuxCut
description.description: TuxCut是一款计算机安全工具，可以保护你的Linux机器免受任何ARP攻击（如netcut）。还能扫描您的本地网络中的实况主机，并用MAC地址列出它们，更改您的网络适配器的MAC地址。

description.name: Ulauncher
description.description: Ulauncher is an application launcher for Linux provides instant search results. It also remembers your previous choices and automatically selects the best option for you.​ Type in an application name without worrying about spelling. Ulauncher will figure out what you meant. Improves your workflow with customizable shortcuts and extensions.

description.name: Ulauncher
description.description: Ulauncher是一款桌面启动器，启动后可以快速搜索和启动已安装的应用程序，浏览文件并打开文件夹，启动Google和维基百科，支持快捷键启动应用程序和搜索记录记忆功能。

description.name: Ubunsys
description.description: Ubunsys is a piece of software that gives the user a powerful control center to toggle on and off many system settings, it is able to change system configurations, system updates, executable improvements, small system fixes, and more at the touch of a button.

description.name: Ubunsys
description.description: Ubunsys是一款系统配置修改工具，它可以让您快速，轻松地切换开/关，启用/禁用和添加/删除系统一些核心功能，包括批量安装/删除应用程序和软件包，编辑/备份/导入sources.list，sudoers文件，启用/禁用防火墙，删除过时的内核等功能。
description.slogan: 赋予高级用户可怕的力量。

description.name: Ultimaker Cura
description.description: Ultimaker Cura is a 3D printer slicing application, creating a stable, reliable and seamless 3D printing experience. With it, novices can start printing right away and experts are able to customize 200 settings to achieve the best results for their models. It provides optimized profiles for Ultimaker materials; different settings for each object; plugins to create seamless integration with leading design and engineering software; supports STL, 3MF and OBJ file formats.

description.name: Ultimaker Cura
description.description: Ultimaker Cura是一款3D打印应用，它包含了所有3D打印需要的功能，有模型切片以及印表机控制两大部分。支持STL，3MF和OBJ文件格式。Pro/E 导出STL模型经过简单处理在导入到Cura3D打印软件经过详细的参数设计打印出实体。

description.name: Upterm
description.description: Upterm (formerly Black Screen) is an IDE in the world of terminals. Strictly speaking, it's both a terminal emulator and an interactive shell based on Electron. It shows the autocompletion box as you type and tries to be smart about what to suggest. Often you can find useful additional information on the right side of the autocompletion, e.g. expanded alias value, command descriptions, value of the previous directory (cd -), etc.

description.name: Upterm
description.description: Upterm是一款终端仿真器，它基于Electron，Upterm可以同时作为终端仿真器和命令行shell。会在您输入时显示自动填写框，并试图明智地提出建议，通常您可以在自动完成的右侧找到有用的附加信息。
description.slogan: 没有问题是命令无法解决的。

description.name: Vectr
description.description: Vectr is a simple yet powerful cross-platform vector graphics editor. It supports real-time collaboration and autosave. Others can watch your designs live, whether in the web or desktop version.

description.name: Vectr
description.description: Vectr是一款矢量图形编辑工具，可以轻松而直观地创作矢量图形，简洁而强大的线上及桌面跨平台工具，将您的设计转化为现实，可随时随地与任何人进行实时协作和同步，支持自动保存。

description.name: veracrypt
description.description: VeraCrypt is a free open source disk encryption software. It creates a virtual encrypted disk within a file and mounts it as a real disk; encrypts an entire partition or storage device; provides plausible deniability, in case an adversary forces you to reveal the password: Hidden volume (steganography) and hidden operating system. Encryption is automatic, real-time and transparent, and does not involve temporary unencrypted files. Parallelization and pipelining allow data to be read and written as fast as if the drive was not encrypted.

description.name: VeraCrypt
description.description: VeraCrypt是一款基于TrueCrypt的磁盘加密工具。你可以创建一个加密容器，或者加密磁盘，前者更加灵活也便于隐藏，后者就大只了，适合整个磁盘和 U 盘。然后选择算法，格式化，一个加密空间就完成了。并且支持二级加密，允许在卷内创建另一个“隐藏驱动卷”。
description.slogan: 一层加密不够，就来两层。

description.name: VueScan
description.description: VueScan is a scan application that provides the simplest way to make your scanner work. Whether you need to scan a single page, a hundred page book, photos, film or slide, VueScan has the tools to help you. It's featured with automatic document deskewing, automatic file naming, color correction, photoshop integration and so on.
description.slogan: The Tool For All Your Scanning Needs.

description.name: VueScan
description.description: VueScan是一款著名的第三方底片扫描仪驱动程序，支持市场可见绝大多数型号的底片扫描仪，可以更为灵活地控制扫描过程，更深入地发掘硬件潜力，获取色彩完美的高质量扫描结果。VueScan支持200种以上的底片类型，在剪取图像时制成关联单，复杂的白色平衡算法，用于检查物体表面暇疵的红外线底片扫描，成批扫描，自动剪取图像等等。
description.slogan: 让每台扫描仪都表现出彩。

description.name: weweChat
description.description: weweChat is an unofficial WeChat client that allows you to easily use Wechat on the desktop. It supports emoji, desktop notifications and keyboard shortcuts, you can drag and drop pictures or files.

description.name: weweChat
description.description: weweChat是一款非官方微信客户端，让你可以在桌面上登录和使用微信，支持动态表情包，支持桌面通知和键盘快捷键操作，可以直接拖拽发送图片或文件。

description.name: WebCatalog
description.description: WebCatalog is a free desktop app for macOS, Windows and Linux which allows you to install your favorite web apps as standalone apps. These standalone apps can stay on your dock, can notify you with notifications, can work as full-fledged desktop apps with resizable windows and multi-tasking support — which significantly boost your productivity.
description.slogan: Run Web Apps like Real Apps.

description.name: WebCatalog
description.description: WebCatalog是一款网页应用本地化工具，允许用户本地安装和运行任何Web应用程序。Gmail，Facebook Messenger和Instagram等网络应用程序越来越像桌面应用程序。 您可以在任何网站或Web应用程序中创建真实的桌面应用程序（在独立容器中运行），从而帮助您更高效地工作并保护您的隐私。

description.name: Wild Media Server
description.description: The Wild Media Server provides an easy way to network your home so your other devices can play your favorite music and videos stored on your computer. It supports customizing structure of media resources for each device and dynamic folders, loading the data about music from Gracenote.com (by song title, album, artist and fingerprint).

description.name: Wild Media Server
description.description: Wild Media Server是一款多媒体服务器应用，可以将电脑变成一个多媒体服务器，将电脑上的多媒体文件直接传输到局域网的设备上播放。具有强大的转码功能，客户端能够解码的影音文件直接传送过来播放，对于客户端不能解码的文件自动转码后播放。

description.name: Wings 3D
description.description: Wings 3D is an advanced subdivision modeler that is both powerful and easy to use. Wings 3D offers a wide range of modeling tools, a customizable interface, support for lights and materials, and a built-in AutoUV mapping facility. There is no support in Wings for animation.
