Features: context sensitive interface, configurable interface and hotkeys, wide range of Selection and Mesh tools, exports to common 3d file formats like .obj, UV mapper, Vertex Colors, Materials, and Lights.

description.name: Wings 3D
description.description: Wings 3D是一款3D建模工具，提供广泛的建模工具，可定制的界面，支持灯光和材料以及内置的AutoUV映射工具。特点：上下文相关的界面，可配置的界面和热键，多种选择和网格工具，导出到常见的3D文件格式，如.obj，UV mapper，Vertex Colors，Materials和Lights。

description.name: Wing IDE
description.description: Wing IDE is a Python IDE that makes interactive Python development fast, accurate, and fun. You can debug multi-process and multi-threaded code launched from the IDE, hosted in a web framework, called from an embedded Python instance, or invoked on a remote system. It offers hundreds of configuration options affecting editor emulation, UI layout, display themes, syntax coloring, and much more.
description.slogan: A powerful debugger and intelligent editor.

description.name: WingIDE
description.description: WingIDE 是一款Python 集成开发环境。为软件开发者提供了一个集成的工程管理器、图形界面的调试器、源代码浏览器，并预设了一个高级的源代码编辑器。支持代码语法高亮显示和多窗口功能。

description.name: Wire
description.description: Wire is a private, secure and awesome chat application. It's featured with group conversations, voice and video calls, no ads and email sign-up. You can do all operations by gestures.

description.name: Wire
description.description: Wire是一款科技感实足的聊天应用，有群组功能，可以语音通话，发送照片以及其独创性的打招呼方式 PING。Wire 的所有操作依靠手势来完成，比如向右滑回到联系人，在联系人界面向下滑创建聊天群组。

description.name: WordPress.com
description.description: WordPress.com is a blog content management tool. Write and design with no other browser tabs to distract you. Switch easily between managing your WordPress sites and your favorite desktop apps. It will scale to any size.
description.slogan: Create your own website or blog for free.

description.name: WordPress.com
description.description: WordPress.com是一款博客内容管理工具，可以用来管理WordPress.com站点以及自托管站点；包含应用内预览以及草稿自动保存功能，应用内通知集中展示博客评论、喜欢、关注状态。

description.name: xuanxuan
description.description: 喧喧是一款局域网即时通讯工具，需要配合然之协同办公系统使用，可以和服务器上的任何用户开聊，收发表情、图片、截屏、文件，支持讨论组、公开频道和系统提醒，内置消息管理器和通讯录。

description.name: 喧喧
description.description: 喧喧是一款局域网即时通讯工具，需要配合然之协同办公系统使用，可以和服务器上的任何用户开聊，收发表情、图片、截屏、文件，支持讨论组、公开频道和系统提醒，内置消息管理器和通讯录。

description.name: YakYak
description.description: YakYak is a desktop client for Google Hangouts. It supports to create/change conversations (rename, add people), leave/delete conversation, toggle notifications on/off, drag-drop, copy-paste or attach-button for image upload, send presence/focus/typing/activeclient to behave like a proper client withf alternative color schemes offered.

description.name: YakYak
description.description: YakYak是一款环聊桌面客户端，看起来非常像谷歌自己的环聊应用程序。 然而，在YakYak，你可以选择各种配色方案，包括黑暗模式。 您还可以设置适当的桌面通知，并且该应用程序可以在未安装Chrome的情况下运行。

description.name: Yarock
description.description: Yarock is a modern looking music player. It's designed to provide an easy and pretty music browser based on cover art. Yarock is easy to build with a minimal set of dependancies, and offers the choose of differents audio back-end.
description.slogan: Modern and elegant linux music player.

description.name: Yarock
description.description: Yarock是一款音乐播放器，功能丰富，不依赖于任何特定的桌面环境。 自带本地音乐浏览器，可以直接拖拽添加到播放列表，可以保存歌曲评分和播放次数，支持多种音频文件格式，内置音频均衡器，还支持最小窗口模式和流媒体广播服务。

description.name: Yong
description.description: Yong is a small but powerful Chinese input platform. It comes with seven input method, and supports Baidu, google, Microsoft, QQ and Sogou cloud input method. It supports all code sets, and allow you to custom your own word library and skin. What is more, you can freely built in or tag on.

description.name: 小小输入法
description.description: 小小输入法是一款中文输入法。 它支持百度，谷歌，微软，QQ和搜狗云端输入法。 支持所有的代码集，并允许您自定义您自己的词库和皮肤，也可以内置或外挂其他的输入法。注：安装后终端输入 im-config 手动选择输入发设置为 yong，注销后生效。

description.name: zaproxy
description.description: OWASP Zed Attack Proxy -an easy to use tool for finding vulnerabilities in web applications.

description.name: ZAProxy
description.description: ZAProxy是一款用于寻找Web应用程序漏洞的综合性渗透测试工具，同时它也易于使用。ZAP是为拥有丰富经验的安全研究人员设计的，同时，也是渗透测试新手用于开 发和功能测试的理想工具，它也提供一系列工具用于手动寻找安全漏洞。

description.name: Zeal
description.description: Zeal is a free cross-platform offline API documentation browser for software developers in Windows, Linux and BSD. It comes with 200 awesome docsets, including WordPress, Apache Server, Rust, CSS, jquery, Emacs, Sublime Text, Scala, C++, Bash, etc., and supports for creating your own. It supports searching, downloading and offline access to API docsets once you have downloaded.

description.name: Zeal
description.description: Zeal 是一个简单的离线 API 文档浏览器，仿照 Dash写成，支持多文档集搜索和自定义快捷键，支持离线编辑, 还提供有各种插件，能够与 Sublime、Vim、Atom、Emacs、IDEA 等文本编辑器或 IDE 集成使用，可以兼容所有的Dash文档。

description.name: Zelda Mystery of Solarus DX
description.description: The Legend of Zelda: Mystery of Solarus DX is set to be a direct sequel to The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past on the SNES, using the same graphics and game mechanisms. It is actually an enhanced remake of a first creation, Zelda: Mystery of Solarus. Its objectives are to correct the many flaws of its predecessor: the battle system, the bosses, the use of items, etc. However, that is hardly all of it, as new graphical elements and musics will accompany you throughout the game.

description.name: 塞尔达传说太阳神战士之谜 DX
description.description: 塞尔达传说太阳神战士之谜DX是国外同人游戏网站solarus-games以任天堂sfc经典名作《塞尔达传说众神的三角力量》以及《塞尔达传说梦见岛DX》的众多素材为原型制作的一款塞尔达传说同人游戏。游戏虽然是一款同人作品，但是素质却非常之高，同时对于原作的系统以及剧情的还原度做到了极致。游戏虽然流程不算特别长，但是解谜部分却非常带感，设计也相当巧妙。如果你喜欢动作解谜游戏，本作绝对不容错过！

description.name: Zelda Mystery of Solarus XD
description.description: Zelda Mystery of Solarus XD is a parodic game that we released on April 1st, 2011. Though it’s a big April 1st joke, it’s a real, full game with two huge dungeons and 5-10 hours of playing. It is made with the Solarus engine, just like Zelda Mystery of Solarus DX.
description.slogan: Take adventure in two huge dungeons.

description.name: 塞尔达传说太阳神战士之谜xd
description.description: 塞尔达传说太阳神战士之谜xd是一款解密冒险游戏，本是一个2011年4月1日的愚人节玩笑，但它是一个真实完整的游戏，拥有两个巨大的地下城和5-10小时的游戏时间。以任天堂sfc经典名作《塞尔达传说众神的三角力量》以及《塞尔达传说梦见岛DX》的众多素材为原型制作，并辅以众多原创解谜和剧情编排，让本作呈现出耀眼的光芒。

description.name: zelda-roth-se
description.description: Zelda Return of the Hylian Solarus Edition is a remake of the original Zelda Return of the Hylian, with the Solarus engine. For users interested in creating games with Solarus, this project is also a great source of scripts. All items are scripted, including the hammer, the hookshot and the bow. There is also an elaborate dungeon room system using separators, with automatic restoration of enemies and pots.
description.slogan: Remake of Zelda Return of the Hylian.

description.name: Zelda Return of the Hylian SE
description.description: Zelda Return of the Hylian SE是一款冒险解密游戏，是Zelda Return of the Hylian的重置版本，虽然游戏内容相同，但是制作更加精细。对于有兴趣使用Solarus创建游戏的用户来说，这个项目也是一个很好的脚本来源。 所有项目都是脚本化的，包括锤子，钩爪和弓，还有一个精心设计的地牢房间系统。
description.slogan: 和平之后将迎来新的冒险。

description.name: Zoom
description.description: Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, chat, and webinars across mobile, desktop, and room systems. Zoom Rooms is the original software-based conference room solution used around the world in board, conference, huddle, and training rooms, as well as executive offices and classrooms. Zoom helps businesses and organizations bring their teams together in a frictionless environment to get more done.

description.name: Zoom Cloud Meetings
description.description: Zoom Cloud Meetings是一款云视频会议工具，无须进行任何配置，没有账号也可加入会议，只需要点击邀请链接或输入会议ID，在1~2秒之内即能加入会议，在会议中，主持人可以轻松控制会议。可以支持召开100人的高清视频互动会议，还可以召开3000人的视频大会。

description.name: 飞鸽传书
description.description: 飞鸽传书是一款局域网通信和传输工具。支持局域网即时通讯，通过WiFi网络，即时沟通和高速文件传输，还支持共享打印机、共享文件和共享桌面等功能。

description.name: 飞鸽传书
description.description: 飞鸽传书是一款局域网通信和传输工具。支持局域网即时通讯，通过WiFi网络，即时沟通和高速文件传输，还支持共享打印机、共享文件和共享桌面等功能。

description.name: WeChat for Enterprise
description.description: WeChat for Enterprise is a communication and collaboration tool for enterprise in multi platforms. Enterprise address book can be quickly imported for unified， accurate and easy management. It integrated phone and mail, improved efficiency, provided receipt and reminders. Reliable security: protocol full encryption to prevent network eavesdropping, multiple data security protection mechanism to resist network attacks and intrusion.

description.name: 企业微信
description.description: 企业微信是一款为企业打造的沟通、协同工具。企业通讯录可快捷导入，统一管理同事信息，准确完善，方便查找。贴合办公场景的沟通方式：集成电话与邮件，多样沟通，提高效率，提供回执与提醒消息，贴合办公场景。可靠的安全保障：协议全程加密，防止网络窃听，多重数据安全保护机制，抵御网络攻击和入侵。

description.name: Deepin Calculator
description.description: Deepin Calculator is a simple and easy to use desktop calculator. It supports addition, subtraction, multiplication and division with keyboard input perfectly matched, as well as symbolic fault-tolerant computing.
description.slogan: Careful with money, brings you a better life!

description.name: 深度计算器
description.description: 深度计算器是一款简单易用的桌面计算器，支持加减乘除运算。完美支持键盘输入，在键盘输入时还支持符号容错，最多可以显示三行计算结果。

description.name: Deepin Calculator (Flatpak)
description.description: Deepin Calculator is a simple and easy to use desktop calculator. It supports addition, subtraction, multiplication and division with keyboard input perfectly matched, as well as symbolic fault-tolerant computing.
description.slogan: Careful with money, brings you a better life!

description.name: 深度计算器 (Flatpak)
description.description: 深度计算器是一款简单易用的桌面计算器，支持加减乘除运算。完美支持键盘输入，在键盘输入时还支持符号容错，最多可以显示三行计算结果。

description.name: Deepin Calendar (Flatpak)
description.description: Deepin Calender is an easy calendar tool developed by Deepin Technology, main features current date, solar terms, lunar calendar and world holidays.

description.name: 深度日历 (Flatpak)
description.description: 深度日历是深度科技打造的一款简单易用的日历工具，主要是当前日期、节气、农历日期、世界节日。

description.name: Deepin Recovery
description.description: Deepin Recovery enters the memory system by Grub startup, specialized in system backup and restore, system recovery and other problems.
description.slogan: Make your system to be rebirth.

description.name: 深度Live系统
description.description: 深度Live系统是通过Grub启动选项进入的内存系统，专门用于系统备份还原，文件操作、系统修复等问题。

description.name: WeChat application development tool
description.description: WeChat application development tool is a tool to develop WeChat programs. It can facilitate the test editing, development or debugging for developers. Support for binding users' WeChat to debug or authorize, simulating most SDKto to input and output, software to debug and develop based on wEInre, chrome dev tools and so on.
description.slogan: One package service for little program.

description.name: 微信应用开发工具
description.description: 微信应用开发工具是一款微信程序开发工具，可以方便开发人员进行测试编辑结果、开发或调试等工作。支持绑定用户的微信进行调试或授权，支持检验权限、模拟大部分 SDK 的输入和输出，支持软件基于wEInre 、chrome DevTools等进行调试或开发工作。（年后更一版，官网天天更，Wine的应用不太好打包，见谅啊，慢点催更）
description.slogan: 小程序开发调试一条龙。

description.name: Xiaoshujiang
description.description: Xiaoshujiang is a text editor that supports online and offline markdown. It provides various useful editing modes and extension syntax, such as Latex formula, table, directory, footnote, video, audio, attachment, checklist, flow chart, etc. You can save the article to multiple third-party storage plug-in with real-time synchronization upload and download operations.
description.slogan: Write what you think and love.

description.name: 小书匠
description.description: 小书匠是一款支持在线和离线的markdown文本编辑器，提供了多种实用的编辑模式，并且该软件还提供了许多有用的扩展语法，比如Latex公式、表格、目录、脚注、视频、音频、附件、checklist、流程图等。可将文章保存到多个第三方储存插件上，实现实时同步上传和下载的操作。

description.name: EDraw Infographics
description.description: EDraw Infographics provides many libraries of infographics elements like business, charts, education, people, and so on, also a variety of free templates. It only requires a single drag to add a shape! You can customize the text with range of fonts, colors, text styles and sizes, share infographics to many commonly used file formats, such as .png, .jpg, .html, .svg, .pdf, .word, .ppt, etc. What’s more, you can modify the brightness, contrast and transparency of picture, and even trim it to any shape, even remove the background.
description.slogan: Create Infographics in a simple way.

description.name: 亿图信息图
description.description: 亿图信息图是一款信息图设计工具，含有大量矢量信息图设计元素，拖拽式操作，随意排版，省时高效。支持导入SVG矢量图片，可自行绘制任意新元素，含有大量模板供使用，图标可以通过拖动改变数据，支持在线查看和云存储。
description.slogan: 最简便的信息图绘制工具。

description.name: Memoink
description.description: Memoink is a private note tool. All note contents are stored in the local, and supports auto backup to the private cloud (Qiniu, Ali OSS, etc.). Its notes are in markdown format with screenshot pasting, code highlighting and other useful features.

description.name: 忆墨笔记
description.description: 忆墨笔记是一款注重隐私的笔记工具。采用了无服务端的方式，笔记内容全部加密保存于本地，同时支持自动备份到私有云(如七牛云储存、阿里OSS等)中，忆墨的笔记采用markdown格式，同时支持截图粘贴等实用的功能。支持代码高亮。

description.name: CLion
description.description:
Clion is a C/C++ IDE. It is featured with fast import start, intelligent code assist, built-in tool and integration debugger, supports multiple programming language, plugins extention and so on. And it supports version control system, command line tools, custom editor and so on.
You need to get a licence to use this software after the evaluation period.

description.name: Scicos
description.description: Scicos is a graphical dynamical system modeler and simulator developed in the Metalau project at INRIA, Paris-Rocquencourt center. With Scicos, user can create block diagrams to model and simulate the dynamics of hybrid dynamical systems and compile models into executable code. Scicos is used for signal processing, systems control, queuing systems, and to study physical and biological systems.

description.name: Scicos
description.description: Scicos是一个图形化的动态系统建模器和模拟器，是在巴黎罗克库尔特中心的Metalau项目中开发的。使用Scicos，用户可以创建框图来建模和模拟混合动力系统的动力学，并将模型编译为可执行代码。SCICOS用于信号处理、系统控制、排队系统，以及研究物理和生物系统。新的扩展允许使用MODEICA语言生成基于组件的电气和液压电路建模。
description.slogan: 动态系统建模器和模拟器。

description.name: FreeMat
description.description: FreeMat is a free environment for rapid engineering and scientific prototyping and data processing. It is similar to commercial systems such as MATLAB from Mathworks, and IDL from Research Systems, but is Open Source. FreeMat is available under the GPL license.
description.slogan: Small size but powerful data processing.

description.name: FreeMat
description.description: FreeMat是一款免费的类似于Matlab 的科学数据处理及数学建模软件，与Matlab、Octave等都具有较好的兼容性。FreeMat最大的特点就是体积小巧，但功能强大，对数据的处理却毫不逊色，而且语法和Matlab极其相似，熟悉Matlab或者正在学习使用Matlab的朋友肯定能够上手使用。可以说，FreeMat是一款非常适合学生群体使用的开源跨平台科学计算软件。
description.slogan: 小巧的Matlab，强大的数据处理。

description.name: 360 Security Browser (beta)
description.description: 360 Security Browser is a browser based on Chrome kernel. It has the largest malicious URL library in China, using the interception technology to automatically block malicious websites. In the isolation mode, your computer will not be infected even if you access the Trojan. It combines Chromium 63 kernel with advanced technology to make opening the web faster, browsing videos more smoothly, and running game more fluently.

versions.changeLog:
* Full support for NP API plugin
* Solved the problem that the pop-up webpage cannot be closed.
* Optimized sandbox logic
* Fixed the crash caused by the backup of the favorites
* Fixed other crashes

description.name: 360安全浏览器 (beta)
description.description: 360安全浏览器是一款基于Chrome内核的浏览器。它拥有全国最大的恶意网址库，采用恶意网址拦截技术，可自动拦截挂马、欺诈、网银仿冒等恶意网址。独创沙箱技术，在隔离模式即使访问木马也不会感染，并拥有15大安全防护安全领航。360安全浏览器结合Chromium 63内核和先进的技术，使打开网络更快，浏览视频更流畅，切换游戏模式更流利。
description.slogan: 安全上网不中招，就用360安全浏览器。

description.name: XMind
description.description: XMind is a world leading mind map software. Besides basic logic diagram, it also supports structure chart, mind map, fishbone diagram, two-dimensional diagram and other models. XMind can display your diagram to others or export the diagram to Powerpoint and Word, fasten the exchange of complicated thoughts and information. It's widely used in enterprises and education.

description.name: XMind
description.description: XMind是一款全球领先的思维导图软件，除了可以轻松绘制基本逻辑图之外，还支持结构图、树状图、思维导图、鱼骨图、二维图等模型。XMind可以将您的图形显示给他人，或者将图形内容导出到Powerpoint、Word中，令复杂的思想和信息得到更快的交流。XMind在企业和教育领域都有很广泛的应用。

description.name: Crossover
description.description:
Crossover is a tool to run Windows software and games in Linux. Common Windows programs have been built in, such as Microsoft Office series, Adobe Photoshop series, World of Warcraft and so on. Windows programs will be able to seamlessly integrate in your Linux systems through Crossover without Windows authorization, dual system and virtual machine.
Notes：This is a free trial version.

description.name: Crossover
description.description:
Crossover是一款可以在Linux中运行Windows软件和游戏的工具。Crossover已经内置了常用的Windows程序，如Microsoft Office系列、Adobe Photoshop系列、魔兽世界等。使用Crossover，您不再需要Windows授权，不再需要双系统重启动，不再需要虚拟机，Windows程序就能与您的Linux系统无缝整合。
注：此版本为免费试用版。

description.name: Sublime Text 3
description.description:
Sublime Text is a code editor. It has beautiful user interface and powerful functions, such as code thumbnail, plugins of Python, code segment, syntax highlighting and so on. User can customize shortcuts, menus and toolbars.
You need to get a licence to use this software after the evaluation period.
description.slogan: The text editor you'll fall in love with!

description.name: Sublime Text 3
description.description:
Sublime Text是一个代码编辑器，它具有漂亮的用户界面和强大的功能，例如代码缩略图，Python的插件，代码段、语法高亮等。还可自定义快捷键绑定，菜单和工具栏等。
该版本需要您自行购买长期使用授权。
description.slogan: 性感无比的代码编辑器。

description.name: Deepin File Manager
description.description: Deepin File Manager is a powerful & easy-to-use file managing tool developped by Deepin Technology. It follows the functions and layout of the classic file manager, simplifies user operation on that basis, and added many distinctive features. With the easy-access navigation bar, diversified view and sorting, you will be managing with high proficiency. Classic and innovative, all for better experience!

description.name: TimeShift
description.description: TimeShift is a system recovery application. It will save snapshots of the system on scheduled time, and recover the system as needed with snapshots. It mainly protects your system and settings, so other files (documents, music, images) will not be changed during system recovery. It also provides file protection, but user needs to enable it in personal settings.

description.name: TimeShift
description.description: TimeShift是一款系统还原应用，它会在预定时间内给系统保存快照，并在你需要时通过快照来实现还原。TimeShift主要保护你的系统和设置可还原，这样你还原系统时其他文件（文档、音乐、图片等）将不会被更改，当然TimeShift也提供文件保护功能，你可以通过自定义设置开启。

description.name: Gwyddion
description.description: Gwyddion is a modular scan probe microscope data visualization and analysis tool. It aims at analyzing high degree san probe microscope technology(AFM, MFM, STM and Scan/NSOM), but also can be used for any altitude field and image analysis, for example outline data.

description.name: Gwyddion
description.description: Gwyddion 是一款模块化扫描探针显微镜数据可视化和分析工具。主要是它的目的是为分析领域所取得的高度扫描探针显微技术(原子力显微镜，磁力显微 镜，扫描隧道显微镜，扫描/ NSOM ) ，但通常可以用于任何其他高度场和图像分析，例如分析的轮廓数据 。

description.name: 3DSlicer
description.description: 3D Slicer is an open source software platform for medical image informatics, image processing, and three-dimensional visualization. Built over two decades through support from the National Institutes of Health and a worldwide developer community, Slicer brings free, powerful cross-platform processing tools to physicians, researchers, and the general public.

versions.changeLog: This version introduces close to 1,000 feature enhancements and bug fixes for better performance and stability. It includes more than 15 new-and-improved core modules and dozens of updated extensions.

description.name: 3DSlicer
description.description: 3DSlicer是医学图像信息学、图像处理和三维可视化的开源软件平台。Slicer通过美国国立卫生研究院(National Institutes of Health)和全球开发者社区的支持，在20多年的时间里为医生、研究人员和普通大众提供了免费的、强大的跨平台处理工具。

versions.changeLog: 这个版本引入了近1000个特性增强和bug修复，以获得更好的性能和稳定性。它包括超过15个新的和改进的核心模块和几十个更新的扩展

description.name: Deepin Editor
description.description: Deepin Editor is a simple text editing tool. You can use it to write a simple text document, or use its advanced features as a code editing tool that supports code syntax highlighting and multiple themes.

description.name: 深度编辑器
description.description: 深度编辑器是一个简单的文本编辑工具。您可以用它书写简单的文本文档，也可以使用它的高级特性，让它成为一个代码编辑工具。支持代码语法高亮和多个主题。

description.name: Topbar Extension
description.description: A Mac style topbar. In the topbar, you can view the date and time, uploading and downloading speed, manage open applications, set input method, adjust the volume, and quickly enter Control Center for power management and other settings.

versions.changeLog: rename to deepin-topbar

description.name: 顶栏扩展
description.description: 一个苹果风格的顶部工具栏。在该顶栏，你可以查看日期时间、上传下载网速，管理打开的应用，设置输入法，调节音量，快速进入控制中心进行电源管理等。
description.slogan: 系统设置就是这么简单。

versions.changeLog: 重命名包名

description.name: Baidu FM
description.description: Baidu FM is an easy-to-use online music player presented by Baidu Mp3. You don't need to add playlist or bother to pick songs. It can constantly mimic and analyze your music preference based on your behavior, then recommend good music to satisfy you.

description.name: 百度随心听网页版
description.description: 百度随心听是百度mp3推出的一个在线音乐收听工具，操作十分简便。您不用添加任何播放列表，更不用费神挑选歌曲，百度便能根据您的试听行为不断模仿和分析您的音乐喜好，推荐给您真正随心的好音乐。

description.name: PointDownload
description.description: PointDownload is a convenient, easy to use and efficient download software with HTTP, FTP, BT, Magnet and other protocols. It also supports off-line acceleration and high-speed channel download functions of Thunder. It's characterized with multi-threaded download, pause and resume download, you-get detection, online video download, browser plug-ins (Chrome, Firefox) supporting and other functions.
description.slogan: To download, you just need one click.

description.name: 点载
description.description: 点载是一个方便、易用、高效的下载软件，支持HTTP、FTP、BT、Magnet等协议，还支持迅雷离线加速和迅雷高速通道下载功能。具有多线程下载、断点续传、支持you-get探测并下载在线视频、支持浏览器插件（Chrome、Firefox）等功能。

description.name: Web Douban FM
description.description: Douban FM is a personalized music tool developed by Douban. While listening, Douban FM will know the preferences of user by "heart", "dustbin" or "skip". Based on the user's operation and feedback, Douban FM will select and play music from a massive music collection suitable for the user .

description.name: 豆瓣FM网页版
description.description: 豆瓣FM是一款由豆瓣开发的个性化的音乐收听工具。在收听的过程中，用户可以用“红心”、“垃圾桶”或者“跳过” 告诉豆瓣FM用户的喜好。豆瓣FM将根据用户的操作和反馈，从海量曲库中自动发现并播出符合用户音乐口味的歌曲。
description.slogan: 在这里，寻找您的私人兆赫。

description.name: Web TTPOD
description.description: Web TTPod is a music player integrated with play, sound effect, search, download and multiple other functions. It is convenient for users to meet their need of music on PC. Web TTPod supports downloading lyrics and music images, account login, and skin switch. You can enjoy quality music without installing the player.

description.name: 天天动听网页版
description.description: 天天动听网页版是集播放、音效、搜索、下载等众多功能于一身的音乐播放器，可以方便用户在PC上的音乐需求。天天动听网页版支持歌词和歌曲图片下载，支持帐号登录，同时还支持皮肤切换，让您不用安装播放器就可以欣赏优质音乐。

description.name: 360 Safe for Linux
description.description: 360 Safe for Linux is a security management application, which integrates the three security engines—360QEX, 360 Cloud Security and BitDefender. It has functions of Trojans checking and killing, optimization and acceleration, and trashes cleanup. It can solve Trojans, viruses and other problems effectively.
description.slogan: Protect your computer in all dimensions.

description.name: 360安全卫士
description.description: 360安全卫士是一款安全管理软件，它集成了360QEX、360云安全和BitDefender三大安全引擎，具有木马查杀、优化加速、垃圾清理功能、能够有效解决木马、病毒等问题。

description.name: Conky
description.description:
Conky is a system monitor of desktop environment. It not only can monitor system status, network status and other parameters, but also can customize function modules and interfaces to configure different Conky interfaces.
Note: It should be used with Conky Manager.
description.slogan: System resources are clear at a glance.

description.name: Conky
description.description:
Conky是一个桌面环境的系统监视软件，它可以在桌面上监控系统运行状态、网络状态等参数，同时还可以自定义功能模块和界面来配置不同的Conky显示界面。
注：需要配合Conky Manager一起使用。

description.name: Calendar
description.description: Calendar is a calendar App with synchronizing feature. It can search & create activities, set & view event reminders, and display date, week, month and year calendar views.

description.name: 日历
description.description: 日历是一个日历应用程序，它可以搜索活动，创建活动，设置和查看事件提醒，以及显示天，周，月，年日历视图，同时还具有同步功能。

description.name: Maps
description.description: Maps is a open source map service App featured with location searching, route planning, map viewing, location bookmarking, common map and satellite map functions. It allows user to easily find designated geo-location on desktop map.

description.name: 地图
description.description: 地图是一个开源的地图服务应用，它可以让用户在桌面地图上方便查找指定的地理位置，它支持位置搜索、路线规划、地图浏览、位置收藏、普通地图和卫星地图等功能。

description.name: Sunlogin Client
description.description:
Sunlogin Remote Control is an application that supports remote control between multiple systems and multiple devices, enables you to build your private cloud and transfer files between computers, boost your home security with IP camera and much more. 
Note: Sunlogin Client should be used with Sunlogin Remote. After installing Sunlogin Client, please visit http://<client ip>:30080, such as http://10.0.13.58:30080. Input Sunlogin code of the host from Sunlogin Remote to login and set visit password for Sunlogin Remote to login and control.
description.slogan: Monitor remote computers as in front of you.

description.name: 向日葵客户端
description.description:
向日葵远程控制软件是一款完全免费的阳光远控软件。它采用先进的内网穿透技术，只要能上网，就能随时随地通过向日葵对远程主机进行远程桌面、远程管理、远程文件、远程摄像头、远程重启关机等操作。向日葵远程控制软件支持Windows、Android、iOS、Mac、Linux五大系统设备。
注：向日葵客户端需要与主控端一起使用。安装后，需要访问http://<客户端电脑 ip>:30080，如http://10.0.13.58:30080。在最下方输入主控端的主机葵码登录，并设置访问密码以便主控端访问。

description.name: Sunlogin Remote
description.description:
Sunlogin Remote Control is an application that supports remote control between multiple systems and multiple devices, enables you to build your private cloud and transfer files between computers, boost your home security with IP camera and much more. It is an indispensable choice for IT, gamers, designers and other people who have the needs of remote management. 
Note: Sunlogin Client should be used with Sunlogin Remote.
description.slogan: Monitor remote computers as in front of you.

description.name: 向日葵主控端
description.description:
向日葵远程控制软件是一款完全免费的阳光远控软件。它采用先进的内网穿透技术，只要能上网，就能随时随地通过向日葵对远程主机进行远程桌面、远程管理、远程文件、远程摄像头、远程重启关机等操作。向日葵远程控制软件支持Windows、Android、iOS、Mac、Linux五大系统设备。
注：向日葵客户端需要与主控端一起使用。

description.name: Kedis - Redis desktop manager
description.description: Kedis是一个基于AngularJS、Electron和Node.JS搭建的Redis桌面管理工具，前端样式表采用了Bootstrap作为原始代码，并在此基础上做了一些个性化的改造。支持SSH通道，支持集群管理，支持IO监控，跨平台。
description.slogan: 跨平台的Redis桌面管理工具

versions.changeLog: 全新的Kedis 2.0 版本，优化了代码结构，提高了程序效率

It's characterized with stable, fast, safe, simple, plug-in extension and other features. Stable version is mainly for ordinary users with the pursuit of stability and generally updated most slowly.
description.slogan: Speed is no longer a problem.

description.name: Eclipse
description.description: Eclipse-Platform is a a core tool type when Eclipse runs. It includes many static methods used to obtain information on the operating system and Eclipse, such as the operating system architecture, extension point registration, Eclipse directory, etc.
description.slogan: Java development platform with rich plugins.

description.name: Eclipse
description.description: Eclipse-Platform是Eclipse在运行时的一个核心工具类，包括很多静态方法用于获取操作系统和Eclipse相关信息，如操作系统架构、扩展点注册、Eclipse目录等。

description.name: Firefox
description.description: Firefox is a safe and efficient browser. It's characterized with fast speed, privacy protection, rich plug-in resources, data sync between different devices, tabbed browsing, customization and other features.

description.name: 火狐浏览器
description.description: 火狐浏览器是一个安全高效的浏览器，它具有速度快、隐私保护、丰富的插件资源、不同设备之间同步数据、分页浏览、个性化定制等特性。
description.slogan: 丰富的插件，方便你的浏览。

description.name: Edraw Max
description.description: Edraw Max is a comprehensive application to make graphs and chats. It contains a wealth of examples and templates to help you easily create flowcharts, network topology and layout diagrams. A more intelligent and humane way to draw, including rich graphics template library and featured example library to help designers reduce the workload and elaborate design fast. The formats are compatible with mainstream office software, you can easily put design results into Office documents or export to PDF format.

description.name: 亿图图示
description.description: 亿图图示是一款综合图形图表制作应用，它包含丰富的实例和模版，帮助您轻松创建流程图、网络拓扑图和平面布局图等。采用更智能和人性化的绘制方式，包括丰富的图形模板库和特色实例库，帮助设计者降低工作量，快捷阐述设计思想。软件格式兼容主流办公软件，可以很方便的把设计结果插入到Office文档或者导出成PDF格式。

description.name: Qucs
description.description: Qucs is a circuit emulator which supports varies of circuit type to provide feedback of analog and digital components, for example DC, AC, S arguments, the anaysis of harmonic balance and noise, etc. It allows to set principle diagram and shows emulation result of various types of diagrams, or to import SPICE module to emulate.

description.name: Qucs
description.description: Qucs是一款电路模拟器，支持各种电路仿真类型，为模拟和数字组件提供反馈，例如DC，AC，S参数，谐波平衡分析，噪声分析等。允许设置原理图和在各种类型的图表中呈现模拟结果，还可以导入现有的SPICE模型以用于模拟。

description.name: Seafile
description.description: Seafile is an open source, professional and reliable cloud storage platform with online preview, editing, contrast changing, file restore, messaging, group discussion and other functions. Meanwhile, It can solve centralized file storage, sharing and cross-platform access and other issues.
description.slogan: Freely manage your data by yourself.

description.name: Seafile
description.description: Seafile是一个开源、专业、可靠的云存储平台，提供在线预览、编辑、对比更改、还原文件、消息通信、群组讨论等功能，同时还可以解决文件集中存储、共享和跨平台访问等问题。

description.name: Opera
description.description: Opera is a web browser characterized with network sync, password management, session management, mouse gestures, keyboard shortcuts, built-in search engine, intelligent pop-up ad blocking, URL filtering and theme skin, plug-in extension and other functions.

description.name: Opera
description.description: Opera是一款网络浏览器，它具有网络同步，密码管理、会话管理、鼠标手势、键盘快捷键、内置搜索引擎、智能弹出式广告拦截、网址的过滤和主题皮肤、插件扩展等功能。
description.slogan: 私人定制，在浏览网页的同时彰显你的个性。

description.description: Google Chrome is a web browser developed by Google Company with stable, development, Beta and other versions. description.name: Weather
description.description: Weather is a weather forcaster featured with geo-location and temperature switching. It displays weather conditions in one or multiple locations by auto-positioning. It can forecast hourly weather for the next three days, and day-night weather for the next week.

description.name: 天气
description.description: 天气是一个天气预报应用程序，通过自动定位显示单个或多个地点的当前天气状况，预测未来三天，每小时的天气预报，以及白天和黑夜的预测为一周的每一天，同时还可以切换地理位置、温度等功能。

description.name: Android Straight Flush
description.description: Straight Flush is a stock software to market display, analysis and trading. It not only provides Shanghai and Shenzhen stock, fund market, online stock trading commission and other services, but also provides macro finance, industry industry groups and other information. It's more easier for you to invest in stocks with massive stock market resources.
description.slogan: With it, the stock market is at your fingerti

description.name: 同花顺安卓版
description.description: 同花顺是一个提供行情显示、行情分析和行情交易的股票软件。同花顺除了提供沪深两市股票、基金行情、在线股票买卖委托等服务，还提供宏观财经、行业板块等资讯。海量的股市资源，让您炒股游刃有余。
description.slogan: 一“股”作气，股市触手可及。

description.name: Web DingTalk
description.description: Web DingTalk is a communication platform customized for small and medium-sized enterprises. It provides free phone, voice/text message, enterprise contacts, enterprise cloud disk and so on.

description.name: 钉钉网页版
description.description: 钉钉网页版是一个专为中小企业用户定制的沟通平台，它提供免费电话，语音或文字通信，企业通讯录，企业云盘等功能。

description.name: Web Wunderlist
description.description: Wunderlist is a cloud task manager. It can synchronously create, visit and sort of your task list and todo list, share your todo list and shopping list with others. Meanwhile, it supports adding files, discussion, dialogue and other functions.

description.name: 奇妙清单网页版
description.description: 奇妙清单是一个云端任务管理工具，它可以同步创建、访问并整理您的任务清单和待办事项，与其他人共享待办、购物等列表清单，还支持添加文件、展开讨论和对话等功能。
description.slogan: 奇思妙想，清晰简单的记录。

description.name: Skype
description.description: Skype is an instant messaging application with video chat, multi-person voice conference, file transfer, text chat and other functions. It allows users to make video calls across platforms, you can make video calls with Skype users in computers, mobile phones, televisions, PSV and other terminals.

description.name: Skype
description.description: Skype是一款即时通讯软件，具备视频聊天、多人语音会议、传送文件、文字聊天等功能。它允许用户进行跨平台的视频呼叫，可与使用电脑、手机、电视、PSV等多种终端的Skype用户进行视频通话。

description.name: High school English word practice generation program
description.description: Because of his son's need to practice vocabulary and his fear of restricting the use of computers to play games, he used Python 3 + Qt5 to create a small tool that can generate PDF format for high school (People's Education Edition) specific unit vocabulary exercises, and generate answers at the same time. Relatively simple, personally feel that it is practical, share it.
description.slogan: Practical and compact, great Deepin OS

versions.changeLog:
2018.10.23

Update to 1.2.1 to add save and revise function, while allowing read-only look back to the completed correction. Considering the parents'time is also very tense, you can temporarily save the corrections until you click "End Correction" to make an error record. The error rate for a word in different exercises is always the final error rate.


2018.10.18

Update to 1.2.0 to add correction function. It can track the error rate of the children's word and phrase exercises and generate new exercises only on the right and wrong questions within the selected scope.

Due to the change of database structure, please delete the folder of high_school_words_data in the home directory for the version 1.0.1 installed, otherwise there may be an error that the testings data table cannot be opened. Then double click on the installation and choose "reinstall".


2018.09.30

Update to 1.0.1 and increase the call to Deepin document reader to open the generated PDF file.

description.name: 高中英语单词练习程序
description.description: 因儿子练习单词需要，又怕玩游戏限制使用电脑，所以使用python3+qt5制作了一个能生成PDF格式高中（人教版）指定单元单词练习内容的小工具，可同时生成答案。比较简陋，个人觉得还实用，分享一下了。下载后双击安装，在“办公学习”分类中找“高中英语单词练习生成程序”
description.slogan: 实用小巧，共同营造“深度”应用生态

versions.changeLog:
2018.10.23
更新到1.2.1 增加保存批改功能，同时允许只读状态回看已完成的批改。考虑到家长时间也很紧张，可以中途暂时保存批改，直到点击“结束批改”才进行错误记录。批改完成后对于某一单词在不同练习批改中显示的错误率始终为最终错误率。

2018.10.18
更新到1.2.0 增加批改功能。可以对孩子单词与词组练习的错误率进行跟踪，可以在选定范围内只对错题生成新的练习。
由于数据库结构发生变化，已安装1.0.1版本的请先删除主目录里的high_school_words_data文件夹，否则可能出现testings数据表无法打开的错误。然后进行双击安装，选择“重新安装”即可
  
2018.09.30 
更新到1.0.1 增加调用Deepin文档阅读器打开生成的PDF文件。同样双击，选择重新安装就可以更新

description.name: Android Cookpad
description.description: Cookpad is an exchange application that collected Japan's largest recipes. It's mainly to search recipes and share recipes, can discuss tips on diet and health, discover new recipes and cook delicious food. Meanwhile, you can upload your recipes and share them with others, learn from others to make a delicious food, talk delicious food with people around the world.
description.slogan: Only food can not be disappointed.

description.name: Cookpad安卓版
description.description: Cookpad是一个汇集日本最大食谱的交流应用，主要是搜索食谱和分享食谱，可以讨论关于饮食和健康的技巧，发现新配方和烹调美味的食物。同时可以上传你的食谱并分享给别人，还可以学习别人的食谱来制作美味，还可以和全世界的人们一起谈论美食。

description.name: 欢乐斗地主网页版
description.description: 欢乐斗地主是腾讯游戏为玩家精心打造的国民级斗地主游戏。“欢乐斗地主”包含斗地主经典玩法、癞子玩法，同时加入挑战赛模式。您可以与百万QQ游戏玩家同桌竞技，还可以开个房间与好友同玩。有抢地主，明牌，加倍等玩法，赢取欢乐豆，在游戏中感受无处不在的欢乐！

description.name: Weather plugin
description.description:
A weather plugin on dock. It shows the temperature, humidity, PM 2.5, and activity suggestion. Right click it on dock to set city and view the cloud pictures.
Note: Right click on dock, and uncheck "weather" in "Plugins" to exit.

description.name: 海天鹰天气
description.description:
一款任务栏天气插件。可显示天气、气温、湿度、空气质量、活动建议。右键可设置城市，查看卫星云图等。
注：在任务栏空白处右击，取消勾选“插件”中的“天气”，即可退出。
